GV05chupsb_u:380: vāyuṃ bahirniḥsārayati sa prāṇākhyo vāyorvṛttiviśeṣo yadapānityapaśvasiti tābhyāmevāntarākarṣati vāyuṃ so 'pāno 'pānākhyā vṛttiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:381: tataḥ kimiti, ucyate-atha ya uktalakṣaṇayoḥ prāṇāpānayoḥ
GV05chupsb_u:382: sandhistayorantarā vṛttiviśeṣaḥ sa vyānaḥ, yaḥ sāṅkhyādiśāsraprasiddhiḥ śrutyā viśeṣanirūpaṇānnāsau vyāna ityabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:394: ChUpBh_1,3.4 tathā vāgviśeṣāmṛcamṛksaṃsthaṃ ca sāma sāmāvayavaṃ codgīthamaprāṇannanapānanvyānenaiva nirvartayatītyabhiprāyaḥ //4 //
GV05chupsb_u:396: ato yāny anyāni vīryavanti karmāṇi yathāgner manthanam ājeḥ saraṇaṃ dṛḍhasya dhanuṣa āyamanam aprāṇann anapānaṃs tāni karoti |
GV05chupsb_u:397: etasya hetor vyānam evodgītham upāsīta || ChUp_1,3.5 ||
GV05chupsb_u:398: ChUpBh_1,3.5 na kevalaṃ vāgādyabhivyāharaṇamevāto 'smādanyānyapi yāni vīryavanti karmāṇi prayatnādhikyanirvartyāni yathāgnermanthanamājermaryādāyāḥ saraṇaṃ dhāvanaṃ dṛḍhasya dhanuṣa
GV05chupsb_u:412: ChUpBh_1,3.6 athādhunā khalūdgīthākṣarāṇyupāsīta bhaktyakṣarāṇi mā bhūvannityato viśinaṣṭi-udgītha iti /
GV05chupsb_u:416: kathaṃ prāṇasyottvamityāha-prāṇena hyuttiṣṭhati sarvo 'prāṇasyāvasādadarśanādato 'styudaḥ prāṇasya ca sāmānyam /
GV05chupsb_u:419: tathānnaṃ thamanne hīdaṃ sarvaṃ sthitamato 'styannasya thākṣarasya ca sāmānyam //6 //
GV05chupsb_u:430: dugdhe 'smai vāg dohaṃ yo vāco dohaḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:432: ya etāny evaṃ vidvān udgīthākṣarāṇy upāsta ud-gī-tha iti || ChUp_1,3.7 ||
GV05chupsb_u:433: ChUpBh_1,3.7 trayāṇāṃ śrutyuktāni sāmānyāni tāni tenānurūpeṇa śeṣeṣvapi
GV05chupsb_u:442: yajurvedo gīryajuṣā prattasya haviṣo devatānāṃ giraṇāt /
GV05chupsb_u:447: ṛgvedādiśabdasādhyaṃ phalamityabhiprāyastadvāco dohastaṃ svayameva vāgdogdhyātmānameva dogdhi
GV05chupsb_u:449: ya etāni yathoktānyevaṃ yathoktaguṇānyudgīthākṣarāṇi vidvānsannupāsta udgītha iti //7 //
GV05chupsb_u:453: yena sāmnā stoṣyan syāt tat sāmopadhāvet || ChUp_1,3.8 ||
GV05chupsb_u:454: ChUpBh_1,3.8 atha khalvidānīmāśīḥsamṛddhirāśiṣaḥ kāmasya samṛddhiryathā bhavettaducyata iti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:457: tadyathā-yena sāmnā yena sāmaviśeṣeṇa stoṣyanstutiṃ kariṣyansyādbhavedudgātā tatsāmopadhāvedupasareccintayedutpattyādibhiḥ
GV05chupsb_u:459: yasyām ṛci tām ṛcaṃ, yad ārṣeyaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ, yāṃ devatām abhiṣṭoṣyan syāt tāṃ devatām upadhāvet ChUpBh_1,3.9 yasyāmṛci tatsāma tāṃ carcamupadhāveddevatādibhiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:463: yena cchandasā stoṣyan syāt tac chanda upadhāvet |
GV05chupsb_u:464: yena stomena stoṣyamāṇaḥ syāt taṃ stomam upadhāvet || ChUp_1,3.10 ||
GV05chupsb_u:465: ChUpBh_1,3.10 yena cchandasā gāyatryādinā stoṣyansyāttacchanda upadhāvet /
GV05chupsb_u:470: yāṃ diśam abhiṣṭoṣyan syāt tāṃ diśam upadhāvet || ChUp_1,3.11 ||
GV05chupsb_u:473: ātmānam antata upasṛtya stuvīta kāmaṃ dhyāyann apramattaḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:474: abhyāśo ha yad asmai sa kāmaḥ smṛdhyeta yatkāmaḥ stuvīteti yatkāmaḥ stuvīteti || ChUp_1,3.12
GV05chupsb_u:475: ChUpBh_1,3.12 ātmānamudgātā svaṃ rūpaṃ gotranāmādibhiḥ sāmādīnkrameṇa svaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:478: 'bhyāśaḥ kṣiprameva ha yadyatrāsmā evaṃvide sa kāmaḥ samṛdhyeta samṛddhiṃ gacchet /
GV05chupsb_u:479: ko 'sau, yatkāmo yaḥ kāmo 'sya so 'yaṃ yatkāmaḥ sanstuvīteti /
GV05chupsb_u:483: om ity etad akṣaram udgītham upāsīta |
GV05chupsb_u:490: devā vai mṛtyor bibhyatas trayīṃ vidyāṃ prāviśan |
GV05chupsb_u:492: yad ebhir acchādayaṃs tac chandasāṃ chandastvam || ChUp_1,4.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:493: ChUpBh_1,4.2 devā vai mṛtyormārakādvibhyataḥ kiṃ kṛtavanta ityucyate /
GV05chupsb_u:494: trayīṃ vidyāṃ trayīvihitaṃ karma prāviśanpraviṣṭavanto vaidikaṃ karma prārabdhavanta ityarthaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:498: tān u tatra mṛtyur yathā matsyam udake paripaśyed evaṃ paryapaśyad ṛci sāmni yajuṣi |
GV05chupsb_u:499: te nu vittvordhvā ṛcaḥ sāmno yajuṣaḥ svaram eva prāviśan || ChUp_1,4.3 ||
GV05chupsb_u:500: ChUpBh_1,4.3 tāṃstatra devānkarmaparānmṛtyuryathā loke matsyaghātako matsyamudake nātigambhīre paripaśyedbaḍiśodakasrāvopāyasādhyaṃ manyamāna evaṃ paryapaśyaddṛṣṭavānmṛtyuḥ karmakṣayopāyena sādhyāndevānmena ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:503: te nu devā vaidikena karmaṇā saṃskṛtāḥ śuddhātmānaḥ santo mṛtyościkīrṣitaṃ viditavantaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:504: viditvā ca ta ūrdhvā vyāvṛttāḥ karmabhya ṛcaḥ sāmno yajuṣa ṛgyajuḥsāmasambaddhātkarmaṇo 'bhyutthāyetyarthaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:505: tena karmaṇā mṛtyubhayāpagamaṃ prati nirāśāstadapāsyāmṛtābhayaguṇamakṣaraṃ svaraṃ svaraśabditaṃ prāviśanneva praviṣṭavantaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:510: yadā vā ṛcam āpnoty om ity evātisvarati evaṃ sāmaivaṃ yajuḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:511: eṣa u svaro yad etad akṣaram etad amṛtam abhayam |
GV05chupsb_u:512: tat praviśya devā amṛtā abhavan || ChUp_1,4.4 ||
GV05chupsb_u:513: ChUpBh_1,4.4 kathaṃ punaḥ svaraśabdavācyatvamakṣarasyetyucyate-yadā vā ṛcamāpnotyomityevātisvaratyevaṃ sāmaivaṃ yajuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:518: sa ya etad evaṃ vidvān akṣaraṃ praṇauty etad evākṣaraṃ svaram amṛtam abhayaṃ praviśati |
GV05chupsb_u:519: tat praviśya yad amṛtā devās tad amṛto bhavati || ChUp_1,4.5 ||
GV05chupsb_u:524: viśiṣṭastadamṛto bhavati na nyūnatā nāpyadhikatāmṛtatva ityarthaḥ //5//
GV05chupsb_u:527: atha khalu ya udgīthaḥ sa praṇavo yaḥ praṇavaḥ sa udgītha iti |
GV05chupsb_u:528: asau vā āditya udgītha eṣa praṇavaḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:529: om iti hy eṣa svarann eti || ChUp_1,5.1 ||
GV05chupsb_u:532: vaktavyamityārabhyate-atha khalu ya udgīthaḥ sa praṇavo bahvṛcānāṃ yaśca praṇavasteṣāṃ sa eva cchāndogya udgīthaśabdavācyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:533: asau vā āditya udgītha eṣa praṇavaśabdavācyo 'pi sa eva bahvṛcānāṃ nānyaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:539: etam u evāham abhyagāsiṣaṃ tasmān mama tvam eko 'sīti ha kauṣītakiḥ putram
GV05chupsb_u:544: ChUpBh_1,5.2 tametamu evāhamabhyagāsiṣamābhimukhyena gītavānasmyādityaraśmyabhedaṃ kṛtvā dhyānaṃ kṛtavānasmītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:545: tena tasmātkāraṇānmama tvameko 'si putra iti ha kauṣītakiḥ kuṣītakasyāpatyaṃ kauṣītakiḥ putramuvācoktavān
GV05chupsb_u:546: ato raśmīnādityaṃ ca bhedena tvaṃ paryāvartayātparyāvartayetyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:548: evaṃ bahavo vai te tava putrā bhaviṣyantītyadhi daivatam //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:551: ya evāyaṃ mukhyaḥ prāṇas tam udgītham upāsita |
GV05chupsb_u:552: om iti hy eṣa svarann eti || ChUp_1,5.3 ||
GV05chupsb_u:555: tathomiti hyeṣa prāṇo 'pi svarannetyomiti hyanujñāṃ kurvanniva
GV05chupsb_u:557: na hi maraṇakāle mumūrṣoḥ samīpasthāḥ prāṇasyoṅkāraṇaṃ śṛṇvantīti /
GV05chupsb_u:560: etam u evāham abhyagāsiṣaṃ tasmān mama tvam eko 'sīti ha kauṣītakiḥ putram
GV05chupsb_u:562: prāṇāṃs tvaṃ bhūmānam abhigāyatād bahavo vai me bhaviṣyantīti ||
GV05chupsb_u:564: ato vāgādīnmukhyaṃ ca prāṇaṃ bhedaguṇaviśiṣṭagudgīthaṃ paśyanbhūmānaṃ manasābhigāyatāt /
GV05chupsb_u:566: bahavo vai me mama putrā bhaviṣyantītyevamabhiprāyaḥ sannityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:569: atha khalu ya udgīthaḥ sa praṇavo yaḥ praṇavaḥ sa udgītha iti |
GV05chupsb_u:570: hotṛṣadanād dha evāpi durudgītham anusamāharatīty anusamāharatīti ||
GV05chupsb_u:571: ChUpBh_1,5.5 atha khalu ya udgītha ityādipraṇavodgīthaikatvadarśanamapaktaṃ tasyaitatphalamāhartuṃ śakyam /
GV05chupsb_u:572: kiṃ taddhaivāpi durudgītaṃ duṣṭamudgītamudgānaṃ kṛtamudgātrā svakarmaṇi kṣataṃ kṛtamityarthaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:579: tad etad etasyām ṛcy adhyūḍhaṃ sāma |
GV05chupsb_u:592: tasmādata eva kāraṇādṛcyadhyūḍhameva sāma gīyata idānīmapi sāmagaiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:593: yathā ca ṛksāmanī nātyantaṃ bhinne anyonyaṃ tathaitau pṛthivyagnidvayaṃ sāmaikaśabdābhidheyatvamāpannaṃ sāma /
GV05chupsb_u:600: tad etad etasyām ṛcy adhyūḍhaṃ sāma |
GV05chupsb_u:607: tad etad etasyām ṛcy adhyūḍhaṃ sāma |
GV05chupsb_u:616: tad etad etasyām ṛcy adhyūḍhaṃ sāma |
GV05chupsb_u:623: atha yad etad ādityasya śuklaṃ bhāḥ saivark |
GV05chupsb_u:624: atha yan nīlaṃ paraḥkṛṣṇaṃ tat sāma |
GV05chupsb_u:625: tad etad etasyām ṛcy adhyūḍhaṃ sāma |
GV05chupsb_u:626: tasmad ṛcy adhyūḍhaṃ sāma gīyate || ChUp_1,6.5 ||
GV05chupsb_u:627: ChUpBh_1,6.5 atha yadetadādityasya śuklaṃ bhāḥ śuklā dīptiḥ saivarka /
GV05chupsb_u:628: atha yadāditye nīlaṃ paraḥ kṛṣṇaṃ paro 'tiśayena kārṣṇyaṃ tatsāma /
GV05chupsb_u:631: atha yad evaitad ādityasya śuklaṃ bhāḥ saiva sā |
GV05chupsb_u:632: atha yan nīlaṃ paraḥkṛṣṇaṃ tad amaḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:634: atha ya eṣo 'ntarāditye hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣo dṛśyate hiraṇyaśmaśrur hiraṇyakeśa ā praṇakhāt sarva eva suvarnaḥ || ChUp_1,6.6 ||
GV05chupsb_u:635: ChUpBh_1,6.6 te evaite bhāḥ śuklakṛṣṇatve sā cāmaśca sāma /
GV05chupsb_u:636: atha ya eṣo 'ntarāditye ādityasyāntarmadhye hiraṇmayo hiraṇmaya iva hiraṇmayaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:639: na hi sauvarṇe 'cetane pāpmādiprāptirasti yena pratiṣidhyeta /
GV05chupsb_u:641: ato luptopama eva hiraṇmayaśabdo jyotirmaya ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:643: puruṣaḥ puri śayanātpūrayati vā svenā'tmanā jagaditi /
GV05chupsb_u:648: āpraṇakhātpraṇakho nakhāgraṃ nakhāgreṇa saha sarvaḥ suvarṇa iva bhārūpa ityarthaḥ //6 //
GV05chupsb_u:650: tasya yathā kapyāsaṃ puṇḍarīkam evam akṣiṇī |
GV05chupsb_u:653: udeti ha vai sarvebhyaḥ pāpmabhyo ya evaṃ veda || ChUp_1,6.7 ||
GV05chupsb_u:662: sa eṣa devaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pāpmabhyaḥ pāpmanā saha tatkāryebhya ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:666: tamevaṅguṇasampannamunnāmānaṃ yathoktena prakāreṇa yo veda so
GV05chupsb_u:675: sa eṣa ye cāmuṣmāt parāñco lokās teṣāṃ ceṣṭa devakāmānāṃ ca |
GV05chupsb_u:678: vivakṣitatvādāha-tasyarkca sāma ca geṣṇau pṛthivyādyuktalakṣaṇe parvaṇī /
GV05chupsb_u:682: yata evamunnāmācāsāvṛksāmageṣṇaśca tasmādṛksāmageṣṇatvaprāptamudgīthatvamucyate parokṣeṇa parokṣapriyatvāddevasya tasmādudgītha iti /
GV05chupsb_u:685: sa eṣa deva unnāmā ye cāmuṣmādādityātparāñcaḥ parāgañcanādūrdhvā lokāsteṣāṃ lokānāṃ ceṣṭe na kevalamīśitṛtvameva caśabdāddhārayati ca /
GV05chupsb_u:687: kiñca devakāmānāmīṣṭa ityetadadhidaivataṃ devatāviṣayaṃ devasyodgīthasya svarūpamuktam //8//
GV05chupsb_u:693: tad etad etasyām ṛcy adhyūḍhaṃ sāma |
GV05chupsb_u:701: prāṇo ghrāṇamucyate saha vāyunā, vāgeva sā prāṇo 'ma ityādi pūrvavat //1
GV05chupsb_u:705: tad etad etasyām ṛcy adhyūḍhaṃ sāma |
GV05chupsb_u:715: tad etad etasyām ṛcy adhyūḍhaṃ sāma |
GV05chupsb_u:722: atha yad etad akṣnaḥ śuklaṃ bhāḥ saivark |
GV05chupsb_u:723: atha yan nīlaṃ paraḥkṛṣṇaṃ tat sāma |
GV05chupsb_u:724: tad etad etasyām ṛcy adhyūḍhaṃ sāma |
GV05chupsb_u:726: atha yad evaitad akṣṇaḥ śuklaṃ bhāḥ saiva sā |
GV05chupsb_u:727: atha yan nīlaṃ paraḥkṛṣṇaṃ tad amaḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:729: ChUpBh_1,7.4 atha yadetadakṣṇaḥ śuklaṃ bhāḥ saivarka /
GV05chupsb_u:730: atha yannīlaṃ paraḥ kṛṣṇamāditya iva dṛkśaktyadhiṣṭhānaṃ tatsāma //4 //
GV05chupsb_u:732: atha ya eṣo 'ntar akṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate saivark |
GV05chupsb_u:737: tasya etasya tad eva rūpaṃ yad amuṣya rūpam |
GV05chupsb_u:738: yāv amuṣya geṣṇau tau tau goṣṇau |
GV05chupsb_u:740: ChUpBh_1,7.5 atha ya eṣo 'ntarakṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate /
GV05chupsb_u:746: ukthādanyat tathā yajuḥ svāhāsvadhāvaṣaḍādi sarvameva vāgyajustatsa eva /
GV05chupsb_u:752: yāvamuṣya geṣṇau parvaṇī tāvevāsyāpi cākṣuṣasya geṣṇau /
GV05chupsb_u:753: yaccāmuṣya nāmodityudgītha iti ca tadevāsya nāma /
GV05chupsb_u:759: vakṣyati hi sa ekadhā bhavati tridhā bhavatītyādi /
GV05chupsb_u:766: sa eṣa ye caitasmād arvāñco lokās teṣāṃ ceṣṭe manuṣyakāmānāṃ ceti |
GV05chupsb_u:767: tad ya ime vīṇāyāṃ gāyanty etaṃ te gāyanti |
GV05chupsb_u:769: ChUpBh_1,7.6 sa eṣa cākṣuṣaḥ puruṣo ye caitasmādādhyātmikādātmanor'vāñcor'vāggatā lokāsteṣāṃ ceṣṭe manuṣyasambandhināṃ ca kāmānām /
GV05chupsb_u:770: tatsmādya ime vīṇāyāṃ gāyanti gāyakasta etameva gāyanti /
GV05chupsb_u:771: yasmādīśvaraṃ gāyanti tasmātte dhanasanayo dhanalābhayuktā dhanavanta utyarthaḥ //6 //
GV05chupsb_u:773: atha ya etad evaṃ vidvān sāma gāyaty ubhau sa gāyati |
GV05chupsb_u:774: so 'munaiva sa eṣa ye cāmuṣmāt parāñco lokās tāṃś cāpnoti devakāmāṃś ca ||
GV05chupsb_u:775: ChUpBh_1,7.7 atha ya etadevaṃ vidvānyathoktaṃ devamudgīthaṃ vidvānsāma
GV05chupsb_u:777: tasyaivaṃvidaḥ phalamucyateso 'munaivā'dityena sa eṣa ye cāmuṣmātparāñco
GV05chupsb_u:780: athānenaiva ye caitasmād arvāñco lokās tāṃś cāpnoti manuṣyakāmāṃś ca |
GV05chupsb_u:781: tasmād u haivaṃvid udgātā brūyāt || ChUp_1,7.8 ||
GV05chupsb_u:783: eṣa hy eva kāmāgānasyeṣṭe ya evaṃ vidvān sāma gāyati sāma gāyati ||
GV05chupsb_u:786: tasmādu haivaṃvidudgātā brūyādyajamānaṃ kamiṣṭaṃ te tava kāmamāgāyānīti /
GV05chupsb_u:787: eṣa hi yasmādudgātā kāmāgānasyodgānena kāmaṃ sampādayitumīṣṭe samartha ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:788: ko 'sau?ya evaṃ vidvānsāma gāyati sāma gāyati /
GV05chupsb_u:792: trayo hodgīthe kuśalā babhūvuḥ śilakaḥ śālāvatyaś caikitāyano dālbhyaḥ pravāhaṇo jaivalir iti |
GV05chupsb_u:793: te hocur udgīthe vai kuśalāḥ smo hantodgīthe kathāṃ vadāma iti ||
GV05chupsb_u:798: udgītha udgīthajñānaṃ prati kuśalā nipuṇā babhūvuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:799: kasmiṃściddeśe kāle ca nimitte vā sametānāmityabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:802: ke te traya ityāha-śilako nāmataḥ śalāvato 'patyaṃ śālāvatyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:805: pravāhaṇo nāmato jīvalasyāpatyaṃ jaivalirityete trayaste hocuranyonyamudgīthe vai kuśalā nipuṇā iti prasiddhāḥ smaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:806: ato hanta yadyanumatirbhavatāmudgītha udgīthajñānanimittāṃ kathāṃ vicāraṇāṃ pakṣapratipakṣopanyāsena vadāmo vādaṃ kurma ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:817: tatra rājñaḥ prāgalbhyopapatteḥ sa ha pravāhaṇo
GV05chupsb_u:823: sa ha śilakaḥ śālāvatyaś caikitāyanaṃ dālbhyam uvāca hanta tvā pṛcchānīti

GV05chupsb_u:2355: guhyā gopyā rahasyā evā'deśā lokadvārīyādividhaya upāsanāni ca
GV05chupsb_u:2358: madhvetadādityasya madhye kṣobhata iva samāhitadṛṣṭerdṛśyate sañcalatīva
GV05chupsb_u:2366: ChUpBh_3,5.4 te vā ete yathoktā rohitādirūpaviśeṣā rasānāṃ rasāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2367: keṣāṃ rasānāmityāha-vedā hi yasmāllokaniṣyandatvātsārā iti rasāsteṣāṃ rasānāṃ karmabhāvamāpannānāmapyete rohitādiviśeṣā rasā ityantasārabhūtā
GV05chupsb_u:2369: tathāmṛtānāmamṛtāni vedā hyamṛtā nityatvāteṣāmetāni rohitādīni rūpāṇyamṛtāni /
GV05chupsb_u:2374: tad yat prathamam amṛtaṃ tad vasava upajīvanty agninā mukhena |
GV05chupsb_u:2375: na vai devā aśnanti na pibanti |
GV05chupsb_u:2384: annādyaṃ pratyahamupajīvyamānaṃ śarīrasthitikaraṃ yadbhavati raso hyevamātmakaḥ sarvaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2393: kathaṃ tarhi, etadeva rūpamabhilakṣyādhunā bhogāvasaro nāsmākamiti buddhvābhisaṃviśantyudāsate
GV05chupsb_u:2398: sa ya etad evam amṛtaṃ veda vasūnām evaiko bhūtvāgninaiva mukhenaitad evāmṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā tṛpyati
GV05chupsb_u:2404: prācīdiggataraśmināḍīsaṃsthatāṃ vasudevabhogyatāṃ tadvidaśca vasubhiḥ sahaikatāṃ gatvāgninā mukenopajīvanaṃ darśanamātreṇa tṛptiṃ svabhogāvasara udyamanaṃ tatkālāpāye ca saṃveśanaṃ veda so 'pi vasuvatsarvaṃ tathaivānubhavati //3 //
GV05chupsb_u:2406: sa yāvad ādityaḥ purastād udetā paścād astam etā vasūnām eva tāvad ādhipatyaṃ svārājyaṃ paryetā ChUpBh_3,6.4 kiyantaṃ kālaṃ vidvāṃstadamṛtamupajīvatītyucyate - sa vidvānyāvadādityaḥ purastātprācyāṃ diśyudetā paścātpratīcyāmastametā tāvadvasūnāṃ bhogakālastāvantameva kālaṃ vasūnāmādhipatyaṃ svārājyaṃ paryatā parito gantā bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2407: na yathā candramaṇḍalasthaḥ kevalakarmī paratantro devānāmannabhūtaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2411: atha yad dvitīyam amṛtaṃ tad rudrā upajīvantīndreṇa mukhena |
GV05chupsb_u:2412: na vai devā aśnanti na pibanti |
GV05chupsb_u:2416: sa ya etad evam amṛtaṃ veda rudrāṇām evaiko bhūtvendreṇaiva mukhenaitad evāmṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā tṛpyati
GV05chupsb_u:2419: ChUpBh_3,7.1-3 athā yaddvitīyamamṛtaṃ tadrudrā upajīvantītyādi samānam //1-2-3 //
GV05chupsb_u:2421: sa yāvad ādityaḥ purastād udetā paścād astam etā dvis tāvad dakṣiṇata udetottarato 'stam etā rudrāṇām eva tāvad ādhipatyaṃ svārājyaṃ paryetā ||
GV05chupsb_u:2422: ChUpBh_3,7.4 sa yāvadādityaḥ purastādudetā paścādastametā dvistāvattato dviguṇaṃ kālaṃ dakṣiṇata udetottarato 'stametā rudrāṇāṃ tāvadbhogakālaḥ //4//
GV05chupsb_u:2425: atha yat tṛtīyam amṛtaṃ tad ādityā upajīvanti varuṇena mukhena |
GV05chupsb_u:2426: na vai devā aśnanti na pibanti |
GV05chupsb_u:2430: sa ya etad evam amṛtaṃ vedādityānām evaiko bhūtvā varuṇenaiva mukhenaitad evāmṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā tṛpyati |
GV05chupsb_u:2433: sa yāvad ādityo dakṣiṇata udetottarato 'stam etā dvis tāvat paścād udetā purastād astam etādityānām eva tāvad ādhipatyaṃ svārājyaṃ paryetā ||
GV05chupsb_u:2436: atha yac caturtham amṛtaṃ tan maruta upajīvanti somena mukhena |
GV05chupsb_u:2437: na vai devā aśnanti na pibanti |
GV05chupsb_u:2441: sa ya etad evam amṛtaṃ veda marutām evaiko bhūtvā somenaiva mukhenaitad evāmṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā tṛpyati
GV05chupsb_u:2444: sa yāvad ādityaḥ paścād udetā purastād astam etā dvis tāvad uttarata udetā dakṣiṇato 'stam etā marutām eva tāvad ādhipatyaṃ svārājyaṃ paryetā ||
GV05chupsb_u:2447: atha yat pañcamam amṛtaṃ tat sādhyā upajīvanti brahmaṇā mukhena |
GV05chupsb_u:2448: na vai devā aśnanti na pibanti |
GV05chupsb_u:2452: sa ya etad evam amṛtaṃ veda sādhyānām evaiko bhūtvā brahmaṇaiva mukhenaitad evāmṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā tṛpyati |
GV05chupsb_u:2455: sa yāvad āditya uttarata udetā dakṣiṇato 'stam etā dvis tāvad ūrdhvam udetārvāg astam etā sādhyānām eva tāvad ādhipatyaṃ svārājyaṃ paryetā ||
GV05chupsb_u:2464: udayaśca nāma savitustannivāsināṃ prāṇināṃ cakṣugocarāpattistadatyayaṣcastamanaṃ na paramārthata udayāstamane staḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2465: tannivāsināṃ ca prāṇināmabhāve tānprati tenaiva mārgeṇa gacchannapi naivodetā nāstameteti cakṣurgocarāpattestadatyayasya cābhāvāt /
GV05chupsb_u:2466: tathāmarāvatyāḥ sakāśāddviguṇaṃ kālaṃ saṃyamanī purī vasatyatastannivāsinaḥ prāṇinaḥ prati dakṣiṇata ivodetyuttarato 'stametītyucyate 'smadbuddhiṃ cāpekṣya /
GV05chupsb_u:2469: yadāmarāvatyāṃ madhyāhnagataḥ savitā tadā saṃyamanyāmudyandṛśyate tatra madhyāhnagato vāruṇyāmudyandṛśyate,
GV05chupsb_u:2471: ilāvṛtavāsināṃ sarvataḥ parvataprākāranivāritādityaraśmīnāṃ savitordhva ivodetāvagistametā dṛśyate /
GV05chupsb_u:2477: atha tata ūrdhva udetya naivodetā nāstam etaikala eva madhye sthātā |
GV05chupsb_u:2480: prāṇijātānyātmani saṃhṛtyātha tatastasmādanantaraṃ prāṇyanugrahakālādūrdhvaḥ sannātmanyudetyodgamya yānpratyudeti teṣāṃ prāṇināmabhāvātsvātmastho naivodetā nāstametaikalo 'dvitīyo 'navayavo
GV05chupsb_u:2482: tatra kaścidvidvānvasvādisamānacaraṇo rohitādyamṛtabhogabhāgī yathoktakrameṇa svātmānaṃ savitāramātmatvenopetya samāhitaḥ sannetaṃ mantraṃ dṛṣṭvotthito 'nyasmai pṛṣṭavate jagāda /
GV05chupsb_u:2483: yatastvamāgato brahmalokātkiṃ tatrāpyahorātrābhyāṃ parivartamānaḥ savitā prāṇināmāyuḥ kṣapayati yathehāsmākamityevaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ pratyāha /
GV05chupsb_u:2484: tattatra yathā pṛṣṭe yathokte cārtha eṣa śloko bhavati tanokto yogineti śrutervacanamidam START ChUp 3,11.2
GV05chupsb_u:2489: ChUpBh_3,11.2 na vai tatra yato 'haṃ brahmalokādāgatastasminna vai tatraitadasti yatpṛcchasi
GV05chupsb_u:2490: na hi tatra nimloco 'stamagamatsavitā na codiyāyodgataḥ kutaścitkadācana
GV05chupsb_u:2493: he devāḥ sākṣiṇo yūyaṃ śṛṇuta yathā mayoktaṃ satyaṃ vacastena steyanāhaṃ brahmaṇā brahmasvarūpeṇa mā virādhiṣi mā virudhyeyamaprāptirbrahmaṇā mama mā bhūdityarthaḥ //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:2495: na ha vā asmā udeti na nimlocati |
GV05chupsb_u:2497: ya etām evaṃ brahmopaniṣadaṃ veda || ChUp_3,11.3 ||
GV05chupsb_u:2498: ChUpBh_3,11.3 satyaṃ tenoktamityāha śrutiḥ-na ha vā asmai
GV05chupsb_u:2499: yathoktabrahmavide nodeti na nimlocati nāstameti kiṃ tu brahmavide 'smai
GV05chupsb_u:2500: sakṛddivā haiva sadaivāharbhavati svayañjyotiṣṭvādya etāṃ yathoktāṃ brahmopaniṣadaṃ vedaguhyaṃ veda /
GV05chupsb_u:2501: evaṃ tantreṇa vaṃśāditrayaṃ pratyamṛtasambandhaṃ ca yaccānyadavocāmaivaṃ jānātītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2507: tad dhaitad uddālakāyāruṇaye jyeṣṭhāya putrāya pitā brahma provāca ||
GV05chupsb_u:2508: ChUpBh_3,11.4 taddhaitanmadhujñānaṃ brahmā hiraṇyagarbho virāje prajāpataya uvāca /
GV05chupsb_u:2510: manurikṣvākvādyābhyaḥ prajābhyaḥ provāceti vidyāṃ stauti brahmādiviśiṣṭakramāgateti /
GV05chupsb_u:2513: idaṃ vāva taj jyeṣṭhāya putrāya pitā brahma prabrūyāt praṇāyyāya vāntevāsine || ChUp_3,11.5
GV05chupsb_u:2514: ChUpBh_3,11.5 idaṃ vāva tadyathoktamanyo 'pi jyeṣṭhāya putrāya sarvapriyārhāya brahma prabrūyāt
GV05chupsb_u:2518: yady apy asmā imām adbhiḥ parigṛhītāṃ dhanasya pūrṇāṃ dadyād etad eva tato bhūya iti || ChUp_3,11.6
GV05chupsb_u:2521: kasmātpunastīrthasaṅkocanaṃ vidyāyā niṣkrayārthamācāryāya dhanasya pūrṇāṃ sampannāṃ bhogopararaṇairnāsāvasya niṣkrayo yasmāttato 'pi dānādetadeva yanmadhuvidyādānaṃ bhūyo bahutaraphalamityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2525: gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ yad idam kiñca |
GV05chupsb_u:2527: vāg vā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ gāyati ca trāyate ca || ChUp_3,12.1 ||
GV05chupsb_u:2528: ChUpBh_3,12.1 yata evamatiśayaphalaiṣā brahmavidyātaḥ sā prakārāntareṇāpi vaktavyeti gāyatrī vā ityādyārabhyate /
GV05chupsb_u:2531: satsvanekeṣu cchandaḥsu gāyatryā eva brahmajñānadvāratayopādānaṃ prādhānyāt /
GV05chupsb_u:2532: somāharaṇāt itaracchandokṣarāharaṇenetaracchandovyāptyā ca sarvasavanavyāpakatvācca yajñe prādhānyaṃ gāyatryāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2533: gāyatrīsāratvācca brāhmaṇasya mātaramiva hitvā gurutarāṃ gāyatrīṃ tato
GV05chupsb_u:2538: idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ prāmijātaṃ yatkiñca sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ vā tatsarvaṃ gāyatryeva /
GV05chupsb_u:2539: tasyāśchandomātrāyāḥ sarvabhūtatvamanupapannamiti gāyatrīkāraṇaṃ vācaṃ śabdayatyasau gaurasāvaśva iti ca trāyate ca rakṣatyamuṣmānmā bhaiṣīḥ kiṃ te bhayamutthitamityādinā sarvato bhayānnivartyamāno vācā trātaḥ syāt /
GV05chupsb_u:2540: yadvāgbhūtaṃ gāyati ca trāyate ca gāyatryeva tadgāyati ca trāyate ca vāco 'nanyatvādgāyatryāḥ
GV05chupsb_u:2543: yā vai sā gāyatrīyaṃ vāva sā yeyaṃ pṛthivī |
GV05chupsb_u:2546: ChUpBh_3,12.2 yā vai saivaṃlakṣaṇā sarvabhūtarūpā gāyatrī, iyaṃ vāva sā
GV05chupsb_u:2549: kathaṃ sarvabhūtasambandhaḥ, asyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ hi yasmātsarvaṃ sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca bhūtaṃ pratiṣṭhitametāmeva pṛthivīṃ nātiśīyate nātivartata ityetat /
GV05chupsb_u:2550: yathā gānatrāṇābhyāṃ bhūtasambandho gāyatryā evaṃ bhūtapratiṣṭhānādubhūtasambaddhā pṛthivyato gāyatrī pṛthivī //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:2552: yā vai sā pṛthivīyaṃ vāva sā yad idam asmin puruṣe śarīram |
GV05chupsb_u:2555: ChUpBh_3,12.3 yā vai sā pṛthivī gāyatrīyaṃ vāva sedameva /
GV05chupsb_u:2556: tatkiṃ, yadidamasminpuruṣe kāryakāraṇasaṅghāte jīvati śarīraṃ pārthivatvāccharīrasya /
GV05chupsb_u:2562: yad vai tat puruṣe śarīram idaṃ vāva tad yad idam asminn antaḥ puruṣe hṛdayam |
GV05chupsb_u:2565: ChUpBh_3,12.4 yadva tatpuruṣe śarīraṃ gāyatrīdaṃ vāva tat /
GV05chupsb_u:2567: kathamityāha-asminhīme prāṇāḥ pratiṣṭhitā ataḥ śarīravadgāyatrī hṛdayam /
GV05chupsb_u:2575: ChUpBh_3,12.5 saiṣā catuṣpadā ṣaḍakṣarapadā chandorūpā satī bhavati
GV05chupsb_u:2576: gāyatrī ṣaḍvidhā vāgbhūtapṛthivīśarīrahṛdayaprāṇarūpā satī ṣaḍvidhā bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:2579: tadetasminnartha etadgīyatryākhyaṃ brahma gāyatryanugataṃ gāyatrīmukhenoktamṛcāpi mantreṇābhyanūktaṃ prakāśitam //5 //
GV05chupsb_u:2581: tāvān asya mahimā tato jyāyāṃś ca puruṣaḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:2582: pādo 'sya sarvā bhūtāni tripād asyāmṛtaṃ divīti || ChUp_3,12.6 ||
GV05chupsb_u:2583: ChUpBh_3,12.6 tāvānasya gāyatryākhyasya brahmaṇaḥ samastasya mahimā vibhūtivistāraḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2584: yāvāṃścatuṣpātṣaḍvidhaśca brahmaṇo vikāraḥ pādo gāyatrīti vyākhyātaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2585: atastasmādvikāralakṣaṇādgāyatryākhyādvācārambhaṇamātrāttato jyāyānmahattaraśca paramārthasatyarūpo 'vikāraḥ pūruṣaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvapūraṇātpuri śayanācca /
GV05chupsb_u:2586: tasyāsya pādaḥ sarvā sarvāṇi bhūtāni tejobannādīni sasthāvarajaṅgamāni /
GV05chupsb_u:2588: tripādamṛtaṃ puruṣākhyaṃ samastasya gāyatryātmano divi dyotanavati svātmanyavasthitamityartha iti //6 //
GV05chupsb_u:2590: yad vai tad brahmetīdaṃ vāva tad yo 'yaṃ bahirdhā puruṣād ākāśaḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:2591: yo vai sa bahirdhā puruṣād ākāśaḥ || ChUp_3,12.7 ||
GV05chupsb_u:2592: ChUpBh_3,12.7 yadvai tat tripādamṛtaṃ gāyatrīmukhenoktaṃ brahmetīdaṃ vāva
GV05chupsb_u:2594: tadyo 'yaṃ prasiddho bahirdhā bahiḥ puruṣādākāśo bhautiko yo vai sa bahirdhā puruṣādākāśa uktaḥ //7 //
GV05chupsb_u:2596: ayaṃ vāva sa yo 'yam antaḥ puruṣa ākāśaḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:2597: yo vai so 'ntaḥ puruṣa ākāśaḥ || ChUp_3,12.8 ||
GV05chupsb_u:2598: ChUpBh_3,12.8 ayaṃ vāva sa yo 'yamantaḥ puruṣe śarīra ākāśo yo vai so
GV05chupsb_u:2601: ayaṃ vāva sa yo 'yam antarhṛdaya ākāśaḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:2603: pūrṇam apravartinīṃ śriyaṃ labhate ya evaṃ veda || ChUp_3,12.9 ||
GV05chupsb_u:2604: ChUpBh_3,12.9 ayaṃ vāva sa yo 'yamantarhṛdaye hṛdayapuṇḍarīka ākāśaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2605: kathamekasya sata ākāśasya tridhā bheda iti /
GV05chupsb_u:2607: tato 'ntaḥśarīre svapnasthānabhūte mandataraṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavati svapnānpaśyataḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2608: hṛdayasthe punarnabhasi na kañcana kāmaṃ kāmayate na kañcana svapnaṃ paśyati /
GV05chupsb_u:2614: tadetaddhārdākāśākhyaṃ brahma pūrṇaṃ sarvagataṃ na hṛdayamātraparicchinnamiti mantavyam /
GV05chupsb_u:2615: yadyapi hṛdayākāśe cetaḥ samādhīyate 'pravarti na kutaścitkvacitpravartituṃ śīlamasyetyapravarti tadanucchittidharmakam /
GV05chupsb_u:2616: yathānyāni bhūtāni paricchinnānyucchittidharmakāṇi na tathā hārdaṃ nabhaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:2617: pūrṇāmapravartinīmanucchedātmikāṃ śriyaṃ vibhūtiṃ guṇaphalaṃ labhate dṛṣṭaṃ ya evaṃ yathoktaṃ pūrṇāpravartiguṇaṃ brahma veda jānātīhaiva jīvaṃstadbhāvaṃ pratipadyata ityarthaḥ //9//
GV05chupsb_u:2620: tasya ha vā etasya hṛdayasya pañca devasuṣayaḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:2621: sa yo 'sya prāṅ suṣiḥ sa prāṇaḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:2625: tejasvy annādo bhavati ya evaṃ veda || ChUp_3,13.1 ||
GV05chupsb_u:2626: ChUpBh_3,13.1 tasya ha vā ityādinā gāyatryākhyasya brahmaṇa
GV05chupsb_u:2628: yathā loke dvārapālā rājña upāsanena vaśīkṛtā rājaprāptyarthā bhavanti tathehāpīti /
GV05chupsb_u:2630: etasyānantaranirdiṣṭasya pañca pañcasaṃkhyākā devānāṃ suṣayo devasuṣayaḥ svargalokaprāptidvāracchidrāṇi deveḥ prāṇādityādibhī rakṣyamāṇānītyato devasuṣayastasya svargalokabhavanasya hṛdayasyāsya yaḥ prāṅsuṣiḥ pūrvābhimukhasya prāggataṃ yacchidraṃ dvāraṃ sa prāṇastatsthastena dvāreṇa yaḥ sañcarati vāyuviśeṣaḥ sa prāganitīti prāṇaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2631: tenaiva sambaddhamavyatiriktaṃ taccakṣustathaiva sa ādityaḥ"ādityo ha vai bāhyaḥ prāṇaḥ"iti śruteścakṣūrūpapratiṣṭhākrameṇa hṛdi sthitaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2632: "sa ādityaḥ kasminpratiṣṭhita iti cakṣuṣi"ityādi hi vājasaneyake /
GV05chupsb_u:2634: vakṣyati ca-prāṇāya svāheti hatuṃ haviḥ sarvametattarpayatīti /
GV05chupsb_u:2637: tatastejasvyannādaścā'mayāvitvarahito bhavati ya evaṃ veda tasyaitadguṇaphalam /
GV05chupsb_u:2638: upāsanena vaśīkṛto dvārapaḥ svargalokaprāpti heturbhavatīti mukhyaṃ ca phalam //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:2640: atha yo 'sya dakṣiṇaḥ suṣiḥ sa vyānaḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:2643: tad etac chrīś ca yaśaś cety upāsīta |
GV05chupsb_u:2644: śrīmān yaśasvī bhavati ya evaṃ veda || ChUp_3,13.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:2645: ChUpBh_3,13.2 atha yo 'sya dakṣiṇaḥ suṣistatstho vāyuviśeṣaḥ sa vīryavatkarma kurvanvigṛhya vā prāṇāpānau, nānā vānitīti vyānastatsambaddhameva ca tacchrotramindriyaṃ tathā sa candramāḥ "śrotreṇa sṛṣṭā diśaśca candramāśce"ti śruteḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2647: jñānānnavataśca yaśaḥ khyātirbhavatīti yaśohetutvādyaśastvamatastābhyāṃ guṇābhyāmupāsītetyādi samānam //2 //

GV05chupsb_u:3249: ChUpBh_4,1.5,6 tadu ha tadetadīdṛśaṃ haṃsavākyamātmanaḥ kutsārūpamanyasya viduṣo raikvādeḥ praśaṃsārūpamupaśuśrāva śrutavānharmyatalastho rājā jānaśrutiḥ pautrāyaṇaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3250: tacca haṃsavākyaṃ smaranneva paunaḥ punyena rātriśeṣamativāhayāmāsa /
GV05chupsb_u:3251: tataḥ sa bandibhī rājā stutiyuktābhirvāgbhiḥ pratibodhyamāna uvāca kṣattāraṃ saṃjihāna eva śayanaṃ nidrāṃ vā parityajanneva he 'ṅga vatsāre sa sayugvānamiva raikvamāttha kiṃ mām /
GV05chupsb_u:3253: athavā sayugvānaṃ raikvamāttha gatvā mama taddidṛkṣā;tadevaśabdo
GV05chupsb_u:3255: sa ca kṣattā pratyuvāca raikvānayanakāmo rājño 'bhiprāyajño yo nu kathaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:3256: sayugvā raikva iti, rājñaivaṃ cokta ānetuṃ taccihnaṃ jñatumicchanyo nu
GV05chupsb_u:3260: sa ha kṣattānviṣya nāvidam iti pratyeyāya |
GV05chupsb_u:3261: taṃ hovāca yatrāre brāhmaṇasyānveṣaṇā tad enam arccheti || ChUp_4,1.7 ||
GV05chupsb_u:3262: ChUpBh_4,1.7 tasya smaransa ha kṣattā nagaraṃ grāmaṃ vā gatvānviṣya raikvaṃ nāvidaṃ na vyajñāsiṣamiti pratyeyāya pratyāgatavān /
GV05chupsb_u:3263: taṃ hovāca kṣattaramare yatra brāhmaṇasya brahmavida ekānte 'raṇye
GV05chupsb_u:3264: nadīpulinādau vivikte deśe 'nveṣaṇānumārgaṇaṃ bhavati tattatrainaṃ raikvamarcha ṛccha gaccha tatra mārgaṇaṃ kurvityarthaḥ //7 //
GV05chupsb_u:3267: taṃ hābhyuvāda tvaṃ nu bhagavaḥ sayugvā raikva iti |
GV05chupsb_u:3268: ahaṃ hy arā 3 iti ha pratijajñe |
GV05chupsb_u:3269: sa ha kṣattāvidam iti pratyeyāya || ChUp_4,1.8 ||
GV05chupsb_u:3270: ChUpBh_4,1.8 ityuktaḥ kṣattānviṣya taṃ vijane deśe 'dhastācchakaṭasya
GV05chupsb_u:3271: gantryāḥ pāmānaṃ kharjūṃ kaṣamāṇaṃ kaṇḍūyamānaṃ dṛṣṭvāyaṃ nūnaṃ sayugvā raikva ityupa samīpa upaviveśa vinayenopaviṣṭavān /
GV05chupsb_u:3273: tvamasi he bhagavo bhagavansayugvā raikva iti /
GV05chupsb_u:3274: evaṃ pṛṣṭo 'hamasmi hyarā 3 ara iti hānādara eva pratijajñe 'bhyupagatavān
GV05chupsb_u:3275: sa taṃ vijñāyāvidaṃ vijñātavānasmīti pratyeyāya pratyāgata ityarthaḥ //8//
GV05chupsb_u:3278: tad u ha jānaśrutiḥ pautrāyaṇaḥ ṣaṭ śatāni gavāṃ niṣkam aśvatarīrathaṃ tad ādāya praticakrame
GV05chupsb_u:3280: ChUpBh_4,2.1 tattatra ṛṣergārhasthyaṃ pratyabhiprayaṃ buddhvā dhanārthitāṃ co ha, eva jānaśrutiḥ pautrāyaṇaḥ ṣaṭśatāni gavāṃ niṣkaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:3281: kaṇṭhahāramaśvatarīrathamaśvatarībhyāṃ yuktaṃ rathaṃ tadādāya dhanaṃ gṛhītvā praticakrame raikvaṃ prati gatavān /
GV05chupsb_u:3284: raikvemāni ṣaṭ śatāni gavām ayaṃ niṣko 'yam aśvatarīrathaḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:3285: anu ma etāṃ bhagavo devatāṃ śādhi yāṃ devatām upāssa iti || ChUp_4,2.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:3286: ChUpBh_4,2.2 he raikva gavāṃ ṣaṭśatānīmāni tubhyaṃ mayā'nītānyayaṃ niṣko
GV05chupsb_u:3287: 'śvatarīrathaścāyametaddhanamādatsva bhagavo 'nuśādhi ca me māmetāṃ yāṃ ca devatāṃ tvamupāḥse taddevatopadeśena māmanuśādhītyarthaḥ //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:3289: tam u ha paraḥ pratyuvācāha hāretvā śūdra tavaiva saha gobhir astv iti |
GV05chupsb_u:3290: tad u ha punar eva jānaśrutiḥ pautrāyaṇaḥ sahasraṃ gavāṃ niṣkam aśvatarīrathaṃ duhitaraṃ tad ādāya praticakrame || ChUp_4,2.3 ||
GV05chupsb_u:3291: ChUpBh_4,2.3 tamevamuktavantaṃ rājānaṃ pratyuvāca paro raikvaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3294: hāretvā hāreṇa yuktetvā gantrī seyaṃ hāretvā gobhiḥ saha tavaivāstu tiṣṭhatu na mamāparyāptena karmārthamanena prayojanamityabhiprāyo he śūdreti /
GV05chupsb_u:3296: vidyāgrahaṇāya ca brāhmaṇasamīpopagamācchūdrasya cānadhikārātkathamidamananurūpaṃ raikveṇocyate he śūdreti /
GV05chupsb_u:3298: tenāsau śucā śrutvā raikvasya mahimānaṃ vā ādravatīti ṛṣirātmanaḥ parokṣajñatāṃ darśayañśūdretyāheti
GV05chupsb_u:3299: śūdravadvā dhanenaivainaṃ vidyāgrahaṇāyopajagāma na ca śuśrūṣayā /
GV05chupsb_u:3303: taduharṣermataṃ jñātvā punareva jānaśrutiḥ pautrāyaṇo gavāṃ sahasramadhikaṃ jāyāṃ carṣerabhimatāṃ duhitaramātmanastadādāya praticakrame krāntavān //3 //
GV05chupsb_u:3306: raikvedaṃ sahasraṃ gavām ayaṃ niṣko 'yam aśvatarīratha iyaṃ jāyāyaṃ grāmo yasminn āsse 'nv eva mā bhagavaḥ śādhīti || ChUp_4,2.4 ||
GV05chupsb_u:3307: tasyā ha mukham upodgṛhṇann uvācājahāremāḥ śūdrānenaiva mukhenālāpayiṣyathā iti |
GV05chupsb_u:3308: te haite raikvaparṇā nāma mahāvṛṣeṣu yatrāsmā uvāsa |
GV05chupsb_u:3310: ChUpBh_4,2.4,5 raikvedaṃ gavāṃ sahasramayaṃ niṣko 'yamaśvatarīratha iyaṃ jāyārthaṃ mama duhitā'nītāyaṃ ca grāmo yasminnāḥse tiṣṭhasi sa ca
GV05chupsb_u:3311: tvadarthe mayā kalpitaḥ tadetatsarvamādāyānuśādhyeva mā māṃ he bhagava ityuktastasyā jāyārthamānītāyā rājño duhiturhaiva mukhaṃ dvāraṃ vidyāyā dāne tīrthamupodgṛhṇañjānannityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3313: vidyayā vā vidyā prāha tāni tīrthāni ṣaṇmama //
GV05chupsb_u:3317: śūdreti pūrvoktānukṛtimātraṃ na tu kāraṇāntarāpekṣayā pūrvavat /
GV05chupsb_u:3318: anenaiva mukhena vidyāgrahaṇatīrthenā'lāpayiṣyathā ālāpayasīti māṃ bhāṣayasītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3319: te haite grāmā raikvaparṇā nāma vikhyātā mahāvṛṣeṣu deśeṣu yatra yeṣu grāmeṣūvāsoṣitavān raikvastānasau grāmānadādasmai raikvāya rājā /
GV05chupsb_u:3320: tasmai rājñe dhanaṃ dattavate ha kilovāca vidyāṃ sa raikvaḥ //4-5 //
GV05chupsb_u:3324: yadā vā agnir udvāyati vāyum evāpyeti |
GV05chupsb_u:3326: yadā candro 'stam eti vāyum evāpyeti || ChUp_4,3.1 ||
GV05chupsb_u:3333: yadā yasminkāle vā agnirudvāyatyudvāsanaṃ prāpnotyupaśāmyati tadāsāvagnirvāyumevāpyeti vāyusvābhāvyamapigacchati
GV05chupsb_u:3339: vāyunā hyastaṃ nīyate sūryaḥ calanasya vāyukāryatvāt /
GV05chupsb_u:3340: athavā pralaye sūryācandramasoḥ svarūpabhraṃśe tejorūpayorvāyāvevāpigamanaṃ syāt //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:3345: ChUpBh_4,3.2 tathā yadā'pa ucchuṣyantyucchoṣamāpnuvanti tadā vāyumevāpiyanti /
GV05chupsb_u:3352: sa yadā svapiti prāṇam eva vāg apy eti |
GV05chupsb_u:3356: prāṇo hy evaitān sarvān saṃvṛṅkta iti || ChUp_4,3.3 ||
GV05chupsb_u:3359: sa puruṣo yadā yasminkāle svapiti prāṇameva vāgapyeti vāyumivāgniḥ prāṇaṃ cakṣuḥ prāṇaṃ śrotraṃ prāṇaṃ manaḥ prāṇo hi yasmādevaitānvāgādīnsarvānsaṃvṛṅkta iti //3 //
GV05chupsb_u:3362: vāyur eva deveṣu prāṇaḥ prāṇeṣu || ChUp_4,3.4 ||
GV05chupsb_u:3363: ChUpBh_4,3.4 tau vā etau dvau saṃvargau saṃvarjanaguṇo vāyureva deveṣu saṃvargaḥ prāṇaḥ prāṇeṣu vāgādiṣu mukhyaḥ //4 //
GV05chupsb_u:3365: atha ha śaunakaṃ ca kāpeyam abhipratāriṇaṃ ca kākṣaseniṃ pariviṣyamāṇau brahmacārī bibhikṣe
GV05chupsb_u:3366: tasmā u ha na dadatuḥ || ChUp_4,3.5 ||
GV05chupsb_u:3369: śaunakaṃ ca śunakasyāpatyaṃ śonakaṃ kāpeyaṃ kapigotramabhipratāriṇaṃ ca nāmataḥ kakṣasenasyāpatyaṃ kākṣaseniṃ bhojanāyopaviṣṭau pariviṣyamāṇau sūpakārairbrahmacārī brahmavicchaṇḍo bibhikṣe bhikṣitavān /
GV05chupsb_u:3370: brahmacāriṇo brahmavinmānitāṃ buddhvā taṃ jijñāsamānau tasmā u bhikṣāṃ na jajaturna dattavantau ha kimayaṃ bakṣyatīti //5 //
GV05chupsb_u:3373: mahātmanaś caturo deva ekaḥ kaḥ sa jagāra bhuvanasya gopāḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:3374: taṃ kāpeya nābhipaśyanti martyā abhipratārin bahudhā vasantam |
GV05chupsb_u:3375: yasmai vā etad annaṃ tasmā etan na dattam iti || ChUp_4,3.6 ||
GV05chupsb_u:3376: ChUpBh_4,3.6 sa hovāca brahmacārī mahātmanaścatura iti dvitīyābahuvacanam
GV05chupsb_u:3380: bhuvanasya bhavantyasminbhūtānīti bhuvanaṃ bhūrādiḥ sarvo lokastasya gopā gopāyitā rakṣitā goptetyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3381: taṃ kaṃ prajāpatiṃ he kāpeya nābhipaśyanti na jānanti martyā maraṇadharmāṇo 'vivekino vā he 'bhipratārinbahudhādhyātmādhidaivatādhibhūtaprakārairvasantam /
GV05chupsb_u:3382: yasmai vā etadahanyahanyannamadanāyā'hriyate saṃskriyate ca tasmai
GV05chupsb_u:3385: tad u ha śaunakaḥ kāpeyaḥ pratimanvānaḥ pratyeyāya |
GV05chupsb_u:3386: ātmā devānāṃ janitā prajānāṃ hiraṅyadaṃṣṭro babhaso 'nasūriḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:3387: mahāntam asya mahimānam āhur anadyamāno yad anannam atti |
GV05chupsb_u:3388: iti vai vayam brahmacārin nedam upāsmahe dattāsmai bhikṣām iti ||
GV05chupsb_u:3389: ChUpBh_4,3.7 tadu ha brahmacāriṇo vacanaṃ śaunakaḥ kāpeyaḥ pratimanvāno
GV05chupsb_u:3391: gatvā cā'ha-yaṃ tvamavoco na paśyanti martyā iti taṃ vayaṃ paśyāmaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3393: kiñca devānāmagnyādīnāmātmani saṃhṛtya grasitvā punarjanitotpādayitā vāyurūpeṇādhidaivatamagnyādīnām
GV05chupsb_u:3394: adhyātmaṃ ca prāṇarūpeṇa vāgādīnāṃ prajānāṃ ca danitā /
GV05chupsb_u:3395: atha vā'tmā devānāmagnivāgādīnāṃ janitā prajānāṃ sthāvarajaṅgamānām /
GV05chupsb_u:3404: vayaṃ he brahmacārin, ā, idamevaṃ yathoktalakṣaṇaṃ brahma vayamā upāsmahe /
GV05chupsb_u:3407: kiṃ tarhi parameva brahmopāsmaha iti varṇayanti /
GV05chupsb_u:3411: te vā ete pañcānye pañcānye daśa santas tat kṛtam |
GV05chupsb_u:3412: tasmāt sarvāsu dikṣv annam eva daśa kṛtam |
GV05chupsb_u:3415: sarvam asya idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bhavaty annādo bhavati ya evaṃ veda ya evaṃ veda
GV05chupsb_u:3416: tasmā u ha daduste hi bhikṣām /
GV05chupsb_u:3417: te vai ye grasyante 'gnyādayo yaśca teṣāṃ grasitā vāyuḥ pañcānye vāgādibhyaḥ, tathānye tebhyaḥ pañcādhyātmaṃ vāgādayaḥ prāṇaśca, te sarve daśa santastatkṛtaṃ bhavati, te caturaṅka ekāya evaṃ catvāraḥ tryaṅkāyaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:3418: evaṃ trayo 'pare dvyaṅkāyaḥ evaṃ dvāvanyāvekāṅkāya evameko 'nya, ityevaṃ deśa santastatkṛtaṃ bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:3419: yata evaṃ tasmātsarvāsu dikṣu daśasvapyagnyādyā vāgādyāśca
GV05chupsb_u:3420: daśasaṃkhyāsāmānyādannameva"daśākṣarā virāḍ virāḍannam" iti hi śrutiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3423: saiṣā virāḍdaśasaṃkhyā satyannaṃ cānnādyannādinī ca kṛtatvena daśasaṃkhyayānnaṃ kṛtasaṃkhyayānnādī tayā annānnādinyā idaṃ sarvaṃ jagaddaśadiksaṃsthaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kṛtasaṃkhyābhūtayopalabdham /
GV05chupsb_u:3426: kiñcānnādaśca bhavati ya evaṃ veda yathoktadarśī /
GV05chupsb_u:3430: satyakāmo ha jābālo jabālāṃ mātaram āmantrayāṃ cakre |
GV05chupsb_u:3431: brahmacaryaṃ bhavati vivatsyāmi kiṃgotro nv aham asmīti || ChUp_4,4.1 ||
GV05chupsb_u:3432: ChUpBh_4,4.1 sarvaṃ vāgādyagnyādi cānnānnādatvasaṃstutaṃ jagadekīkṛtya ṣoḍaśadhā pravibhajya tasminbrahmadṛṣṭirvidhātavyetyārabhyate /
GV05chupsb_u:3434: satyakāmo ha nāmato haśabda aitihyārtho jabālāyā apatyaṃ jābālo jabalāṃ svāṃ mātaramāmantrayāñcakra āmantritavān /
GV05chupsb_u:3435: brahmacaryaṃ svādhyāyagrahaṇāya he bhavati vivatsyāmyācāryakule, kiṅgotro
GV05chupsb_u:3439: nāham etad veda tāta yadgotras tvam asi |
GV05chupsb_u:3440: bahv aham carantī paricāriṇī yauvane tvām alabhe |
GV05chupsb_u:3441: sāham etan na veda yadgotras tvam asi |
GV05chupsb_u:3444: sa satyakāma eva jābālo bruvīthā iti || ChUp_4,4.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:3445: ChUpBh_4,4.2 evaṃ pṛṣṭā jabālā sā hainaṃ putramuvāca-nāhametattava gotraṃ veda he tāta yadgotrastvamasi
GV05chupsb_u:3446: kasmānna vetsītyuktā'ha-bahu bhartṛgṛhe paricaryājātamatithyabhyāgatādi carantyahaṃ paricāriṇī paricarantīti paricaraṇaśīlaivāhaṃ paricaraṇacittatayā gotrādismaraṇe mama mano nābhūt /
GV05chupsb_u:3450: jabālā tu nāmāhamasmi satyakāmo nāma tvamasi sa tvaṃ satyakāma evāhaṃ jābālo 'smītyācāryāya bruvīthāḥ yadyācāryeṇa pṛṣṭa ityabhiprāyaḥ //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:3457: nāham etad veda bho yadgotro 'ham asmi |
GV05chupsb_u:3459: sā mā pratyabravīd bahv aham carantī paricariṇī yauvane tvām alabhe |
GV05chupsb_u:3460: sāham etan na veda yadgotras tvam asi |
GV05chupsb_u:3463: so 'haṃ satyakāmo jābālo 'smi bho iti || ChUp_4,4.4 ||
GV05chupsb_u:3464: ChUpBh_4,4.4 sa ha satyakāmo hāridrumataṃ haridrumato 'patyaṃ hāridrumataṃ gautamaṃ gotrata etya gatvovāca brahmacaryaṃ bhagavati pūjāvati tvayi
GV05chupsb_u:3465: vatsyāmyata upeyāmupagaccheyaṃ śiṣyatayā bhagavantamityuktavantaṃ taṃ hovāca gautamaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3466: kiṅgotro nu somyāsīti vijñātakulagotraḥ śiṣya upanetavya iti pṛṣṭaḥ pratyāha satyakāmaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3471: tasyā ahaṃ vacaḥ smarāmi so 'haṃ satyakāmo jābālo 'smi bho iti //3-4 //
GV05chupsb_u:3476: upa tvā neṣye na satyād agā iti |
GV05chupsb_u:3477: tam upanīya kṛśānām abalānāṃ catuḥśatā gā nirākṛtya uvācemāḥ somyānusaṃvrajeti |
GV05chupsb_u:3482: ChUpBh_4,4.5 taṃ hovāca gautamo naitadvaco 'brāhmaṇo viśeṣeṇa vaktumarhatyārjavārthasaṃyuktam
GV05chupsb_u:3485: ato brāhmaṇaṃ tvāmupaneṣye 'taḥ saṃskārārthaṃ homāya samidhaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:3487: catuḥśatā catvāri śatāni gavāmuvācemā gāḥ somyānusaṃvrajānugaccha /
GV05chupsb_u:3490: sa evamuktvā gā araṇyaṃ tṛṇodakabahulaṃ dvandvaṃrahitaṃ praveśya sa ha varṣagaṇaṃ dīrghaṃ provāsa proṣitavān /
GV05chupsb_u:3491: tāḥ samyaggāvo rakṣitā yadā yasminkāle sahasraṃ saṃpeduḥ saṃpannā babhūvuḥ
GV05chupsb_u:3498: ChUpBh_4,5.1 tametaṃ śraddhātapobhyāṃ siddhaṃ vāyudevatā diksaṃbandhinī tuṣṭā satyṛṣabhamanupraviśyarṣabhāpannānugrahāyātha
GV05chupsb_u:3501: praptāḥ somya sahasraṃ smaḥ pūrṇā tava pratijñātaḥ prāpaya no
GV05chupsb_u:3504: brahmaṇaś ca te pādaṃ bravāṇi iti |
GV05chupsb_u:3511: eṣa vai somya catuṣkalaḥ pādo brahmaṇaḥ prakāśavān nāma || ChUp_4,5.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:3512: ChUpBh_4,5.2 kiñcāhaṃ braṅmaṇaḥ parasya te tubhyaṃ pādaṃ bravāṇi kathayāni /
GV05chupsb_u:3513: ityuktaḥ pratyuvāca-bravītu kathayatu me mahyaṃ bhagavān /
GV05chupsb_u:3515: prācī dikkalā brahmaṇaḥ pādasya caturtho bhāgaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3516: tathā pratīcī dikkalā dakṣiṇā dikkalodīcī dikkalaiṣa vai saimya brahmaṇaḥ pādaścatuśaṣkalaścatasraḥ kalā avayavā yasya so 'yaṃ catuṣkalaḥ pādo brahmaṇaḥ prakāśavānnāma prakāśavānityavaṃ nāmābhidhānaṃ yasya /
GV05chupsb_u:3519: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prakāśavān ity upāste prakāśavān asmiṃl loke bhavati |
GV05chupsb_u:3520: prakāśavato ha lokāñ jayati ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prakāśavān ity upāste || ChUp_4,5.3 ||
GV05chupsb_u:3521: ChUpBh_4,5.3 sa yaḥ kaścidevaṃ yathoktametaṃ brahmaṇaścatuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:3522: vidvānprakāśavānityanena guṇena viśiṣṭamupāste tasyedaṃ phalaṃ prakāśavānasmin loke bhavati prakhyāto bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3523: tathādṛṣṭaṃ phalaṃ prakāśavato ha lokāndevādisaṃbandhino mṛtaḥ sañjayati prāpnoti /
GV05chupsb_u:3524: ya etameva vidvāṃścatuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prakāśavānityupāste //3//
GV05chupsb_u:3528: sa ha śvo bhūte gā abhiprasthāpayāṃ cakāra |
GV05chupsb_u:3529: tā yatrābhisāyaṃ babhūvus tatrāgnim upasamādhāya gā uparudhya samidham ādhāya paścād agneḥ prāṅ upopaviveśa || ChUp_4,6.1 ||
GV05chupsb_u:3531: sa satyākāmo ha śvobhūte paredyurnaityakaṃ nityaṃ karma kṛtvā gā
GV05chupsb_u:3533: tāḥ śanaiścarantya ācāryakulābhimukhyaḥ prasthitā yatra yasminkāle deśe
GV05chupsb_u:3535: tatrāgnimupasamādhāya gā uparudhya samidhamādhāya paścādagneḥ praṅupopaviveśa ṛṣabhavaco dhyāyan START ChUp 4,6.2
GV05chupsb_u:3538: ChUpBh_4,6.2 tamagnirabhyuvāda satyakāma 3 iti saṃbodhya, tamasau satyakāmo bhagava iti ha pratiśuśrāva prativacanaṃ dadau //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:3547: eṣa vai somya catuṣkalaḥ pādo brahmaṇo 'nantavān nāma || ChUp_4,6.3 ||
GV05chupsb_u:3548: ChUpBh_4,6.3 brahmaṇaḥ somya te pādaṃ bravāṇīti bravītu me bhagavānīti tasmai hovāca pṛthivī kalāntarikṣaṃ kalā dyauḥ kalā samudraḥ kaletyātmagocarameva darśanamagnirabravīt /
GV05chupsb_u:3549: eṣa vai somya catuṣkalaḥ pādo brahmaṇo 'nantavānnāma //3 //
GV05chupsb_u:3551: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇo 'nantavān ity upāste 'nantavān asmiṃl loke bhavati |
GV05chupsb_u:3552: anantavato ha lokāñ jayati ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇo 'nantavān ity upāste || ChUp_4,6.4 ||
GV05chupsb_u:3553: ChUpBh_4,6.4 sa yaḥ kaścidyathoktaṃ pādamanantavattvena guṇenopāste sa
GV05chupsb_u:3555: mṛtaścānantavato ha lokānsa jayati ya etamevamityādi pūrvavat //4//
GV05chupsb_u:3557: haṃsaste pādaṃ vakteti sa ha śvobhūte gā abhiprasthāpayāñcakāra tā yatrābhisāyaṃ babhūvustatrāgnimupasamādhāyā gā uparudhya samidhamādhāya paścādagneḥ prāṅupopaviveśa //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:3558: taṃ haṃsa upanipatyābhyuvāda satyakāma 3 iti bhagava iti ha pratiśuśrāva //2//
GV05chupsb_u:3571: eṣa vai somya catuṣkalaḥ pādo brahmaṇo jyotiṣmān nāma || ChUp_4,7.3 ||
GV05chupsb_u:3572: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇo jyotiṣmān ity upāste jyotiṣmān asmiṃl loke bhavati |
GV05chupsb_u:3573: jyotiṣmato ha lokāñ jayati ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇo jyotiṣmān ity upāste ChUpBh_4,7.3,4 agniḥkalā sūryaḥ kalā candraḥ kalā vidyutkalaiṣa vai somyeti jyotirviṣayameva ca darśanaṃ provācāto haṃsasyā'dityatvaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:3576: candrādityādīnāṃ jyotiṣmata eva ca mṛtvā lokāñjayati /
GV05chupsb_u:3581: sa ha śvo bhūte gā abhiprasthāpayāṃ cakāra |
GV05chupsb_u:3582: tā yatrābhisāyaṃ babhūvus tatrāgnim upasamādhāya gā uparudhya samidham ādhāya paścād agneḥ prāṅ upopaviveśa || ChUp_4,8.1 ||
GV05chupsb_u:3584: madgurudakacaraḥ pakṣī sa cāpsambandhātprāṇaḥ sa ha śvobhūta ityādi pūrvavat //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:3595: eṣa vai somya catuṣkalaḥ pādo brahmaṇa āyatanavān nāma || ChUp_4,8.3 ||
GV05chupsb_u:3596: ChUpBh_4,8.2,3 sa ca madguḥ prāṇaḥ svaviṣayameva ca darśanamuvāca prāṇaḥ kaletyādi, āyatanavānityevaṃ nāma /
GV05chupsb_u:3597: āyatanaṃ nāma manaḥ sarvakaraṇopahṛtānāṃ bhogānāṃ tadyasminpāde vidyata ityāyatanavānnāma pādaḥ //2-3 //
GV05chupsb_u:3599: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇa āyatanavān ity upāsta āyatanavān asmiṃl loke bhavati |
GV05chupsb_u:3600: āyatanavato ha lokāñ jayati ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇa āyatanavān ity upāste || ChUp_4,8.4 ||
GV05chupsb_u:3601: ChUpBh_4,8.4 taṃ pādaṃ tathaivopāste yaḥ sa āyatanavānāśrayavānasmiṃlloke
GV05chupsb_u:3610: ChUpBh_4,9.1 sa evaṃ brahmavitsanprāpa ha prāptavānācāryakulam /
GV05chupsb_u:3617: bhagavāṃs tv eva me kāme brūyāt || ChUp_4,9.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:3625: ato 'nye manuṣyebhya iti ha pratijajñe pratijñātavān /
GV05chupsb_u:3626: bhagavāṃstveva me kāme mamecchāyāṃ brūyātkimanyairuktena nāhaṃ tadgaṇayāmītyabhiprāyaḥ //2
GV05chupsb_u:3628: śrutaṃ hy eva me bhagavaddṛśebhya ācāryād dhaiva vidyā viditā sādhiṣṭhaṃ prāpatīti |
GV05chupsb_u:3630: atra ha na kiṃcana vīyāyeti vīyāyeti || ChUp_4,9.3 ||
GV05chupsb_u:3631: ChUpBh_4,9.3 kiñca śrutaṃ hi yasmānmama vidyata evāsminnarthe
GV05chupsb_u:3633: ācāryāddhaiva vidyā viditā sādhiṣṭhaṃ sādhutamatvaṃ prāpaditi prāpnotītyato bhagavāneba brūyādityukta ācāryo 'bravīttasmai tāmeva daivatairuktāṃ vidyām /
GV05chupsb_u:3634: atra ha na kiñcana ṣoḍaśakalavidyāyāḥ kiñcidekadeśamātramapi na vīyāya na vigatamityarthaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:3638: upakosalo ha vai kāmalāyanaḥ satyakāme jābāle brahmacāryam uvāsa |
GV05chupsb_u:3639: tasya ha dvādaśa vārṣāny agnīn paricacāra |
GV05chupsb_u:3640: sa ha smānyān antevāsinaḥ samāvartayaṃs taṃ ha smaiva na samāvartayati ||
GV05chupsb_u:3641: ChUpBh_4,10.1 punarbrahmavidyāṃ prakārāntareṇa vakṣyāmītyārabheta gatiṃ ca tadvido 'gnividyāṃ ca /
GV05chupsb_u:3643: pūrvavacchraddhātapasorbrahmavidyāsādhanatvapradaśranārthā-upakosalo ha vai nāmataḥ kamalasyāpatyaṃ kāmalāyanaḥ satyakāme jābāle brahmacaryamuvāsa tasya, haḥ etihyārthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3645: sa ha smā'cāryo 'nyānbrahmacāriṇaḥ svādhyāyaṃ grāhayitvā samāvartayaṃstamevopakosalamekaṃ na samāvartayati sma ha //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:3647: taṃ jāyovāca tapto brahmacārī kuśalam agnīn paricacārīt |
GV05chupsb_u:3654: ato 'smadbhaktaṃ na samāvartayatīti jñātvā tvāmagnayo mā paripravocangarhāṃ tava mā kuryuḥ
GV05chupsb_u:3656: tasmā evaṃ jāyayokto 'pi hāprocyaivānuktvaiva kiñcitpravāsāṃcakre pravasitavān //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:3661: sa ha uvāca bahava ime 'smin puruṣe kāmā nānātyāyāḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:3664: ChUpBh_4,10.3 sa hopakosalo vyādhinā mānasena duḥkhenānaśitumanaśanaṃ kartuṃ dadhre dhṛtavānmanaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:3667: sa hovāca bahavo 'neke 'sminpuruṣe 'kṛtārthe prākṛte kāmā icchāḥ kartavyaṃ prati nānātyayo 'tigamanaṃ yeṣāṃ vyādhīnāṃ kartavyacintānāṃ te nānātyayā vyādhayaḥ kartavyatāprāptinimittāni cittaduḥkhānītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3674: prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahmeti || ChUp_4,10.4 ||
GV05chupsb_u:3677: hantedānīmasmai brahmacāriṇe 'smadbhaktāya duḥkhitāya tapasvine śraddadhānāya sarve 'nuśāsmo 'nuprabravāma brahmavidyāmiti /
GV05chupsb_u:3678: evaṃ saṃpradhārya tasmai hocuruktavantaḥ prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahmeti //4 //
GV05chupsb_u:3682: kaṃ ca tu khaṃ ca na vijānāmīti |
GV05chupsb_u:3684: yad vāva kaṃ tad eva kham |
GV05chupsb_u:3685: yad eva khaṃ tad eva kam iti |
GV05chupsb_u:3686: prāṇaṃ ca hāsmai tad ākāśaṃ cocuḥ || ChUp_4,10.5 ||
GV05chupsb_u:3687: ChUpBh_4,10.5 sa hovāca brahmacārī vijānāmyahaṃ yadbhavadbhiruktaṃ prasiddhapadārthakatvātprāṇo brahmeti /
GV05chupsb_u:3688: yasminsati jīvanaṃ yadapagame ca na bhavatīti tasminvāyuviśeṣe loke rūḍho
GV05chupsb_u:3691: kaṃ ca tu khaṃ na vijānāmīti /
GV05chupsb_u:3693: kasmādbrahmacāriṇo 'jñānam?nṛnaṃ sukhasya kaṃśabdavācyasya kṣaṇapradhvaṃsitvātkhaṃśabdavācyasya cā'kāśasyācetanasya kathaṃ brahmatvamiti manyate /
GV05chupsb_u:3696: tamevamuktantaṃ brahmacāriṇaṃ te hāgnayaḥ ūcuḥ yadvāva yadeva vayaṃ kamavocāma tadeva khamākāśamityevaṃ khena viśeṣyamāṇaṃ kaṃ viṣayendrisaṃyogajātsukhānnivartitaṃ syānnīleneva viśeṣyamāṇamutpalaṃ raktādibhyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3697: yadeva khamityākāśamavocāma tadeva ca kaṃ sukhamiti jānīhi /
GV05chupsb_u:3698: evaṃ ca sukhena viśeṣyamāṇaṃ khaṃ bhautikādacetanātkhānnivartitaṃ syānnīlotpalavadeva /
GV05chupsb_u:3701: nanvākāśaṃ cetsukhena viśeṣayitumiṣṭamastvanyataradeva viśeṣaṇaṃ yadvāva kaṃ tadeva khamityatiriktamitarat
GV05chupsb_u:3702: yadeva khaṃ tadeva kamiti pūrvaviśeṣeṇaṃ vā /
GV05chupsb_u:3704: sukhenā'kāśe viśeṣite vyāvṛttirubhayorarthaprāptaiveti cetsatyamevaṃ kintu sukhena viśeṣitasyaivā'kāśasya dhyeyatvaṃ vihitaṃ na tvākāśaguṇasya viśeṣaṇasya sukhasya dhyeyatvaṃ vihitaṃ syāt /
GV05chupsb_u:3709: yadi hi sukhaguṇaviśiṣṭasya khasya dhyeyatvaṃ vivakṣitaṃ syātkaṃ khaṃ brahmeti brūyuragnayaḥ prathamam /
GV05chupsb_u:3711: kiṃ tarhi kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahmeti /
GV05chupsb_u:3712: ato brahmacāriṇo mohāpanayanāya kaṅkhaṃśabdayoritaretaraviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatva nirdeśo yukta eva yadvāva kamityādiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3713: tadetadagnibhiruktaṃ vākyārthamasmadbodhāya śrutirāha-prāṇaṃ ca hāsmai brahmacāriṇe /
GV05chupsb_u:3716: sukhaguṇavattvanirdeśāttaṃ cā'kāśaṃ sukhaguṇaviśiṣṭaṃ brahma tatsthaṃ ca prāṇaṃ brahmasamparkādeva brahmetyubhayaṃ prāṇaṃ cā'kāśaṃ ca samuccitya brahmaṇī ūcuragnaya iti //5//
GV05chupsb_u:3719: atha hainaṃ gārhapatyo 'nuśaśāsa pṛthivy agnir annam āditya iti |
GV05chupsb_u:3720: ya eṣa āditye puruṣo dṛśyate so 'ham asmi sa eva aham asmi iti ||
GV05chupsb_u:3725: tatra ya āditya eṣa puruṣo dṛśyate so 'hamasmi gārhapatyo 'gniryaśca
GV05chupsb_u:3732: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste |
GV05chupsb_u:3738: upa vayaṃ taṃ bhuñjāmo 'smiṃś ca loke 'muṣmiṃś ca |
GV05chupsb_u:3739: ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste || ChUp_4,11.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:3740: ChUpBh_4,11.2 sa yaḥ kaścidevaṃ yathoktaṃ gārhapatyamagnimannānnādatvena caturdhā pravibhaktamupāste so 'pahate vināśayati pāpakṛtyāṃ pāpaṃ karma /
GV05chupsb_u:3741: lokī lokavāṃścāsmadāyena lokenā'gneyena tadvānbhavati yathā vayamiha ca loke /
GV05chupsb_u:3742: sarvaṃ varṣaśatamāyureti prāpnoti jyogujjavalaṃ jīvati nāprakhyāta ityetat
GV05chupsb_u:3743: na cāsyāvarāśca te puruṣāścāsya viduṣaḥ santatijā ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3745: kiṃ ca taṃ vayamupabhuñjāmaḥ pālayāmo 'smiṃśca loke jīvantamamuṣmiṃśca paraloke /
GV05chupsb_u:3749: atha ha enam anvāhāryapacano 'nuśaśāsa āpo diśo nakṣatrāṇi candramā iti |
GV05chupsb_u:3750: ya eṣa candramasi puruṣo dṛṣyate so 'ham asmi sa eva aham asmi iti ||
GV05chupsb_u:3751: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste |
GV05chupsb_u:3757: upa vayaṃ taṃ bhuñjāmo 'smiṃś ca loke 'muṣmiṃś ca |
GV05chupsb_u:3758: ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste || ChUp_4,12.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:3759: ChUpBh_4,12.1,2 atha hainamanvāhāryapacano 'nuśaśāsa dakṣiṇāgnirāpo diśo nakṣatrāṇi candramā ityetā mama catasrastanavaścaturdhāhamanvāhāryapacana ātmānaṃ pravibhajyāvasthitaḥ tatra ya eṣa candramasi puruṣo dṛśyate so
GV05chupsb_u:3769: atha hainam āhavanīyo 'nuśaśāsa prāṇa ākāśo dyaur vidyud iti |
GV05chupsb_u:3770: ya eṣa vidyuti puruṣo dṛśyate so 'ham asmi sa evāham asmīti || ChUp_4,13.1
GV05chupsb_u:3771: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste |
GV05chupsb_u:3777: upa vayaṃ taṃ bhuñjāmo 'smiṃś ca loke 'muṣmiṃś ca |
GV05chupsb_u:3778: ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste || ChUp_4,13.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:3779: ChUpBh_4,13.1,2 atha hainamāhavanīyo 'nuśaśāsa prāṇa ākāśo dyaurvidyuditi
GV05chupsb_u:3781: ya eva vidyuti puruṣo dṛśyate so 'hamasmītyādi pūrvavatsāmānyāt /
GV05chupsb_u:3791: ChUpBh_4,14.1 te punaḥ sambhūyocurhepakosalaiṣā somya te tavāsmadvidyāgnividyetyarthaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:3792: ātmavidyā pūrvoktā prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahmeti ca /
GV05chupsb_u:3793: ācāryastu te gatiṃ vaktā vidyāphalaprāptaya ityuktvoparemuragnayaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3800: ko nu mānuśiśyād bho itīhāpeva nihnute |
GV05chupsb_u:3801: ime nūnam īdṛśā anyādṛśā itīhāgnīn abhyūde |
GV05chupsb_u:3802: kiṃ nu somya kila te 'vocann iti || ChUp_4,14.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:3805: ahaṃ tu te tad vakṣyāmi yathā puṣkarapalāśa āpo na śliṣyanta evam evaṃvidi pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyata iti |
GV05chupsb_u:3809: brahmavida iva somya te mukhaṃ prasannaṃ bhāti ko nu tvānuśaśāsetyuktaḥ pratyāha /
GV05chupsb_u:3810: ko nu mānuśiṣyādanuśāsanaṃ kuryādbho bhagavaṃstvayi proṣita itīhāpeva nihnute 'panihnuta iveti vyavahitena sambandho na cāpanihnute na ca yatāvadagnibhiruktaṃ bravītītyabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3811: kathamime 'gnayo mayā paricaritā uktavanto nūnaṃ yatastvāṃ dṛṣṭvā vepamānā ivedṛśā dṛśyante pūrvamanyādṛśāḥ santa itīhāgnīnabhyūde
GV05chupsb_u:3813: kiṃ nu somya kila te tubhyamavocannagnaya iti pṛṣṭa ityevamidamuktavanta ityevaṃ ha pratijajñe pratijñātavānpratīkamātraṃ kiñcinna sarvaṃ yathoktamagnibhiruktamavocat /
GV05chupsb_u:3814: yata āhā'cāryo lokānvāva pṛthivyādīnhe somya kila te 'vocanna brahma sākalyena /
GV05chupsb_u:3815: ahaṃ tu te tubhyaṃ tadbrahma yadicchasi tvaṃ śrotuṃ vakṣyāmi, śṛṇu tasya mayocyamānasya brahmaṇo jñānamāhātmyaṃ yathā puṣkarapalāśe padmapatra āpo na śilaṣyanta evaṃ yatā vakṣyāmi brahmaivaṃvidi pāpaṃ karma na śilaṣyate na sambadhyata ityevamuktavatyācārya āhopakosalo bravītu me bhagavāniti tasmai hovācā'cāryaḥ //2-3 //
GV05chupsb_u:3818: ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyata eṣa ātmeti hovāca |
GV05chupsb_u:3820: tad yady apy asmin sarpir vodakaṃ vā siñcati vartmanī eva gacchati ||
GV05chupsb_u:3823: nanvagnibhiruktaṃ vitathaṃ yata ācāryastu te gatiṃ vakteti gatimātrasya vaktetyavocanbhaviṣyadviṣayāparijñānaṃ cāgnīnam /
GV05chupsb_u:3827: etadamṛtamamaraṇadharmyavināśyata evābhayaṃ yasya hi vināśāśaṅkā tasya bhayopapattistadabhāvādabhayamata evaitadbrahma bṛhadanantamiti /
GV05chupsb_u:3828: kiñcāsya brahmaṇo 'kṣipuruṣasya māhātmyaṃ tattatra puruṣasya sthāne 'kṣiṇi
GV05chupsb_u:3829: yadyapyasminyarpirvodakaṃ vā siñcati vartmanī eva gacchati pakṣmāveva gacchati na cakṣuṣā sambandhyate padmapatreṇevodakam /
GV05chupsb_u:3830: sthānasyāpyetanmāhātmyaṃ kiṃ punaḥ sthānino 'kṣipuruṣasya nirañjanatvaṃ vaktavyamityabhiprāyaḥ START ChUp 4,15.2
GV05chupsb_u:3833: sarvāṇy enaṃ vāmāny abhisaṃyanti ya evaṃ veda || ChUp_4,15.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:3834: ChUpBh_4,15.2 etaṃ yathoktaṃ puruṣaṃ saṃyadvāma ityācakṣate /
GV05chupsb_u:3836: yasmādetaṃ sarvāṇi vāmāni vananīyāni saṃbhajanīyāni śobhanānyabhisaṃyantyabhisaṅgacchantītyataḥ saṃyadvāmaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3837: tathaivaṃvidamenaṃ sarvāṇi vāmānyabhisaṃyanti ya evaṃ veda //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:3841: sarvāṇi vāmāni nayati ya evaṃ veda || ChUp_4,15.3 ||
GV05chupsb_u:3842: ChUpBh_4,15.3 eṣa u eva vāmanīryasmādeṣa hi sarvāṇi vāmāni puṇyakarmaphalāni puṇyānurūpaṃ prāṇibhyo nayati prāpayati vahati
GV05chupsb_u:3844: viduṣaḥ phalaṃ-sarvāṇi vāmāni nayati ya evaṃ veda //3 //
GV05chupsb_u:3848: sarveṣu lokeṣu bhāti ya evaṃ veda || ChUp_4,15.4 ||

GV05chupsb_u:4144: kiṃ tarhi?prāṇā ityevā'cakṣate kathayanti yasmātprāṇo hyevaitāni sarvāṇi vāgādīni karaṇajātāni bhavatyato mukhyaṃ prāmaṃ pratyanurūpameva vāgādibhiruktamiti prakaraṇārthamupasañjihīrṣati nanu kathamidaṃ yuktaṃ cetanāvanta iva puruṣā ahaṃśreṣṭhatāyai vivadanto 'nyonyaṃ spardheranniti
GV05chupsb_u:4145: na hi cakṣurādīnāṃ vācaṃ pratyākhyāya pratyekaṃ vadanaṃ sambhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:4151: ye tāvadīśvaramabhyupagacchanti tārkikāste mana ādikāryakaramānāmādhyātmikānāṃ bāhyānāṃ ca pṛthivyādīnāmīśvarādhiṣṭhitānāmeva niyamena pravṛttimicchanti rathādivat /
GV05chupsb_u:4156: bhoktā karmaphalasambandhī dehe tadvilakṣaṇo jīva iti vakṣyāmaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4159: yathā loke puruṣā anyonyamātmanaḥ śreṣṭhatāyai vivadamānāḥ kañcidguṇaviśeṣābhijñaṃ pṛcchanti ko naḥ śreṣṭho guṇairiti /
GV05chupsb_u:4160: tenoktā ekaikaśyenādaḥ kāryaṃ sādhayitumudyacchata yenādaḥ kāryaṃ sādhyate sa vaḥ śreṣṭha ityuktāstathaivodyacchanta ātmano 'nyasya vā śreṣṭhavāṃ nirdhārayanti /
GV05chupsb_u:4162: kathaṃ nāma vidvānvāgādīnāmekaikasyābhāve 'pi jīvanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ na tu prāṇasyeti prāṇaśreṣṭhatāṃ pratipadyateti /

GV05chupsb_u:4175: prāṇasya sarvamannaṃ prāṇo 'ttā sarvasyānnasyetyevaṃ pratipattaye kalpitākhyāyikārūpādvyāvṛtya svena śrutirūpeṇā'ha-tadvā etadyatkiñcilloke prāṇibhirannamadyate 'nasya prāṇasya tadannaṃ prāṇenaiva tadadyata ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4178: tathāca sarvānnānāmatturnāmagrahaṇamitīdaṃ pratyakṣaṃ nāmāna iti sarvānnānāmattuḥ sākṣādabhidhānam
GV05chupsb_u:4179: na ha vā evaṃvidi yathoktaprāṇavidi prāṇo 'hamasmi sarvabhūtasthaḥ sarvānnānāmatteti tasminnevaṃvidi ha vai kiñcana kiñcidapi prāṇibhirādyaṃ sarvairanannamannādyaṃ na bhavati sarvamevaṃvidyannaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /

GV05chupsb_u:4194: adbhirvāsasthānīyābhiḥ purastādbhojanātpūrvamupariṣṭācca bhojanādūrdhvaṃ ca paridadhati paridhānaṃ kurvanti mukhyasya prāṇasya lambhuko sambhanaśīlo vāso ha bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:4198: bhokṣyamāṇasya bhuktavataśca yadācamanaṃ śuddhyarthaṃ vijñātaṃ tasminprāṇasya vāsa iti darśanamātramiha vidhīyate /
GV05chupsb_u:4200: yathā laukikaiḥ prāmibhiradyamānamannaṃ prāṇasyeti darśanamātraṃ tadvatkiṃ me 'nnaṃ kiṃ me vāsa ityādipraśnaprativacanayostulyatvāt /
GV05chupsb_u:4201: yadyācamanamapūrvaṃ tādarthyena kriyate tadā kṛmyādyannamapi prāṇasya bhakṣyatvena vihitaṃ syāt /
GV05chupsb_u:4202: tulyayorvijñānārthayoḥ prasnaprativacanayoḥ prakaraṇasya vijñānārthatvādardhajaratīyo nyāyo na yuktaḥ kalpayitum /
GV05chupsb_u:4203: yattu prasiddhamācamanaṃ prāyatyārthaṃ prāṇasyānagnatārthaṃ ca na bhavatītyucyate na tathā vayamācamanamubhayārthaṃ brūmaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4204: kiṃ tarhi prāyatyārthācamanasādhanabhūtā āpaḥ prāṇasya vāsa iti darśanaṃ codyata iti brūmaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:4208: vāsojñānārthavākye vāsorthāpūrvācamanavidhāne tatrānagnatārthatvadṛṣṭividhāne ca vākyabhedaḥ ācamanasya tadarthatvamanyārthatvaṃ ceti /
GV05chupsb_u:4211: tad dhaitat satyakāmo jābālo gośrutaye vaiyāghrapadyāyoktvovāca |

GV05chupsb_u:4215: taddhaitatprāṇadarśanaṃ satyakāmo jābālo gośrutaye nāmnā vaiyāghrapadyāya vyāghrapado 'patyaṃ vaiyāghrapadyastasmai gośrutyākhyāyoktvovācānyadapi vakṣyamāṇaṃ vacaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4217: brūyātprāṇavijjāyerannutpadyerannevāsminsthāṇau śākhāḥ praroheyuśca palāśāni patrāmi, kimu jīvate puruṣāya brūyāditi //3 //
GV05chupsb_u:4219: atha yadi mahaj jigamiṣet, amāvāsyāyām dīkṣitvā paurṇamāsyāṃ rātrau sarvauṣadhasya mantham dadhimadhunor upamathya jyeṣṭhāya śreṣṭhāya svāhety agnāv ājyasya hutvā manthe saṃpātam avanayet || ChUp_5,2.4 ||
GV05chupsb_u:4224: śrīmato hyarthaprāptaṃ dhanaṃ tataḥ karmānuṣṭhānaṃ tataśca devayānaṃ pitṛyāṇaṃ vā panthānaṃ pratipatsyata ityetatprayojanamurarīkṛtya mahattvaprepsoridaṃ karma na viṣayopabhogakāmasya tasyāyaṃ kālādividhirucyate-amāvāsyāyāṃ dīkṣitvā dīkṣita iva

GV05chupsb_u:4248: annena hi prāṇaḥ prāṇiti deha ityato manthadravyaṃ prāṇasyānnatvātprāṇatvena stūyate 'mo nāmāsīti

GV05chupsb_u:4331: athānu kim anu śiṣṭho 'vocathā yo hīmāni na vidyāt |

GV05chupsb_u:4337: yo hīmāni mayā pṛṣṭānyarthajātāni na vidyānna vijānītyātkathaṃ sa vidvatsvanuśiṣṭo 'smīti bruvīta /
GV05chupsb_u:4338: ityevaṃ sa śvetaketuḥ rājñā'yasta āyāsitaḥ sanpiturardhaṃ sthānameyāyā'gatavāṃstaṃ ca pituramuvācānanuśiṣyānuśāsanamakṛtvaiva mā māṃ kila bhagavānsamāvartanakāle 'bravīduktavānanu tvāśiṣamanvaśiṣaṃ tvāmiti //4 //

GV05chupsb_u:4354: aprākṣītpṛṣṭavāṃsteṣāṃ praśnānāṃ naikañcanaikamapi nāśakaṃ na śaktavānahaṃ vivaktuṃ viśeṣeṇārthato nirṇetumityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4355: sa hovāca pitā yathā mā māṃ vatsa tvaṃ tadā'gatamātra evaitānpraśnānavada uktavānasi teṣāṃ naikañcanāśakaṃ vivaktumiti tathā māṃ jānīhi,
GV05chupsb_u:4357: kathaṃ, yathāhameṣāṃ praśnānāmekañcanaikamapi na veda na jāna iti yathā tvamevāṅgaitānpraśnānna jānīṣe tathāhamapyetānna jāna ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4359: kuta etadevaṃ yato na jāne yadyahamimānpraśnānavediṣyaṃ viditavānasmi kathaṃ te tubhyaṃ priyāya putrāya samāvartanakāle purā nāvakṣyaṃ noktavānasmītyuktvā sa ha gotrato rājño jaivalerardhaṃ sthānameyāya gatavān /
GV05chupsb_u:4360: tasmai ha gautamāya prāptāyārhāmarhūṇāṃ cakāra kṛtavān /
GV05chupsb_u:4361: sa ca gautamaḥ kṛtātithya uṣitvā paredyuḥ prātaḥkāle sabhāge sabhāṃ gate rājñyudeyāya /
GV05chupsb_u:4362: bhajanaṃ bhāgaḥ pūjā sevā saha bhāgena vartamāno vā sabhāgaḥ pūjyamāno
GV05chupsb_u:4364: taṃ hovāca gautamaṃ rājā mānuṣasya bhagavangautama manuṣyasambandhino vittasya grāmādervaraṃ varaṇīyaṃ kāmaṃ vṛṇīthāḥ prārthayethāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4365: sa hovāca gautamastavaiva tiṣṭhatu rājanmānuṣaṃ vittam /
GV05chupsb_u:4366: yāmeva kumārasya mama putrasyānte samīpe vācaṃ pañcapraśnalakṣaṇāmabhāṣathā uktavānasi tāmeva vācaṃ me mahyaṃ brūhi kathayetyukto gautamena rājā sa ha kṛcchrī duḥkhī babhūva /
GV05chupsb_u:4369: taṃ ha ciraṃ vasety ājñāpayāṃ cakāra |
GV05chupsb_u:4372: yatheyaṃ na prāk tvattaḥ purā vidyā brāhmaṇān gacchati |
GV05chupsb_u:4373: tasmād u sarveṣu lokeṣu kṣatrasyaiva praśāsanam abhūd iti |
GV05chupsb_u:4375: ChUpBh_5,3.7 sa ha kṛcchrībhūto 'pratyākhyeyaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ manvāno nyāyena
GV05chupsb_u:4376: vidyā vaktavyeti matvā taṃ ha gautamaṃ ciraṃ dīrghakālaṃ vasetyevamājñāpayāñcakārā'jñaptavān
GV05chupsb_u:4377: yatpūrvaṃ pratyākhyātavānrājā vidyāṃ yacca paścācciraṃ vasetyājñaptavān,
GV05chupsb_u:4378: tannimittaṃ brāhmamaṃ kṣamāpayati hetuvacanoktyā-taṃ hovāca rājā sarvavidyo brahmaṇo 'pi sanyathā yena prakāreṇa mā māṃ he gautamāvadastvaṃ tāmeva vidyālakṣaṇāṃ vācaṃ me brūhītyajñānāttena tvaṃ jānīhi /
GV05chupsb_u:4379: tatrāsti vaktavyaṃ yathā yena prakāreṇeyaṃ vidyā prāktvatto brāhmaṇānna gacchati na gatavatī, na ca brāhmaṇā anayā vidyayānuśāsitavantaḥ,
GV05chupsb_u:4380: tathaitatprasiddhaṃ loke yatastasmādu purā pūrvaṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kṣattrasyaiva kṣattrajāterevānayā vidyayā praśāsanaṃ praśāstṛtvaṃ śiṣyāmāmabhūdbabhūva /

GV05chupsb_u:4774: tadavayavākṛtibhūyastvaṃ bhūya ityucyate retorūpeṇa yoṣito garbhaśaye
GV05chupsb_u:4780: puruṣātpuruṣo jāyate gorgavākṛtireva na jātyantarākṛtistasmādyuktaṃ tadbhūya eva bhavatīti
GV05chupsb_u:4782: pāpakarmabhirghoraivrīhiyavādibhāvaṃ pratipadyante punarmanuṣyādibhāvaṃ teṣāṃ nānuśayināmiva durniṣprataram /
GV05chupsb_u:4784: karmaṇā hi tairvrīhiyavādideha upātta iti tadupabhoganimittakṣaye vrīhyādistambadehavināśe yathākarmārjitaṃ dehāntaraṃ navaṃ navaṃ jalūkāvatsaṃkramante savijñānā eva"savijñāno bhavati
GV05chupsb_u:4786: yadyapyusaṃhṛtakaraṇāḥ santo dehāntaraṃ gacchanti tathāpi svapnavaddehāntaraprāptinimittakarmodbhāvitavāsanājñānena savijñānā eva dehāntaraṃ gacchanti /
GV05chupsb_u:4788: tathārcirādinā dhūmādinā ca gamanaṃ svapta ivodbhūtavijñānena /
GV05chupsb_u:4790: na tathānuśayināṃ vrīhyādibhāvena jātānāṃ savijñānameva retaḥ-sigyoṣiddehasambandha upapadyate
GV05chupsb_u:4791: na hi vrīhyādilavanakaṇḍanapeṣaṇādau ca savijñānānāṃ sthitirasti /
GV05chupsb_u:4793: tathā sati ghoro narakānubhava iṣṭāpūrtādikāriṇāṃ candramaṇḍalādārabhya prāpto yāvadbrāhmaṇādijanma
GV05chupsb_u:4797: dehāddehāntaraṃ pratipitsoḥ karmaṇo labdhavṛttitvākarmaṇodbhāvitena vijñānena savijñānatvaṃ yuktam /
GV05chupsb_u:4801: na tathā candramaṇḍalādavarurukṣatāṃ vṛkṣāgrādiva patatāṃ sacetanatvam /
GV05chupsb_u:4802: yathā ca mudgarādyabhihatānāṃ tadabhighātavedanānimittasaṃmūrchitapratibaddhakaraṇānāṃ svadehenaiva deśāddeśāntaraṃ nīyamānānāṃ vijñānaśūnyatā dṛṣṭā tathā candramaṇḍalānmānuṣādidehāntaraṃ pratyavarurukṣatāṃ svargabhoganimittakarmakṣayānmṛditābdehānāṃ pratibaddhakaraṇānām /
GV05chupsb_u:4807: dehabījabhūtāpsambandhāparityāgenaiva sarvāsvavasthāsu vartanta iti jalūkāvaccetanāvattvaṃ na virudhyate /
GV05chupsb_u:4809: na ca vaidikānāṃ karmaṇāṃ hiṃsāyuktatvenobhayahetutvaṃ śakyamanumātum /
GV05chupsb_u:4813: abhyupagate 'pyadharmahetutve mantrairviṣādivattadapanayopapatterna duḥkhakāryārambhakatvopapattirvaidikānāṃ karmaṇāṃ mantreṇeva viṣabhakṣaṇasyeti //6 //
GV05chupsb_u:4815: tad ya iha ramaṇīyacaraṇā abhyāśo ha yat te ramaṇīyāṃ yonim āpadyeran brāhmaṇayoniṃ vā kṣatriyayoniṃ vā vaiśyayoniṃ vā |
GV05chupsb_u:4816: atha ya iha kapūyacaraṇā abhyāśo ha yat te kapūyāṃ yonim āpadyerañ śvayonim vā sūkarayoniṃ vā caṇḍālayoniṃ vā || ChUp_5,10.7 ||
GV05chupsb_u:4817: ChUpBh_5,10.7 tattatra teṣvanuśayināṃ ya iha loke ramaṇīyaṃ śobhanaṃ caraṇaṃ śīlaṃ yeṣāṃ te ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ ramaṇīyacaraṇenopalakṣitaḥ śobhano 'nuśayaḥ puṇyaṃ karma yeṣāṃ te ramaṇīyacaraṇā ucyante /
GV05chupsb_u:4819: tenānuśayena puṇyena karmaṇā candramaṇḍale bhuktaśeṣeṇābhyāśo ha kṣiprameva /
GV05chupsb_u:4820: yaditi kriyāviśeṣaṇaṃ te ramaṇīyāṃ krauryādivarjitāṃ yonimāpadyeranprāpnuyurbrāhmaṇayoniṃ vā kṣattriyayoniṃ vā vaiśyayoniṃ vā svakarmānurūpeṇa /
GV05chupsb_u:4822: abhyāśo ha yatte kapūyāṃ yathākarma yonimāpadyerankapūyāmeva dharmasambandhavarjitāṃ jugupsitāṃ yonimāpadyeran śvayoniṃ vā sūkarayoniṃ vā svakarmānurūpeṇaiva /
GV05chupsb_u:4823: ye tu ramaṇīyacaraṇā dvijātayaste svakarmasthāścediṣṭādikāriṇaste dhūmādigatyā gacchantyāgacchanti ca punaḥ punarghaṭīyantravat /
GV05chupsb_u:4826: athaitayoḥ pathor na katareṇacana tānīmāni kṣudrāṇy asakṛdāvartīni bhūtāni bhavanti jāyasva mriyasveti |
GV05chupsb_u:4831: ChUpBh_5,10.8 yadā tu na vidyāsevino nāpīṣṭādikarma sevante tadāthaitayoḥ pathoryathoktayorarcirdhūmādilakṣaṇayorna katareṇānyatareṇacanāpi yanti tānīmāni bhūtāni kṣūdrāṇi daṃśamasakakīṭādīnyasakṛdāvartīni bhavanti /
GV05chupsb_u:4836: na tu kriyāsu bhogeṣu vā kālo 'stītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4837: etatkṣudrajantulakṣaṇaṃ tṛtīyaṃ pūrvoktau panthānāvapekṣya sthānaṃ saṃsaratām /
GV05chupsb_u:4838: yenaivaṃ dakṣiṇamārgagā api punarāgacchantyanadhikṛtānāṃ jñānakarmaṇoragamanameva dakṣiṇena patheti /
GV05chupsb_u:4841: prathamo dakṣiṇottaramārgābhyāmapākṛto dakṣiṇottarayoḥ pathorvyāvartanāpi mṛtānāmagnau prakṣepaḥ samānastato vyāvartanānye 'rcirādinā yantyanye dhūmādinā /
GV05chupsb_u:4845: amuṣya lokasyāpūraṇaṃ svaśabdenaivoktam-tenāsau loko na saṃpūryata iti /
GV05chupsb_u:4847: yasmācca janmamaraṇajanitavedanānubhavakṛtakṣaṇāḥ kṣudrajantavo dhvānte ca ghore dustare praveśitāḥ sāgara ivāgādhe 'plave nirāśāścottaraṇaṃ prati tasmāccaivaṃvidhāṃ saṃsāragatiṃ jugupseta bībhatseta ghṛṇī bhavenmā
GV05chupsb_u:4853: ete patanti catvāraḥ pañcamaś cācaraṃs tair iti || ChUp_5,10.9 ||
GV05chupsb_u:4857: brahmahā brāhmaṇasya hantā cetyete patanti catvāraḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4860: atha ha ya etān evaṃ pañcāgnīn veda na saha tair apy ācaran pāpmanā lipyate |
GV05chupsb_u:4861: śuddhaḥ pūtaḥ puṇyaloko bhavati ya evaṃ veda ya evaṃ veda || ChUp_5,10.10
GV05chupsb_u:4862: ChUpBh_5,10.10 atha ha punaryo yathoktānpañcāgnīnveda sa tairapyācaranmahāpātakibhiḥ saha na pāpmanā lipyate śuddha eva /
GV05chupsb_u:4863: tena pañcāgnidarśanena pāvito yasmātpūtaḥ puṇyo lokaḥ prājāpatyādiryasya so 'yaṃ puṇyaloko bhavati ya evaṃ veda yathoktaṃ samastaṃ pañcabhiḥ praśnaiḥ pṛṣṭamarthajātaṃ veda /
GV05chupsb_u:4867: prācīnaśāla aupamanyavaḥ satyayajñaḥ pauluṣir indradyumno bhāllaveyo janaḥ śārkarākṣyo buḍila āśvatarāśvis te haite mahāśālā mahāśrotriyāḥ sametya mīmāṃsāṃ cakruḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:4868: ko na ātmā kiṃ brahmeti || ChUp_5,11.1 ||
GV05chupsb_u:4869: ChUpBh_5,11.1 dakṣiṇena pathā gacchatāmannabhāva utkastaddevānāmannaṃ taṃ devā bhakṣayantīti
GV05chupsb_u:4879: pañcāpi te haite mahāśālā mahāgṛhasthā vistīrṇābhiḥ śālābhiryuktāḥ sampannā ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4881: ta evaṃbhūtāḥ santaḥ sametya saṃbhūya kvacinmīmāṃsā vicāraṇāṃ cakruḥ kṛtavanta ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4885: abhedenā'tmaiva brahma brahmaivā'tmetyevaṃ sarvātmā vaiśvānaro brahma sa ātmetyetatsiddhaṃ bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:4889: uddālako vai bhagavanto 'yam āruṇiḥ saṃpratīmam ātmānaṃ vaiśvānaram adhyeti |
GV05chupsb_u:4892: ChUpBh_5,11.2 te ha mīmāṃsanto 'pi niścayamalabhamānāḥ sampādayāñcakruḥ sampāditavantaḥ ātmana upadeṣṭāram /
GV05chupsb_u:4893: uddālako vai prasiddho nāmato bhagavantaḥ pūjāvanto
GV05chupsb_u:4901: ChUpBh_5,11.3 sa ha tāndṛṣṭvaiva teṣāmāgamanaprayojanaṃ buddhvā sampādayāñcakāra /
GV05chupsb_u:4903: prakṣyanti māṃ vaiśvānaramime mahāśālā mahāśrotriyāstebhyo 'haṃ na sarvamiva pṛṣṭaṃ pratipatsye vaktuṃ notsahe /
GV05chupsb_u:4907: aśvapatir vai bhagavanto 'yaṃ kaikeyaḥ saṃpratīmam ātmānaṃ vaiśvānaram adhyeti |
GV05chupsb_u:4911: aśvapatirvai nāmato bhagavanto 'yaṃ kekayasyāpatyaṃ kaikeyaḥ samprati
GV05chupsb_u:4914: tebhyo ha prāptebhyaḥ pṛthag arhāṇi kārayāṃ cakāra |
GV05chupsb_u:4916: na me steno janapade na kadaryo na madyapaḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:4917: nānāhitāgnir nāvidvān na svairī svairiṇī kutaḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:4919: yāvad ekaikasmā ṛtvije dhanaṃ dāsyāmi tāvad bhagavadbhyo dāsyāmi |
GV05chupsb_u:4922: yena haivārthena puruṣaś caret taṃ haiva vadet |
GV05chupsb_u:4929: ChUpBh_5,11.5,6,7 tebhyo ha rājā prāptebhyaḥ pṛthakpṛthagarhāṇyarhaṇāni purohitairbhṛtyaiśca kārayāñcakāra kāritavān /
GV05chupsb_u:4930: sa hānyedyū rājā prātaḥ sañjihāna uvāca vinayenopagamyaitaddhanaṃ matta upādaddhvamiti /
GV05chupsb_u:4931: taiḥ pratyākhyāto mayi doṣaṃ paśyanti nūnaṃ yato na pratigṛhṇanti matto dhanamiti manvāna ātmanaḥ sadvṛttatāṃ pratipipādayiṣannāha /
GV05chupsb_u:4932: na me mama janapade stenaḥ parasvahartā vidyate /
GV05chupsb_u:4938: ata eva svairiṇī kuto duṣṭacāriṇī na sambhavatītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4939: taiśca na vayaṃ dhanenārdhina ityukta āha-alpaṃ matvaite dhanaṃ na
GV05chupsb_u:4942: tadarthaṃ kḷptaṃ dhanaṃ mayā yāvadekaikasmai yathoktamṛtvije dhanaṃ dāsyāmi tāvatpratyekaṃ bhagavadbhyo 'pi dāsyāmi /
GV05chupsb_u:4943: vasantu bhagavantaḥ paśyantu ca mama yāgamityuktāste hocuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4944: yena haivārthena prayojanena yaṃ prati caredgacchetpuruṣastaṃ haivārthaṃ vadet /
GV05chupsb_u:4949: prātarvo yuṣmabhyaṃ prativaktāsmi prativākyaṃ dātāsmītyuktāste ha rājño
GV05chupsb_u:4950: 'bhiprāyajñāḥ samitpāṇayaḥ samidbhārahastā aparedyuḥ pūrvāhne rājānaṃ praticakramire gatavantaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:4951: yata evaṃ mahāśālā mahāśrotriyā brāhmaṇāḥ santo mahāśālatvādyabhimānaṃ hitvā samidbhārahastā jātito hīnaṃ rājānaṃ vidyārthino vinayenopajagmuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4958: aupamanyava kaṃ tvam ātmānam upāssa iti |
GV05chupsb_u:4959: divam eva bhagavo rājann iti hovāca |
GV05chupsb_u:4960: eṣa vai sutejā ātmā vaiśvānaro yaṃ tvam ātmānam upāsse |
GV05chupsb_u:4961: tasmāt tava sutaṃ prasutam āsutaṃ kule dṛśyate || ChUp_5,12.1 ||
GV05chupsb_u:4962: ChUpBh_5,12.1 sa kathamuvācetyāha-aupamanyava he kamātmānaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ
GV05chupsb_u:4966: "yadvettha tena mopasīda tatasta ūrdhvaṃ vakṣyāmī"ti nyāyadarśanāt /
GV05chupsb_u:4967: anyatrāpyācāryasya apratibhānavati śiṣye pratibhotpādanārthaḥ praśno dṛṣṭo
GV05chupsb_u:4969: divameva dyulokameva vaiśvānaramupāse bhagavo rājanniti hovāca /
GV05chupsb_u:4970: eṣa vai sutejāḥ śobhanaṃ tejo yasya so 'yaṃ sutejā iti prasiddho
GV05chupsb_u:4971: vaiśvānara ātmā'tmano 'vayavabhūtatvādyaṃ tvamātmānamātmaikadeśamupāḥse tasmātsutejaso vaiśevānarasyopāsanāttava sutamabhiṣutaṃ somarūpaṃ karmaṇi
GV05chupsb_u:4972: prasutaṃ prakarṣeṇa ca sutamāsutaṃ cāhargaṇādiṣu tava kule dṛśyate 'tīva
GV05chupsb_u:4976: atty annaṃ paśyati priyam bhavaty asya brahmavarcasaṃ kule ye etam evam ātmānaṃ vaiśvānaram upāste |
GV05chupsb_u:4977: mūdhā tv eṣa ātmana iti hovāca |
GV05chupsb_u:4978: mūrdhā te vyapatiṣyad yan māṃ nāgamiṣya iti || ChUp_5,12.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:4979: ChUpBh_5,12.2 atsyannaṃ dīptāgniḥ sanpaśyasi ca putrapautrādi priyamiṣṭam
GV05chupsb_u:4980: anyo 'pyattyannaṃ paśyati ca priyaṃ bhavatyasya sutaṃ prasutamāsutamityādikarmitvaṃ;brahmavarcasaṃ kule yaḥ kaścidetaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:4982: mūrdhā tvātmano vaiśvānarasyaiṣa na samasto vaiśvānaraḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4983: ataḥ samastabuddhyā vaiśvānarasyopāsanānmūrdhā śiraste viparītagrāhimo vyapatiṣyadvipatitamabhaviṣyat
GV05chupsb_u:4989: prācīnayogya kaṃ tvam ātmānam upāssa iti |
GV05chupsb_u:4990: ādityam eva bhagavo rājann iti hovāca |
GV05chupsb_u:4991: eṣa vai viśvarūpa ātmā vaiśvānaro yaṃ tvam ātmānam upāste |
GV05chupsb_u:4992: tasmāt tava bahu viśvarūpaṃ kule dṛśyate || ChUp_5,13.1 ||
GV05chupsb_u:4993: ChUpBh_5,13.1 atha hovāca satyayajñaṃ pauluṣiṃ he prācīnayogya kaṃ tvamātmānamupāsta ityādityameva bhagavo rājanniti hovāca /
GV05chupsb_u:4995: sarvāṇi rūpāṇi hi tvāṣṭrāṇi yato 'to vā viśvarūpa ādityastadupāsanāttava
GV05chupsb_u:5000: atty annaṃ paśyati priyaṃ bhavaty asya brahmavarcasaṃ kule ya etam evam ātmānaṃ vaiśvānaram upāste |
GV05chupsb_u:5001: cakṣuṣ ṭv etad ātmana iti hovāca |
GV05chupsb_u:5002: andho 'bhaviṣyo yan māṃ nāgamiṣya iti || ChUp_5,13.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:5003: ChUpBh_5,13.2 kiñca tvāmanu pravṛtto 'śvatarībhyāṃ yukto ratho 'śvatarīratho dāsīniṣko dāsībhiryukto niṣko hāro dāsīniṣkaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5006: tasya samastabuddhyopāsanādandho 'bhaviṣyaścakṣurhīno 'bhavi ṣyo yanmāṃ nā'gamiṣya iti pūrvavat //2//
GV05chupsb_u:5010: vaiyāghrapadya kaṃ tvam ātmānam upāssa iti |
GV05chupsb_u:5011: vāyum eva bhagavo rājann iti hovāca |
GV05chupsb_u:5012: eṣa vai pṛthagvartmātmā vaiśvānaro yaṃ tvam ātmānam upāsse |
GV05chupsb_u:5013: tasmāt tvāṃ pṛthag balaya āyanti pṛthag rathaśreṇayo 'nuyanti ||
GV05chupsb_u:5014: ChUpBh_5,14.1 atha hovācendradyumnaṃ bhāllaveyaṃ vaiyāghrapadya kaṃ tvamātmānamupāḥsa ityādi samānam /
GV05chupsb_u:5015: pṛthagvartmā nānā vartmāni yasya vāyorāvahodvahādibhirbhedairvartamānasya so 'yaṃ pṛthagvartmā vāyuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5016: tasmātpṛthagvartmātmano vaiśvānarasyopāsanātpṛthaṅnānādikkāstvāṃ balayo vasrānnādilakṣaṇā balaya āyantyāgacchanti /
GV05chupsb_u:5020: atty annaṃ paśyati priyaṃ bhavaty asya brahmavarcasaṃ kule ya etam evam ātmānaṃ vaiśvānaram upāste |
GV05chupsb_u:5021: prāṇas tv eṣa ātmana iti hovāca |
GV05chupsb_u:5022: prāṇas ta udakramiṣyad yan māṃ nāgamiṣya iti || ChUp_5,14.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:5024: praṇastveṣa ātmana iti hovāca prāṇaste tavodakramiṣyadutkrānto
GV05chupsb_u:5029: śārkarākṣya kaṃ tvam ātmānam upāssa iti |
GV05chupsb_u:5030: ākāśam eva bhagavo rājann iti hovāca |
GV05chupsb_u:5031: eṣa vai bahula ātmā vaiśvānaro yaṃ tvam ātmānam upasse |
GV05chupsb_u:5032: tasmāt tvaṃ bahulo 'si prajayā ca dhanena ca || ChUp_5,15.1 ||
GV05chupsb_u:5036: bahulaguṇopāsanācca tvaṃ bahulo 'si prajayā ca putrapautrādilakṣaṇayā
GV05chupsb_u:5040: atty annaṃ paśyati priyaṃ bhavaty asya brahmavarcasaṃ kule ya etam evam ātmānaṃ vaiśvānaram upāste |
GV05chupsb_u:5041: saṃdehas tv eṣa ātmana iti hovāca |
GV05chupsb_u:5042: saṃdehas te vyaśīryad yan māṃ nāgamiṣya iti || ChUp_5,15.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:5043: ChUpBh_5,15.2 sandehastveṣa sandeho madhyamaṃ śarīraṃ vaiśvānarasya /
GV05chupsb_u:5044: diherupacayārthatvānmāṃsarudhirāsthyādibhiśca bahulaṃ śarīraṃ tatsandehaste tava śarīraṃ vyaśīryacchīrṇamabhaviṣyadyanmāṃ nā'gamiṣya iti
GV05chupsb_u:5048: vaiyāghrapadya kaṃ tvam ātmānam upāssa iti |

GV05chupsb_u:5050: eṣa vai rayir ātmā vaiśvānaro yaṃ tvam ātmānam upāsse |

GV05chupsb_u:5058: atty annaṃ paśyati priyaṃ bhavaty asya brahmavarcasaṃ kule ya etam evam ātmānaṃ vaiśvānaram upāste |
GV05chupsb_u:5059: bastis tv eṣa ātmana iti hovāca |

GV05chupsb_u:5066: gautama kaṃ tvam ātmānam upassa iti |

GV05chupsb_u:5068: eṣa vai pratiṣṭhātmā vaiśvānaro yaṃ tvam ātmānam upāsse |
GV05chupsb_u:5069: tasmāt tvaṃ pratiṣṭhito 'si prajayā ca paśubhiś ca || ChUp_5,17.1 ||
GV05chupsb_u:5071: atty annaṃ paśyati priyaṃ bhavaty asya brahmavarcasaṃ kule ya etam evam ātmānaṃ vaiśvānaram upāste |
GV05chupsb_u:5072: pādau tv etāv ātmana iti hovāca |
GV05chupsb_u:5073: pādau te vyamlāsyetāṃ yan māṃ nāgamiṣya iti || ChUp_5,17.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:5077: pādau te vyamlāsyetāṃ vimlānāvabhaviṣyatāṃ ślathībhūtau yanmāṃ nā'gamiṣya
GV05chupsb_u:5082: ete vai khalu yūyaṃ pṛthag ivemam ātmānaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vidvāṃso 'nnam attha
GV05chupsb_u:5083: yas tv etam evaṃ prādeśamātram abhivimānam ātmānaṃ vaiśvānaram upāste |
GV05chupsb_u:5084: sa sarveṣu lokeṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu sarveṣv ātmasv annam atti || ChUp_5,18.1
GV05chupsb_u:5089: yastvetamevaṃ yathoktāvayavairdyumūrdhādibhiḥ pṛthivīpādāntairviśiṣṭamekaṃ prādeśamātraṃ prādeśairdyumūrdhādibhiḥ pṛthivīpādāntairadhyātmaṃ mīyate jñāyata iti prādeśamātrām /
GV05chupsb_u:5090: mukhādiṣu vā karaṇeṣvattṛtvena mīyata iti prādeśamātraḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5092: prakarṣeṇa śāsreṇā'diśyanta iti prādeśā dyulokādaya etāvatparimāṇaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5093: śākhāntare tu mūrdhādiḥ cibukapratiṣṭha iti prādeśamātraṃ kalpayanti /
GV05chupsb_u:5096: pratyagātmatayābhivimīyate 'hamiti jñāyata ityabhivimānastametamātmānaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ viśvānnarānnayati puṇyapāpānurūpāṃ gatiṃ sarvātmaiṣa īśvaro
GV05chupsb_u:5097: vaiśvānaro viśvo nara eva vā sarvātmatvāt /
GV05chupsb_u:5098: viśvairvā naraiḥ pratyagātmatayā pravibhajya nīyata iti vaiśvānarastamevamupāste yaḥ so 'dannannādī sarveṣu lokeṣu dyulokādiṣu
GV05chupsb_u:5099: sarveṣu bhūteṣu carācareṣu sarveṣvātmasu śarīrendriyamanobuddhiṣu teṣu hyātmakalpanāvyapadeśaḥ prāṇināmannamatti vaiśvānaravitsarvātmā sannannamatti /
GV05chupsb_u:5102: tasya ha vā etasyātmano vaiśvānarasya mūrdhaiva sutejāś cakṣur viśvarūpaḥ prāṇaḥ pṛthagvartmātmā saṃdeho bahulo bastir eva rayiḥ pṛthivy eva pādāv ura eva vedir lomāṇi barhir hṛdayaṃ gārhapatyo mano 'nvāhāryapacana āsyam āhavanīyaḥ || ChUp_5,18.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:5104: yasmāttasya ha vai prakṛtasyaivaitasyā'tmano vaiśvānarasya mūrdhaiva sutejāścakṣurviśvarūpaḥ prāṇaḥ pṛthagvartmā'tmā sandeho bahulo bastireva
GV05chupsb_u:5110: hṛdayaṃ gārhapatyo hṛdayāddhi manaḥ praṇītamivānantarī bhavatyato
GV05chupsb_u:5115: tad yad bhaktaṃ prathamam āgacchet tad dhomīyam |
GV05chupsb_u:5116: sa yāṃ prathamām āhutiṃ juhuyāt tāṃ juhuyāt prāṇāya svāheti |
GV05chupsb_u:5118: ChUpBh_5,19.1 tattatraivaṃ sati yadbhaktaṃ bhojanakāla āgacchedbhojanārthaṃ taddhotavyam /
GV05chupsb_u:5120: sa bhoktā yāṃ prathamāmāhutiṃ juhuyāttāṃ kathaṃ juhutādityāha-prāṇāya
GV05chupsb_u:5127: divi tṛpyantyāṃ yat kiṃca dyauś cādityaś cādhitiṣṭhatas tat tṛpyati |
