GV05chupsb_u:5129: ChUpBh_5,19.2 prāṇe tṛpyati cakṣurādityo dyauścetyādi tṛpyati yaccānyaddyauścā'dityaśca svāmitvenādhitiṣṭhatastacca tṛpyati tasya
GV05chupsb_u:5132: tejaḥ śarīrasthā dīptirujjvalatvaṃ prāgalbhyaṃ vā, brahmavarcasaṃ vṛttasvādhyāyanimittaṃ tejaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:5135: atha yāṃ dvitīyāṃ juhuyāt tāṃ juhuyād vyānāya svāheti |
GV05chupsb_u:5140: dikṣu tṛpyantīṣu yat kiṃca diśaś candramāś cādhitiṣṭhanti tat tṛpyati |
GV05chupsb_u:5141: tasyānu tṛptiṃ tṛpyati prajayā paśubhir annādyena tejasā brahmavarcaseneti || ChUp_5,20.2
GV05chupsb_u:5142: ChUpBh_5,20.1,2 atha yāṃ dvitīyāṃ caturthīṃ pañcamīmiti samānam //1-2 //
GV05chupsb_u:5145: atha yāṃ tṛtīyāṃ juhuyāt tāṃ juhuyād apānāya svāheti |
GV05chupsb_u:5150: pṛthivyāṃ tṛpyantyāṃ yat kiṃ ca pṛthivī cāgniś cādhitiṣṭhatas tat tṛpyati
GV05chupsb_u:5151: tasyānutṛptiṃ tṛpyati prajayā paśubhir annādyena tejasā brahmavarcaseneti
GV05chupsb_u:5154: atha yāṃ caturthīṃ juhuyāt tāṃ juhuyāt samānāya svāheti |
GV05chupsb_u:5159: vidyuti tṛpyantyāṃ yat kiṃ ca vidyuc ca parjanyaś cādhitiṣṭhatas tat tṛpyati |
GV05chupsb_u:5160: tasyānu tṛptiṃ tṛpyati prajayā paśubhir annādyena tejasā brahmavarcaseneti || ChUp_5,22.2
GV05chupsb_u:5163: atha yām pañcamīṃ juhuyāt tāṃ juhuyāt udānāya svāheti |
GV05chupsb_u:5165: udāne tṛpyati tvak tṛpyati tvaci tṛpyantyāṃ vāyus tṛpyati |
GV05chupsb_u:5167: ākāśe tṛpyati yat kiṃca vāyuś cākāśaś cādhitiṣṭhatas tat tṛpyati |
GV05chupsb_u:5168: tasyānu tṛptiṃ tṛpyati prajayā paśubhir annādyena tejasā brahmavarcaseneti || ChUp_5,23.2
GV05chupsb_u:5171: sa ya idam avidvān agnihotraṃ juhoti yathāṅgārān apohya bhasmani juhuyāt tādṛk tat syāt || ChUpBh_5,24.1 sa yaḥ kaścididaṃ vaiśvānaradarśanaṃ yathoktamavidvānsannagnihotraṃ prasiddhaṃ juhoti yathāṅgārānāhutiyogyānapohyānāhutisthāne bhasmani juhuyāttādṛktattulyaṃ tasya tadagnihotrahavanaṃ syādvaiśvānaravido 'gnihotramapekṣyeti
GV05chupsb_u:5174: atha ya etad evaṃ vidvān agnihotraṃ juhoti tasya sarveṣu lokeṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu sarveṣv ātmasu hutaṃ bhavati || ChUp_5,24.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:5177: atha ya etadevaṃ vidvānagnihotraṃ juhoti tasya yathoktavaiśvānaravijñānavataḥ sarveṣu lokeṣvityādyuktārtham
GV05chupsb_u:5180: tad yatheṣīkātūlam agnau protaṃ pradūyetaivaṃ hāsya sarve pāpmānaḥ pradūyante ya etad evaṃ vidvān agnihotraṃ juhoti || ChUp_5,24.3 ||
GV05chupsb_u:5181: ChUpBh_5,24.3 kiñca tadyatheṣīkāyāstūlamagramagnau protaṃ prakṣiptaṃ pradūyeta pradahyeta kṣipramevaṃ hāsya viduṣaḥ sarvātmabhūtasya sarvānnānāmattuḥ sarve niravaśiṣṭāḥ pāpmāno dharmādharmākhyā
GV05chupsb_u:5182: anekajanmasañcitā iha ca prāgjñānotpatterjñānasahabhāvinaśca pradūyante pradahyeranvartamānaśarīrārambhakapāpmavarjaṃ, lakṣyaṃ prati mukteṣuvatpravṛttaphalatvāttasya na dāhaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5185: tasmād u haivaṃvid yady api caṇḍālāya ucchiṣṭaṃ prayacchet |
GV05chupsb_u:5186: ātmani haivāsya tad vaiśvānare hutaṃ syād iti |
GV05chupsb_u:5189: prayaccheducchiṣṭaṃ dadyātpratiṣiddhamucchiṣṭadānaṃ yadyapi kuryādātmani haivāsya caṇḍālahehasthe vaiśvānare taddhutaṃ syānnādharmanimittamiti vidyāmeva stauti /
GV05chupsb_u:5193: evaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāny agnihotram upāsata || ChUp_5,24.5 ||
GV05chupsb_u:5194: ChUpBh_5,24.5 yatheha loke kṣudhitā bubhukṣitā bālā mātaraṃ paryupāsate kadā no mātānnaṃ prayacchatītyevaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtānyannādānyevaṃvido
GV05chupsb_u:5195: 'gnihotraṃ bhojanamupāsate kadā tvasau bhokṣyata iti, jagatsarvaṃ vidvadbhojanena tṛptaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:5197: iti cchāndogyopaniṣadi pañcamādhyāyasya caturviṃśaḥ khaṇḍaḥ iti cchāndogyopaniṣadbrāhmaṇe pañcamodhyāyaḥ samāptaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:5201: taṃ ha pitovāca śvetaketo vasa brahmacaryam |
GV05chupsb_u:5202: na vai somyāsmat kulīno 'nanūcya brahmabandhur iva bhavatīti || ChUp_6,1.1
GV05chupsb_u:5204: sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma tajjalānityuktaṃ kathaṃ tasmājjagadidaṃ jāyate tasminneva ca līyate 'niti ca tenaivetyetadvaktavyam /
GV05chupsb_u:5205: anantaraṃ caikasminbhukte viduṣi sarvaṃ jagattṛptaṃ bhavatītyuktaṃ tadekatve satyātmanaḥ sarvabhūtasthasyopapadyate nā'tmabhede /
GV05chupsb_u:5206: kathaṃ ca tadekatvamiti tadartho 'yaṃ ṣaṣṭho 'dhyāya ārabhyate /
GV05chupsb_u:5208: śvetaketuriti nāmato hetyaitihyārthaḥ āruṇeyo 'ruṇasya pautra āsa babhūva
GV05chupsb_u:5209: taṃ putraṃ hā'ruṇiḥ pitā yogyaṃ vidyābhājanaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:5211: guruṃ kulasya no gatvā vasa brahmacaryam /
GV05chupsb_u:5212: na caitadyuktaṃ yadasmatkulīno he somyānanūcyānadhītya brahmabandhuriva bhavatīti brāhmaṇānbandhūnvyapadiśati na svayaṃ brāhmaṇavṛtta iti //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:5214: sa ha dvādaśavarṣa upetya caturviṃśativarṣaḥ sarvān vedān adhītya mahāmanā anūcānamānī stabdha eyāya |
GV05chupsb_u:5219: yāvaccatuviṃśativarṣo babhūva tāvatsarvānvedāṃścaturo 'pyadhītya tadarthaṃ ca buddhvā mahāmanā mahadgambhīraṃ mano yasyāsamamātmānamanyairmanyamānaṃ mano yasya so 'yaṃ mahāmanāḥ anūcānamānyanūcānamātmānaṃ manyata
GV05chupsb_u:5220: ityevaṃśīlo yaḥ so 'nūcānamānī stabdho 'praṇatasvabhāva eyāya gṛham /
GV05chupsb_u:5221: tamevaṃbhūtaṃ hā'tmano 'nanurūpaśīlaṃ stabdhaṃ māninaṃ putraṃ dṛṣṭvā pitovāca saddharmāvatāracikīrṣayā
GV05chupsb_u:5222: śvetaketo yannivadaṃ mahāmanā anūcānamānī stabdhaścāsi kaste 'tiśayaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:5223: prāpta upādhyāyāt?utāpi tamādeśamādiśyata ityādeśaḥ kevalaśāsrācāryopadeśagamyamityetadyena vā paraṃ brahmā'diśyate sa ādeśastamaprākṣyaḥ pṛṣṭavānasyācāryam //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:5225: śvetaketo yan nu somyedaṃ mahāmanā anūcānamānī stabdho 'si |
GV05chupsb_u:5226: uta tam ādeśam aprākṣyaḥ yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavaty amataṃ matam avijñātaṃ vijñātam iti |
GV05chupsb_u:5227: kathaṃ nu bhagavaḥ sa ādeśo bhavatīti || ChUp_6,1.3 ||
GV05chupsb_u:5228: ChUpBh_6,1.3 tamādeśaṃ viśinaṣṭi-yenā'deśena śrutenāśrutamapyanyacchataṃ bhavatyamataṃ matamatarkitaṃ tarkitaṃ bhavatyavijñānaṃ vijñātamaniścitaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:5230: sarvānapi vedānadhātya sarvaṃ cānyadvedyamadhigamyāpyakṛtārtha eva bhavati yāvadātmatattvaṃ na jānātītyākhyāyikāto 'vagamyate /
GV05chupsb_u:5232: nvetadaprasiddhamanyavijñānenānyadvijñātaṃ bhavatītyevaṃ manvānaḥ pṛcchati kathaṃ nu kena prakāreṇa he bhagavaḥ sa ādeśo bhavatīti //3 //
GV05chupsb_u:5234: yathā somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍena sarvaṃ mṛnmayaṃ vijñātaṃ syāt |
GV05chupsb_u:5235: vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttikety eva satyam || ChUp_6,1.4 ||
GV05chupsb_u:5236: ChUpBh_6,1.4 yathā sa ādeśo bhavati tacchṛṇu he somya /
GV05chupsb_u:5237: yathā loka ekena mṛtpiṇḍena ghaṭaśarāvādikāraṇabhūtena vijñātena sarvamanyadvikārajātaṃ mṛnmayaṃ mṛdvikārajātaṃ vijñātaṃ syāt /
GV05chupsb_u:5238: kathaṃ mṛtpiṇḍe kāraṇe vijñāte kāryamanyadvijñātaṃ syāt /
GV05chupsb_u:5244: kathaṃ tarhidaṃ loka idaṃ kāraṇamayasya vikāra iti /
GV05chupsb_u:5247: ko 'sau vikāro nāmadheyaṃ nāmaiva nāmadheyaṃ svārthe dheyapratyayaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5248: vāgālambanamātraṃ nāmaiva kevalaṃ na vikāro nāma vastvasti paramārthato mṛttiketyeva tu mṛttiketyeva tu mṛttikaiva satyaṃ vastvasti //4 //
GV05chupsb_u:5250: yathā somyaikena lohamaṇinā sarvaṃ lohamayaṃ vijñātaṃ syāt |
GV05chupsb_u:5251: vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ loham ity eva satyam || ChUp_6,1.5 ||
GV05chupsb_u:5252: ChUpBh_6,1.5 yathā saumyaikena lohamaṇinā suvarṇapiṇḍena sarvamanyadvikārajātaṃ kaṭakamukuṭakeyūrādi vijñātaṃ syāt /
GV05chupsb_u:5255: yathā somyaikena nakhanikṛntanena sarvaṃ kārṣṇāyasaṃ vijñātaṃ syāt |
GV05chupsb_u:5256: vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ kṛṣṇāyasam ity eva satyam |
GV05chupsb_u:5257: evaṃ somya sa ādeśo bhavatīti || ChUp_6,1.6 ||
GV05chupsb_u:5258: na vai nūnaṃ bhagavantas ta etad avediṣuḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:5259: yad dhy etad avediṣyan kathaṃ me nāvakṣyan |
GV05chupsb_u:5260: iti bhagavāṃs tv eva me bravītv iti |
GV05chupsb_u:5267: evaṃ somya sa ādeśo yo mayokto bhavatītyuktavati pitaryāhetaro na vai nūnaṃ bhagavantaḥ pūjāvanto guravo mama ye ta etadyadbhavaduktaṃ vastu nāvediṣurna vijñātavanto nūnam /
GV05chupsb_u:5268: yadyadi hyavediṣyan viditavanta etadvastu kathaṃ me guṇavate bhaktāyānugatāya nāvakṣyannoktavantastenāhaṃ manye na viditavanta iti /
GV05chupsb_u:5270: ato bhagavāṃstveva me mahyaṃ tadvastu yena sarvajñatvaṃ jñātena me syāttadbravītu kathayatvityuktaḥ pitovāca tathāstu saumyeti //6-7 //
GV05chupsb_u:5273: sad eva somyedam agra āsīd ekam evādvitīyam |
GV05chupsb_u:5274: tad dhaika āhur asad evedam agra āsīd ekam evādvitīyam |
GV05chupsb_u:5276: ChUpBh_6,2.1 sadeva sadityastitāmātraṃ vastu sūkṣmaṃ nirviśeṣaṃ sarvagatamekaṃ nirañjanaṃ niravayavaṃ vijñānaṃ yadavagamyate sarvavedāntebhyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5284: idānīmapīdaṃ sadeva kintu nāmarūpaviśeṣaṇavadidaṃśabdabuddhiviṣayaṃ cetīdaṃ ca bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:5286: na hi prāgutpatternāmavadrūpavadvedamiti grahītuṃ śakyaṃ vastu suṣuptakāla iva /
GV05chupsb_u:5287: yathā suṣuptādutthitaḥ sattvamātramavagacchati suṣupte sanmātrameva kevalaṃ vastviti tathā prāgutpatterityabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5288: yathedamucyate loke pūrvāhne ghaṭādi sisṛkṣuṇā kulālena mṛtpiṇḍaṃ prasāritamupalabhya grāmāntaraṃ gatvā pratyāgato 'parāhne tatraiva ghaṭaśarāvādyanekabhedabhinnaṃ kāryamupalabhya mṛdevedaṃ ghaṭaśarāvādi kevalaṃ pūrvāhne āsīditi tathehāpyucyate sadevedamagra āsīditi /
GV05chupsb_u:5292: mṛdvyatirekeṇa mṛdo yathānyadghaṭādyākāreṇa pariṇamayitṛkulālādinimittakāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tathā sadvyatirekeṇa sataḥ sahakārikāraṇaṃ dvitīyaṃ vastvantaraṃ prāptaṃ pratiṣidhyate 'dvitīyamiti nāsya dvitīyaṃ vastvantaraṃ vidyata ityadvitīyam /
GV05chupsb_u:5296: satyamevaṃ syādidānīṃ prāgutpattestu naivedaṃ kāryaṃ sadevā'sīdityabhyupagamyate vaiśeṣikaiḥ prāgutpatteḥ kāryasyāsattvābhyupagamāt /
GV05chupsb_u:5299: tattatra haitasminprāgutpattervastunirūpaṇa eke vaināśikā āhurvastu nirūpayanto 'satsadabhāvamātraṃ prāgutpatteridaṃ jagadekamevāgre 'dvitīyamāsīditi /
GV05chupsb_u:5302: yathā saccāsaditi gṛhyamāmaṃ yathābhūtaṃ tadviparītaṃ tattvaṃ bhavatīti naiyāyikāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5303: nanu sadabhāvamātraṃ prāgutpatteścedabhipretaṃ vaināśikaiḥ kathaṃ prāgutpatteridamāsīdasadekamevādvitīyaṃ ceti kālasambandhaḥ saṃkhyāsambandho 'dvitīyatvaṃ cocyate taiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5316: tatra nañ sadvākye prayuktaḥ sadvākyamevāvalambya sadvākyārthaviṣayāṃ buddhiṃ sadekamevādvitīyamidamāsīdityevaṃlakṣaṇāṃ tataḥ sadvākyārthānnivartayatyaśvārūḍha ivāśvālambano 'śvaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:5320: darśayitvā hi viparītagrahaṇaṃ tato nivartayituṃ śakyata ityarthavattvādasadādivākyasya śrautatvaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ ca siddhamityadoṣaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5324: kutas tu khalu somyaivaṃ syād iti hovāca |
GV05chupsb_u:5326: sat tv eva somyedam agra āsīd ekam evādvitīyam || ChUp_6,2.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:5328: pratiṣedhati-kutastu pramāṇātkhalu he somyaivaṃ syādasataḥ sajjāyatetyevaṃ kuto bhavenna kutaścitpramāṇādevaṃ sambhavatītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5332: ye tāvadbījāvayavā bījasaṃsthānaviśiṣṭāste 'ṅkure 'pyanuvartanta eva na teṣāmupamarde 'ṅkurajanmani
GV05chupsb_u:5333: yatpunarbījākārasaṃsthānaṃ tadbījāvayavavyatirekeṇa vastubhūtaṃ na vaināśikairabhyupagamyate yadaṅkurajanmanyupamṛdyeta /
GV05chupsb_u:5334: atha tadastyavayavavyatiriktaṃ vastubhūtaṃ tathā ca satyabhyupagamavirodhaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5342: yathā vaināśikānāṃ bījasaṃsthānarūpo 'vayavī nāsti tathāvayavā apīti
GV05chupsb_u:5344: bījāvayavānāmapi sūkṣmāvayavāstadavayavānāmapyanye sūkṣmatarāvayavā ityevaṃ prasaṅgasyānivṛtteḥ sarvatropamardānupapattiḥ /

GV05chupsb_u:5622: tataścānnopacitatvānmanaso bhautikatvameva na vaiśeṣikatantroktalakṣaṇaṃ nityaṃ niravayaṃ ceti gṛhyate /
GV05chupsb_u:5623: yadapi mano 'sya daivaṃ cakṣuriti vakṣyati tadapi na nityatvāpekṣayā kiṃ tarhi sūkṣmavyavahitaviprakṛṣṭādisarvendriyaviṣayavyāpakatvāpekṣayā
GV05chupsb_u:5628: tāsāṃ yaḥ sthaviṣṭho dhātus tan mūtraṃ bhavati |

GV05chupsb_u:5640: ChUpBh_6,5.3 tathā tejo 'śitaṃ tailaghṛtādi bhakṣitaṃ tredhā vidhīyate tasya yaḥ sthaviṣṭho dhātustadasthi bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:5643: tailaghṛtādibhakṣaṇāddhi vāgviśadā bhāṣaṇe samarthā bhavatīti prasiddhaṃ loke //3 //

GV05chupsb_u:5650: ChUpBh_6,5.4 yata evamannamayaṃ hi somya mana āpomayaḥ prāṇastejomayī vāk /
GV05chupsb_u:5651: nanu kevalānnabhakṣiṇa ākhuprabhṛtayo vāgminaḥ prāṇavantaśca tathāṃmātrabhakṣyāḥ sāmudrā mīnamakaraprabhṛtayo manasvino vāggminaśca tathā snehapānāmapi prāṇavattvaṃ cānumeyaṃ yadi santi tatra kathamannamayaṃ hi somya mana ityādyucyate /
GV05chupsb_u:5654: na hyatrivṛtkṛtamannamaśnāti kaścidāpo vātrivṛtkṛtāḥ pīyante tejo vātrivṛtkṛtamaśnāti kaścidityannādānāmākhuprabhṛtīnāṃ vāggmitvaṃ prāṇavattvaṃ cetyādyaviruddham /
GV05chupsb_u:5655: ityevaṃ pratyāyitaḥ śveketurāha-bhūya eva punareva mā māṃ bhagavānannamayaṃ hi somya mana ityādi vijñāpayatu dṛṣṭāntenāvagamayu nādyāpi mamāsminnarthe samyaṅniścayo jātaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5656: yasmāttejovannamayatvenāviśiṣṭe deha ekasminnupayujyamānānyannāpsnehajātānyaṇiṣṭhadhāturūpeṇa manaḥprāṇavāca upacinvanti svajātyanatikrameṇeti durvijñeyamityabhiprāyo 'to bhūya evetyādyāha tamevamuktavantaṃ tathāstu somyeti hovāca pitā śṛṇvatra dṛṣṭāntaṃ yathaitadupapadyate yatpṛcchasi
GV05chupsb_u:5659: dadhnaḥ somya mathyamānasya yo 'ṇimā sa ūrdhvaḥ samudīṣati |

GV05chupsb_u:5663: evam eva khalu somyānnasyāśyamānasya yo 'ṇimā sa ūrdhvaḥ samudīṣati |

GV05chupsb_u:5689: ChUpBh_6,7.1 annasya bhuktasya yo 'ṇiṣṭho dhātuḥ sa manasi śaktimadhāt sānnopacitā manasaḥ śaktiḥ ṣoḍaśadhā pravibhajya puruṣasya kalātvena nirdidikṣitā /
GV05chupsb_u:5690: tayā manasyannopacitayā śaktyā ṣoḍaśadhā pravibhaktayā saṃyuktastadvānkāryakaraṇasaṅghātalakṣaṇo jīvaviśiṣṭaḥ piṇḍaḥ puruṣaḥ ṣoḍaśakala ucyate yasyāṃ satyāṃ draṣṭā śrotā mantā boddhā kartā vijñātā sarvakriyāsamarthaḥ puruṣo bhavati hīyamānāyāṃ ca yasyāṃ sāmarthyahāniḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5693: mānasena hi balena sampannā balino dṛśyante loke, dhyānāhārāśca kecidannasya sarvātmakatvāt
GV05chupsb_u:5694: ato 'nnakṛtaṃ mānasaṃ vīryaṃ ṣoḍaśa kalā yasya puruṣasya so 'yaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:5695: ṣoḍaśakalaḥ puruṣaḥ etaccetpratyakṣīkartumicchasi pañcadaśasaṃkhyākānyahāni māśīraśanaṃ mā kārṣīḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5696: kāmamicchāto 'paḥ piba yasmānnapibato 'paste prāṇo vicchetsyate vicchedamāpatsyate yasmādāpomayo 'bvikāraḥ prāṇa ityavocāma /
GV05chupsb_u:5700: atha hainam upasasāda kiṃ bravīmi bho iti |
GV05chupsb_u:5702: sa hovāca na vai mā pratibhānti bho iti || ChUp_6,7.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:5705: atha ṣoḍaśe 'hani hainaṃ pitaramupasasādopagatavānupagamya covāca kiṃ bravīmi bho iti /
GV05chupsb_u:5706: itara āha ṛcaḥ somya yajūṃṣi sāmānyadhīṣveti /
GV05chupsb_u:5707: evamuktaḥ pitrā'ha-na vai mā māmṛgādīni mama manasi na dṛśyanta ityartho he bho bhagavanniti
GV05chupsb_u:5709: taṃ hovāca yathā somya mahato 'bhyāhitasyaiko 'ṅgāraḥ khadyotamātraḥ pariśiṣṭaḥ syāt |
GV05chupsb_u:5711: evaṃ somya te ṣoḍaśānāṃ kalānām ekā kalā atiśiṣṭā syāt |
GV05chupsb_u:5715: ChUpBh_6,7.3 evamuktavantaṃ pitā'ha-śṛṇu tatra kāraṇaṃ yena te tānyṛgādīni na pratibhāntīti (taṃ hovāca) yathā loke he somya mahato mahatparimāṇasyābhyāhitasyopacitasyendhanairagnereko 'ṅgāraḥ
GV05chupsb_u:5716: khadyotaparimāṇaḥ śāntasya pariśiṣṭo 'vaśiṣṭaḥ syādbhavettenoṅgāreṇa tato 'pi tatparimāṇādīṣadapi na bahu dahedevameva khalu somya te tavānnopacitānāṃ ṣoḍaśānāṃ kalānāmekā kalāvayavo 'tiśiṣṭāvaśiṣṭā na bahu dahedevameva khalu somya te tavānnopacitānāṃ ṣoḍaśānāṃ kalānāmekā kalāvayavo 'tiśiṣṭā syāttayā tvaṃ khadyotamātrāṅgāratulyayaitarhīdānīṃ
GV05chupsb_u:5717: vedānnānubhavasi na pratipadyase, śrutvā ca me mama vācamathāśeṣaṃ vijñāsyasyaśāna bhuṅkṣva tāvat //3 //
GV05chupsb_u:5721: taṃ ha yat kiṃ ca papraccha sarvaṃ ha pratipede || ChUp_6,7.4 ||
GV05chupsb_u:5722: ChUpBh_6,7.4 sa ha tathaivā'śa bhuktavānathānantaraṃ hainaṃ pitaraṃ
GV05chupsb_u:5723: śuśrūṣurupasasāda taṃ hopagataṃ putraṃ yatkiñcargādiṣu papraccha grantharūpamarthajātaṃ vā pitā sa śvetaketuḥ sarvaṃ ha tatpratipede ṛgādyarthato granthataśca //4 //
GV05chupsb_u:5726: yathā somya mahato 'bhyāhitasyaikam aṅgāraṃ khadyotamātraṃ pariśiṣṭaṃ taṃ tṛnair upasamādhāya prājvalayet tena tato 'pi bahu dahet || ChUp_6,7.5 ||

GV05chupsb_u:5728: samānamekamaṅgāraṃ śāntasyāgneḥ khadyotamātraṃ pariśiṣṭaṃ taṃ tṛṇaiścūrṇaiścopasamādhāya prājvalayedvardhayet
GV05chupsb_u:5731: evaṃ somya te ṣoḍaśānāṃ kalānām ekā kalātiśiṣṭābhūt |
GV05chupsb_u:5737: tad dhāsya vijajñāv iti vijajñāv iti || ChUp_6,7.6 ||
GV05chupsb_u:5738: ChUpBh_6,7.6 evaṃ somya te ṣoḍaśānāmannakalānāṃ sāmarthyarūpāṇāmekā kalātiśiṣṭābhūdatiśiṣṭā'sītpañcadaśāhānyabhuktavata ekaikenāhnaikaikā kalā candramasa ivāparapakṣe kṣīṇā sātiśiṣṭā kalā tavānnena bhuktenopasamāhitā vardhitopacitā prājvāli /
GV05chupsb_u:5740: prājvālīditi kalā tavānnena bhuktenopasamāhitā vardhitopacitā prājvāli /
GV05chupsb_u:5742: prājvālīditi pāṭhāntaraṃ tadā tenopasamāhitā svayaṃ prajvalitavatīryarthaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:5744: evaṃ vyāvṛttyanuvṛttibhyāmannāmayatvaṃ manasaḥ siddhamityupasaṃharatyannamayaṃ hi somya mana ityādi /
GV05chupsb_u:5745: yathaitanmanaso 'nnamayatvaṃ tava siddhaṃ tathā'pomayaḥ prāṇastejomayī vāgityetadapi siddhamevetyabhiprāyaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:5746: tadetaddhāsya pituruktaṃ mana ādīnāmannādimayatvaṃ vijajñau vijñātavāñśvetaketuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5750: uddālako hāruṇiḥ śvetaketuṃ putram uvāca svapnāntaṃ me somya vijānīhīti |
GV05chupsb_u:5751: yatraitat puruṣaḥ svapiti nāma satā somya tadā saṃpanno bhavati |
GV05chupsb_u:5755: ChUpBh_6,8.1 yasminmanasi jīvenā'tmanānupraviṣṭā parā devatā'darśa iva puruṣaḥ pratibimbena jalādiviṣviva ca sūryādayaḥ pratibimbaiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5757: yanmayo yatsthaśca jīvo mananadarśanaśravaṇādivyāvahārāya kalpate taduparame ca svaṃ devatārūpameva pratipadyate /
GV05chupsb_u:5758: taduktaṃ śrutyantare"dhyāyatīva lelāyatīva sadhīḥ svapno bhūtvemaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:5760: manomaya"ityādi,"svapnena śārīram" ityādi,"prāṇanneva prāṇo nāma bhavatī"tyādi ca /
GV05chupsb_u:5761: tasyāsya manaḥsthasya mana ākhyāṃ gatasya manaupaśamadvāreṇendriyaviṣayebhyo nivṛttasya yasyāṃ parasyāṃ devatāyāṃ svātmabhātāyāṃ yadavasthānaṃ tatputrāyā'cikhyāsuruddālako ha kilā'ruṇiḥ
GV05chupsb_u:5763: svapnāntaṃ svapnamadhyaṃ svapna iti darśanavṛtteḥ svapnasyā'khyā tasya madhyaṃ svapnāntaṃ suṣuptamityetat /
GV05chupsb_u:5767: tatra hyādarśāpanayane puruṣapratibimbi ādarśagato yathā svameva puruṣamapīto bhavatyevaṃ mana ādyuparame caitanyapratibimbarūpeṇa jīvenā'tmanā manasi praviṣṭā nāmarūpavyākaraṇāya parā devatā sā
GV05chupsb_u:5768: svamevā'tmānaṃ pratipadyate jīvarūpatāṃ mana ākhyāṃ hitvā /
GV05chupsb_u:5770: yatra tu suptaḥ svapnānpaśyati tatsvāpnaṃ darśanaṃ sukhaduḥkhasaṃyuktamiti puṇyāpuṇyayorhi sukhaduḥkhārambhakatvaṃ prasiddham /
GV05chupsb_u:5771: puṇyāpuṇyayoścāvidyākāmopaṣṭambhenaiva sukhaduḥkhataddarśanakāryārambhakatvamupapadyate nānyathetyavidyākāmakarmabhiḥ saṃsārahetubhiḥ saṃyukta eva svapna iti na svamapītā bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:5772: "ananvāgataṃ puṇyenānanvāgataṃ pāpena tīrṇo hi tadā sarvāñchokānhṛdayasya
GV05chupsb_u:5774: suṣupta eva svaṃ devatārūpaṃ jīvatvavinirmuktaṃ darśayiṣyāmītyāha /
GV05chupsb_u:5775: svapnāntaṃ me mama nigadato he somya vijānīhi vispaṣṭamavadhārayetyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5777: yatra yasminkāla etannāma bhavati puruṣasya svapsyataḥ /

GV05chupsb_u:5781: manasi praviṣṭaṃ mana ādisaṃsargakṛtaṃ jīvarūpaṃ parityajya svaṃ sadrūpaṃ yatparamārthasatyamapīto 'pigato bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:5786: tathā ca"gṛhītā vāggṛhītaṃ śrotraṃ gṛhītaṃ mana"ityevamādīni karaṇāni prāṇagrastāni /
GV05chupsb_u:5787: prāṇa eko 'śrānto dehe kulāye yo jāgarti tadā jīvaḥ śramāpanuttaye svaṃ devatārūpamātmānaṃ pratipadyate /
GV05chupsb_u:5788: nānyatra svarūpāvasthānācchramāpanodaḥ syāditi yuktā prasiddhirlaukikānāṃ svaṃ hyapīto bhavatīti
GV05chupsb_u:5789: dṛśyate hi loke jvarādirogagrastānāṃ tadvinirnoke svātmasthānāṃ viśramaṇaṃ tadvadihāpi syāditi yuktam /

GV05chupsb_u:5792: sa yathā śakuniḥ sūtreṇa prabaddho diśaṃ diśaṃ patitvānyatrāyatanam alabdhvā bandhanam evopaśrayate
GV05chupsb_u:5793: evam eva khalu somya tan mano diśaṃ diśaṃ patitvānyatrāyatanam alabdhvā prāṇam evopaśrayate

GV05chupsb_u:5795: ChUpBh_6,8.2 tatrāyaṃ dṛṣṭānto yathokter'the-sa yathā śakuniḥ pakṣī
GV05chupsb_u:5796: śakunighātakasya hastagatena sūtreṇa prabaddhaḥ pāśito diśaṃ diśaṃ bandhanamokṣārthī sanpratiśidiśaṃ patitvānyatra bandhanādāyatanamāśrayaṃ viśramaṇāyālabdhvāprāpya bandhanamevopaśrayate /
GV05chupsb_u:5797: evameva yathāyaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ khalu he sobhya tanmanastatprakṛtaṃ poḍaśakalamannopacitaṃ mano nirdhāritaṃ tatepraviṣṭastatsthastadupalakṣito jīvastanmana iti nirdiśyate mañcākrośanavat sa mana ākhyopādhirjīvo 'vidyākāmakarmopadiṣṭāṃ diśaṃ diśaṃ sukhaduḥkhādilakṣaṇāṃ jāgratsvapnayoḥ patitvā gatvānubhūyetyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5798: anyatra sadākhyātsvātmana āyatanaṃ viśramaṇasthānamalabdhvā prāṇameva prāṇena sarvakāryakaraṇāśrayeṇopalakṣitā prāṇa ityucyate sadākhyā parā devatā /
GV05chupsb_u:5801: prāṇo bandhanaṃ yasya manasastatprāṇabandhanaṃ hi yasmātsomya manaḥ prāṇopalakṣitadevatāśrayaṃ mana iti tadupalakṣito jīva iti //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:5804: yatraitat puruṣo 'śiśiṣati nāmāpa eva tad aśitaṃ nayante |
GV05chupsb_u:5805: tad yathā gonāyo 'śvanāyaḥ puruṣanāya ity evaṃ tad apa ācakṣate 'śanāyeti
GV05chupsb_u:5808: ChUpBh_6,8.3 evaṃ svapitināmaprasiddhidvāreṇa yajjīvasya satyasvarūpaṃ jagato mūlaṃ tatputrasya darśayitvā'hānnādikāryakāraṇaparamparayāpi jagato mūlaṃ saddidarśayiṣuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5810: pātumicchā pipāsā te aśanāpipāse aśanāpipāsayoḥ satatvaṃ vijānīhītyetat /
GV05chupsb_u:5813: tadā tasya puruṣasya kinimittaṃ nāma bhavatītyāha /
GV05chupsb_u:5814: yattatpuruṣeṇāśitamannaṃ kaṭhinaṃ potā āpo nayante dravīkṛtya rasādibhāvena vipariṇamayante tadā bhuktamannaṃ jīryati /
GV05chupsb_u:5817: tat tatra apāmaśitanetṛtvādaśanāyā iti nāma prasiddhamityetasminnarthe /
GV05chupsb_u:5818: yathā gonāyo gāṃ nayatīti gonāya ityucyate gopālaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5821: evaṃ tattadāpa ācakṣate laukikā aśanāyeti visarjanīyalopena /
GV05chupsb_u:5822: tatraivaṃ satyadbhī rasādibhāvena nītenāśitenānnena niṣpāditamidaṃ śarīraṃ vaṭakaṇikāyāmiva śuṅgo 'ṅkura utpatita udgatastamimaṃ śuṅgaṃ kāryaṃ śarīrākhyaṃ vaṭādiśuṅgavadutpatitaṃ he sobhya vijānīhi /
GV05chupsb_u:5824: śuṇvidaṃ śuṅgavatkāryatvāccharīraṃ nāmūlaṃ mūlarahitaṃ bhaviṣyatītyukta āha śvetaketuḥ //3
GV05chupsb_u:5827: evam eva khalu somyānnena śuṅgenāpo mūlam anviccha |

GV05chupsb_u:5835: aśitaṃ hyannamadbhirdravīkṛtaṃ jāṭhareṇāgninā pacyamānaṃ rasabhāvena pariṇamate /
GV05chupsb_u:5836: rasocchoṇitaṃ śoṇitānmāṃsaṃ māṃsānmedo medaso 'sthīnyasthibhyo majjā majjāyāḥ śukram /

GV05chupsb_u:6063: nikṣiptavānasyaṅga he vatsa tadāharetyuktastallavaṇamājihīrṣurha kilāvamṛśyodake na viveda na vijñātavānyathā tallavaṇaṃ, vidyamānameva sadapsu līnaṃ saṃśliṣṭamabhūtaṃ //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:6078: taṃ hovācātra vāva kila tat somya na nibhālayase 'traiva kileti ||
GV05chupsb_u:6079: ChUpBh_6,13.2 yathā vilīnaṃ lavaṇaṃ na vettha tathāpi taccakṣuṣā sparśanena ca piṇḍarūpaṃ lavaṇamagṛhyamāṇaṃ vidyata evāpsūpalabhyate copāyāntareṇetyetatputraṃ pratyāyayitumicchannāha-aṅgāsyodakasyāntādupari
GV05chupsb_u:6080: gṛhītvā'cāmetyuktvā putraṃ tathākṛtavantamuvāca kathamitītara āha lavaṇaṃ svādutaḥ iti
GV05chupsb_u:6083: yadyevamabhiprāsya parityajyaitadudakamācamyātha mopasīdathā iti taddha tathā cakāra lavaṇaṃ parityajya pitṛsamīpamājagāmetyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6084: idaṃ vacanaṃ bravaṃstallavamaṃ tasminnevodake yanmayā rātrau kṣiptaṃ śāśvannityaṃ saṃvartate vidyamānameva satsamyagvartate /
GV05chupsb_u:6086: yathedaṃ lavaṇaṃ darśanasparśanābhyāṃ pūrvaṃ gṛhītaṃ punarudake vilīnaṃ tābhyāmagṛhyamāṇamapi vidyata evopāyāntareṇa jihvayopalabhyamānatvāt /
GV05chupsb_u:6091: evamevātraiva kila vidyamānaṃ sajjaganmūlamupāyāntareṇa lavaṇāṇimavadupalapsyasa iti vākyaśeṣaḥ START ChUp 6,13.3
GV05chupsb_u:6092: sa ya eṣo 'ṇimaitad ātmyam idaṃ sarvam |
GV05chupsb_u:6096: bhūya eva mā bhagavān vijñāpayatv iti |
GV05chupsb_u:6099: yadyevaṃ lavaṇāṇimavadindriyairanupalabhyamānamapi jaganmūlaṃ sadupāyāntareṇopalabdhuṃ śakyate yadupalambhātkṛtārthaḥ syāmanupalambhāccākṛtārthaḥ syāmahaṃ tasyaivopalabdhau ka upāya ityetadbhūya eva mā bhagavānvijñāpayatu dṛṣṭāntena tathā somyeti hovāca //3//
GV05chupsb_u:6102: yathā somya puruṣaṃ gandhārebhyo 'bhinaddhākṣam ānīya taṃ tato 'tijane
GV05chupsb_u:6104: sa yathā tatra prāṅ vodaṅ vā adharāṅ vā pratyaṅ vā pradhmāyītābhinaddhākṣa ānīto 'bhinaddhākṣo visṛṣṭaḥ || ChUp_6,14.1 ||
GV05chupsb_u:6105: ChUpBh_6,14.1 yathā loke he somya puruṣaṃ yaṃ kañcidgandhārebhyo janapadebhyo 'bhinaddhākṣaṃ baddhacakṣuṣamānīya dravyahartā taskarastamabhinaddhākṣameva baddhahastamaraṇye tato 'pyatijane
GV05chupsb_u:6106: 'tigatajane 'tyantavigatajane deśe visṛjetsa tatra digbhramopeto yathā prāṅvā prāgañcanaḥ prāṅmukho, vetyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6110: tasya yathābhinahanaṃ pramucya prabrūyād etāṃ diśaṃ gandhārā etāṃ diśaṃ vrajeti |
GV05chupsb_u:6111: sa grāmād grāmaṃ pṛcchan paṇḍito medhāvī gandhārān evopasaṃpadyeta |
GV05chupsb_u:6113: tasya tāvad eva ciraṃ yāvan na vimokṣye 'tha saṃpatsya iti || ChUp_6,14.2
GV05chupsb_u:6114: ChUpBh_6,14.2 evaṃ vikrośatastasya yathābhinahanaṃ yathābandhanaṃ pramucya muktvā kāruṇikaḥ kaścidetāṃ diśamuttarato gandhārā etāṃ diśaṃ vrajeti prabrūyātsa evaṃ kāruṇikena bandhanānmokṣito grāmādgrāmāntaraṃ pṛcchanpaṇḍita upadeśavānmedhāvo paropadiṣṭagrāmapraveśamārgāvadhāraṇasamarthaḥ sangandhārānevopasampadyeta netaro mūḍhamatirdeśāntaradarśanatṛḍvā /
GV05chupsb_u:6115: yathāyaṃ dṛṣṭānto varṇitaḥ svaviṣayebhyo gandhārebhyaḥ puruṣastaskarairabhinaddhākṣo 'viveko
GV05chupsb_u:6117: praveśito duḥkhārto vikrośanbandhanebhyo mumukṣustiṣṭhati sa kathañcideva kāruṇikena kenacinmokṣitaḥ svadeśāngandhārānevā'panno nirvṛtaḥ sukhyabhūt /
GV05chupsb_u:6118: evameva sato jagadātmanaḥ svarūpāttejovannādimayaṃ dehāraṇyaṃ vātapittakapharudhiramedomāṃsāsthimajjāśukrakṛmimūtrapurīṣavacchītoṣṇādyanekadvandvasukhaduḥkhavaccedaṃ mohapaṭābhinaddhākṣo bhāryāputramitrapaśubandhvādidṛṣṭādṛṣṭānekaviṣayatṛṣṇāpāśitaḥ puṇyāpuṇyāditaskaraiḥ praveśito"'hamamuṣya putro mamaite bāndhavāḥ
GV05chupsb_u:6119: sukhyahaṃ duḥkhī mūḍhaḥ paṇḍito dhārmiko bandhumāñjāto mṛto jīrṇaḥ pāpī putro me mṛto dhanaṃ me naṣṭaṃ hā hato 'smi kathaṃ jāviṣyāmi kā me gatiḥ kiṃ me trāṇam" ityevamanekaśatasahasrānarthajālavānvikrośankathañcideva puṇyātiśayātparamakāruṇikaṃ kañcitsadbrahmātmavidaṃ vimuktabandhanaṃ brahmiṣṭhaṃ yadā'sādayati tena ca brahmavidā
GV05chupsb_u:6120: kāruṇyāddarśitasaṃsāraviṣayadoṣadarśanamārgo viraktaḥ saṃsāraviṣayebhyo nāsi tvaṃ saṃsāryamuṣya putratvādidharmavānkiṃ tarhi sadyattattvamasītyavidyāmohapaṭābhinahanānmokṣito gandhārapuruṣavacca svaṃ sadātmānamupasampadya sukhī nirvṛtaḥ syādityetamevārthamāhā'cāryavānpuruṣo
GV05chupsb_u:6121: vedeti tasyāsyaivamācāryavato muktāvidyābhinahanasya tāvadeva tāvāneva kālaściraṃ kṣepaḥ sadātmasvarūpasampatteriti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6122: kiyānkālaściramityucyate yāvanna vimokṣye na vimokṣyata ityetatpuruṣavyatyanena /
GV05chupsb_u:6124: yena karmaṇā śarīramārabdhaṃ tasyopabhogena yenāthaśabda ānantaryārthaḥ syāt /
GV05chupsb_u:6125: nanu yathā sadvijñānāntarameva dehapātaḥ satsampattiśca na bhavati karmaśeṣavaśāttathāpravṛttaphalāni prāgjñānotpatterjanmāntarasañcitānyapi karmāṇi santīti tatphalopabhogārthaṃ patite 'smiñśarīrāntaramārabdhavyam utpanne ca jñāne yāvajjīvaṃ vihitāni pratiṣiddhāni vā karmāṇi karotyeveti tatphalopabhogārthaṃ cāvaśyaṃ śarīrāntaramārabdhavyaṃ tataśca karmāṇi tataḥ śarīrāntaramiti jñānārthakyaṃ karmaṇāṃ phalavattvāt /
GV05chupsb_u:6126: atha jñānavataḥ kṣīyante karmāṇi tadā jñānaprāptisamakālameva jñānasya satsampattihetutvānmokṣaḥ syāditi śarīrapātaḥ syāt /
GV05chupsb_u:6133: viduṣa"stasya tāvadeva ciram" iti śruteḥ prāmāṇyāt /
GV05chupsb_u:6138: yāni pravṛttaphalāni karmāṇi yairvidvaccharīramārabdhaṃ teṣāmupabhogenaiva kṣayaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6141: anyāni tvapravṛttaphalānīha prāgjñānotpatterūrdhvaṃ ca kṛtāni vā kriyamāṇāni vātītajanmāntarakṛtāni vāpravṛttaphalāni jñānena dahyante prāyaścitteneva /
GV05chupsb_u:6143: ato brahmavido jīvanādiprayojanābhāve 'pi pravṛttaphalānāṃ karmaṇāmavaśyameva phalopabhogaḥ syāditi mukteṣuvattasya tāvadeva ciramiti yuktamevoktamiti yathoktadoṣacodanānupapattiḥ jñānotpatterūrdhvaṃ ca brahmavidaḥ karmābhāvamavocāma"brahmasaṃstho 'mṛtatvametī"tyatra /
GV05chupsb_u:6146: sa ya eṣo 'ṇimaitad ātmyam idaṃ sarvam |
GV05chupsb_u:6150: bhūya eva mā bhagavān vijñāpayatv iti |
GV05chupsb_u:6153: ācāryavānvidvānyena krameṇa satsampadyate taṃ kramaṃ dṛṣṭāntena bhūya eva mā bhagavānvijñāpayatviti
GV05chupsb_u:6157: puruṣaṃ somyotopatāpinaṃ jñātayaḥ paryupāsate jānāsi māṃ jānāsi mām iti |
GV05chupsb_u:6158: tasya yāvan na vāṅ manasi saṃpadyate manaḥ prāṇe prāṇas tejasi tejaḥ parasyāṃ devatāyāṃ tāvaj jānāti || ChUp_6,15.1 ||
GV05chupsb_u:6159: ChUpBh_6,15.1 puruṣaṃ he somyotopatāpinaṃ jvarādyupatāpavantaṃ jñātayo bāndhavāḥ parivāryopāsate mumūrṣuṃ jānāsi māṃ tava pitaraṃ putraṃ bhrātaraṃ veti pṛcchantastasya mumūrṣoryāvanna vāṅmanasi sampadyate manaḥ prāṇe prāṇastejasi tejaḥ parasyāṃ devatāyāmityetaduktartham //1 START ChUp 6,15.2
GV05chupsb_u:6160: atha yadāsya vāṅ manasi saṃpadyate manaḥ prāṇe prāṇas tejasi tejaḥ parasyāṃ devatāyām atha na jānāti || ChUp_6,15.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:6161: ChUpBh_6,15.2 saṃsāriṇo yo maraṇakramaḥ sa evāyaṃ viduṣo 'pi
GV05chupsb_u:6162: satsampattikrama ityetadāha parasyāṃ devatāyāṃ tejasi sampanne 'tha na jānāti /
GV05chupsb_u:6163: avidvāṃstu sata utthāya prāgbhāvitaṃ vyāghrādibhāvaṃ devamanuṣyādibhāvaṃ vā viśati /
GV05chupsb_u:6164: vidvāṃstu śāsrācāryopadeśajanitajñānadīpaprakāśitaṃ sadbrahmātmānaṃ praviśya nā'vartata ityeṣa satsampattikramaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6174: sa ya eṣo 'ṇimaitad ātmyam idaṃ sarvam |
GV05chupsb_u:6178: bhūya eva mā bhagavān vijñāpayatv iti |
GV05chupsb_u:6181: yadi mariṣyato mumukṣataśca tulyā satsampattistatra vidvānsatsampanno
GV05chupsb_u:6182: nā'vartata āvartate tvavidvānityatra kāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntena bhūya eva mā bhagavānvijñāpayatviti tathā somyeti hovāca //3//
GV05chupsb_u:6186: apahārṣīt steyam akārṣīt paraśum asmai tapateti |
GV05chupsb_u:6187: sa yadi tasya kartā bhavati tata evānṛtam ātmānaṃ kurute |
GV05chupsb_u:6191: ChUpBh_6,16.1 śṛṇu yathā somya puruṣaṃ cauryakarmaṇi sandihyamānaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:6192: nigrahāya parīkṣaṇāya votāpi hastagṛhītaṃ baddhahastamānayanti rājapuruṣāḥ
GV05chupsb_u:6200: sa yadi tasya stainyasya kartā bavati bahiścāpahnate sa evaṃbhūtastata evānṛtamanyathābhūtaṃ santamanyathā'mānaṃ kurute sa tathānṛtābhisandho
GV05chupsb_u:6201: 'nṛtenā'tmānamantardhāya vyavahitaṃ kṛtvā paraśuṃ taptaṃ mohātpratigṛhrāti sa dahyate 'tha hanyate rājapuruṣaiḥ svakṛtenānṛtābhisandhidoṣeṇa //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:6205: sa satyābhisandhaḥ satyenātmānam antardhāya paraśuṃ taptaṃ pratigṛhṇāti |
GV05chupsb_u:6208: ChUpBh_6,16.2 atha yadi tasya karmaṇo 'kartā bhavati tata eva
GV05chupsb_u:6209: satyamātmānaṃ kurute sa satyena tayā stainyākartṛtayā'tmānamantardhāya
GV05chupsb_u:6210: paraśuṃ taptaṃ pratigṛhṇāti sa satyābhisandhaḥ sanna dahyate satyavyavadhānādatha mucyate ca mṛṣābhiyoktṛbhyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6219: tad dhāsya vijajñāv iti vijajñāv iti || ChUp_6,16.3 ||
GV05chupsb_u:6221: satyavyavahitahastatalatvānnādāhyeta na dahyetetyetadevaṃ sadbrahmasatyābhisandhītarayoḥ śarīrapātakāle ca tulyāyāṃ satsampattau vidvānsatsampadya na punarvyāghradevādidehagrahaṇāyā'vartate /
GV05chupsb_u:6222: avidvāṃstu vikārānṛtābhisandhaḥ punarvyāghrādibhāvaṃ devatādibhāvaṃ vā yathākarma yathāśrutaṃ pratipadyate /
GV05chupsb_u:6223: yadātmābhisandhyanabhisandhikṛte mokṣabandhane yacca mūlaṃ jagato yadāyatanā yatpratiṣṭhāśca sarvāḥ prajā yadātmakaṃ ca sarvaṃ yaccājamamṛtamabhayaṃ śivamadvitīyaṃ tatsatyaṃ sa ātmā tavātastattvamasi he śvetaketo ityuktārthamasakṛdvākyam /
GV05chupsb_u:6225: yo 'haṃ śvetaketuruddālakasya putra iti vedā'tmānamādeśaṃ śrutvā matvā vijñāya cāśrutamamatamavijñātaṃ vijñātuṃ pitaraṃ papraccha kathaṃ nu bhagavaḥ sa ādeśo bavatīti sa eṣo 'dhikṛtaḥ śrotā mantā vijñātā
GV05chupsb_u:6226: tejobannamayaṃ kāryakāraṇasaṅghātaṃ praviṣṭā paraiva devatā nāmasvarūpavyākaraṇāyā'darśa iva puruṣaḥ sūryāduriva jalādau pratibodhitastattvamasītidṛṣṭāntairhetubhiśca tatpiturasya ha kiloktaṃ sadevāhamasmīti vijajñau vijñātavān /
GV05chupsb_u:6228: kiṃ punaratra ṣaṣṭhe vākyapramāṇena janitaṃ phalam?ātmani
GV05chupsb_u:6229: kartṛtvabhoktṛtvayoradhikṛtatvavijñānanivṛttistasya phalaṃ yaṃ vayamavocāma tvaṃśabdavācyamarthaṃ śrotuṃ mantuṃ cādhikṛtamavijñātavijñānaphalārtham /
GV05chupsb_u:6231: eṣāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ phalamihāmutra ca bhokṣye kṛteṣu vā karmasu kṛtakartavyaḥ syāmityevaṃ kartṛtvabhoktṛtvayoradhikṛto
GV05chupsb_u:6232: yadvijñānamabhūttattasya yatsajjagato mūlamekamevādvitīyaṃ tattvamasītyanena vākyena pratibuddhasya nivartate /
GV05chupsb_u:6234: na hyekasminnadvitīya ātmanyayamahamasmīti vijñāte mamedamanyadanena kartavyamidaṃ kṛtvāsya phalaṃ bhokṣya iti vā bhedavijñānamupapadyate /
GV05chupsb_u:6238: yathā ca loke pratimādiṣu viṣṇvādibuddhistadvannatu sadeva tvamiti, yadi sadeva śvetaketuḥ syātkathamātmānaṃ na vijānīyādyena tasmai tattvamasītyupadiśyate /
GV05chupsb_u:6243: tu sata eveha praveśaṃ darśayitvā tattvamasīti niraṅkuśaṃ sadātmabhāvamupadiśati /
GV05chupsb_u:6252: na hi rājā dāsastvamiti stutyaḥ syāt /
GV05chupsb_u:6253: nāpi sataḥ sarvātmana ekadeśanirodho yuktastattvamasīti deśādhipateriva grāmādhyakṣastvamiti
GV05chupsb_u:6255: nanu sadasmītibuddhimātramiha kartavyatayā codyate na tvajñātaṃ sadasīti jñāpyata iti cet
GV05chupsb_u:6258: na, ācāryavānpuruṣo veda tasya tāvadeva ciramityupadeśāt /
GV05chupsb_u:6259: yadi hi sadasmīti buddhimātraṃ kartavyatayā vidhīyate na tu tvaṃśabdavācyasya sadrūpatvameva tadā nā'cāryavānvedeti jñānopāyopadeśo vācyaḥ syāt /
GV05chupsb_u:6261: tasya tāvadeva ciramiti ca kṣepakaraṇaṃ na yuktaṃ syāt /
GV05chupsb_u:6263: na ca tattvamasītyukte nāhaṃ saditipramāṇavākyajanitā buddhīrnivartayituṃ śakyā notpanneti vā śakyaṃ vaktum /
GV05chupsb_u:6266: yattūktaṃ sadātmā sannātmānaṃ kathaṃ na jānīyāditi /
GV05chupsb_u:6268: kāryakaraṇasaṅghātavyatirikto 'haṃ jīvaḥ kartā bhoktetyapi svabhāvataḥ prāṇināṃ vijñānādarśanātkisu tasya sadātmavijñānam /
GV05chupsb_u:6269: kathamevaṃ vyatiriktavijñāne sati teṣāṃ kartṛtvādivijñānaṃ sambhavati dṛśyate ca /
GV05chupsb_u:6272: iti cchāndogyopaniṣadi ṣaṣṭhādhyāyasya ṣoḍaśaḥ khaṇḍaḥ iti cchāndogyopaniṣadbrāhmaṇe ṣaṣṭhodhyāyaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:6275: adhīhi bhagava iti hopasasāda sanatkumāraṃ nāradaḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:6276: taṃ hovāca yad vettha tena mopasīda |
GV05chupsb_u:6282: prāṇāntāni krameṇa nirdiśya taddvāreṇāpi bhūmākhyaṃ niratiśayaṃ tattvaṃ nirdekṣyāmīti śākhācandradarśanavaditīnaṃ saptamaṃ prapāṭhakamārabhate /
GV05chupsb_u:6283: anirdiṣṭeṣu hi sator'vāktattveṣu sanmātre ca nirdiṣṭe 'nyadapyavijñātaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:6284: syādityāśaṅkā kasyacitsyātsā mā bhūditi vā tāni nirdidikṣati /
GV05chupsb_u:6285: athavā sopānārohaṇavatsthūlādārabhya sūkṣmaṃ sūkṣamataṃ ca buddhiviṣayaṃ jñāpayitvā tadatirikte svārājye 'bhiṣekṣyāmīti nāmādīni nirdidikṣati /
GV05chupsb_u:6286: athavā nāmādyuttarottaraviśiṣṭāni tattvānyatitarāṃ ca teṣāmutkṛṣṭatamaṃ bhūmākhyaṃ tattvamiti tatstutyarthaṃ nāmādīnāṃ krameṇopanyāsaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6289: nārado devarṣiḥ kṛtakartavyaḥ sarvavidyo 'pi sannanātmajñatvācchuśocaiva kimu vaktavyamanyo 'lpavijjanturakṛtapuṇyātiśayo 'kṛtārtha iti /
GV05chupsb_u:6292: yena sarvavijñānasādhanaśaktisampannasyāpi nāradasya devarṣeḥ śreyo na babhūva yenottamābhijanavidyāvṛttasādhanaśaktisampattinimittābhi mānaṃ hitvā prākṛtapuruṣavatsanatkumāramupasasāda śreyaḥsādhanaprāptaye 'taḥ
GV05chupsb_u:6297: taṃ nyāyata upasannaṃ hovāca yadātmaviṣaye kiñcidvettha tena tatprakhyāpanena māmupasīdedamahaṃ jāna iti tato 'haṃ bhavato vijñānātte tubyamūrdhvaṃ vakṣyāmītyuktavati sa hovāca nāradaḥ START ChUp 7,1.2
GV05chupsb_u:6298: ṛgvedaṃ bhagavo 'dhyemi yajurvedaṃ sāmavedam ātharvaṇaṃ caturtham itihāsapurāṇaṃ pañcamaṃ vedānāṃ vedaṃ pitryaṃ rāśiṃ daivaṃ nidhiṃ
GV05chupsb_u:6299: vākovākyam ekāyanaṃ devavidyāṃ brahmavidyāṃ bhūtavidyāṃ kṣatravidyāṃ nakṣatravidyāṃ sarpadevajanavidyām etad bhagavo 'dhyemi || ChUp_7,1.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:6300: ChUpBh_7,1.2 ṛgvedaṃ bhagavo 'dhyemi smarāmi yadvettheti vijñānasya
GV05chupsb_u:6302: tathā yajurvedaṃ sāmavedamātharvaṇaṃ caturthaṃ vedaṃ vedaśabdasya prakṛtatvāditihāsapurāṇaṃ pañcamaṃ vedaṃ vedānāṃ bhāratapañcamānāṃ vedaṃ vyākaraṇamityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6319: śrutaṃ hy eva me bhagavaddṛśebhyas tarati śokam ātmavid iti |
GV05chupsb_u:6321: taṃ mā bhagavāñ chokasya pāraṃ tārayatv iti |
GV05chupsb_u:6322: taṃ hovāca yad vai kiṃcaitad adhyagīṣṭhā nāmaivaitat || ChUp_7,1.3 ||
GV05chupsb_u:6323: ChUpBh_7,1.3 so 'haṃ bhagava etatsarvaṃ jānannapi mantravidevāsmi śabdārthamātravijñānavānevāsmītyarthaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:6324: sarvo hi śabdo 'bhidhānamātramabhidhānaṃ ca sarvaṃ mantreṣvantarbhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:6327: nanvātmāpi mantraiḥ prakāśyata eveti kathaṃ mantraviccennā'tmavit /
GV05chupsb_u:6336: dehavati pratyagātmani bhedaviṣaye prayujyamānaḥ śabdo dehādīnāmātmatve pratyākhyāyamāne yatpariśiṣṭaṃ sadavācyamapi pratyāyayati /
GV05chupsb_u:6337: yathā sarājikāyāṃ dṛśyamānāyāṃ senāyāṃ chatradhvajapatākādivyavahite 'dṛśyamāne 'pi rājanyeṣa rājā dṛśyata iti bhavati śabdaprayogastatra ko
GV05chupsb_u:6340: tasmātsohaṃ mantravitkarmavidevāsmi karmakāryaṃ ca sarvaṃ vikāra iti vikārajña evāsmi nā'tmavinnā'tmaprakṛtisvarūpajña ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6343: śrutamāgamajñānamastyeva hi yasmānme mama bhagavaddṛśebhyo yuṣmatsadṛśebhyastaratyatikrāmati śokaṃ manastāpamakṛtārthabuddhitāmātmavidityataḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6344: so 'hamanātmavittvāddhe bhagavaḥ śocāmyakṛtārthabuddhyā santapye sarvadā taṃ mā māṃ śokasya śokasāgarasya pāramantaṃ bhagavāṃstārayatvātmajñānoḍupena kṛtārthabuddhimāpādayatvabhayaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:6350: nāma vā ṛgvedo yajurvedaḥ sāmaveda ātharvaṇaś caturtha itihāsapurāṇaḥ pañcamo vedānāṃ vedaḥ pitryo rāśir daivo nidhir vākovākyam ekāyanaṃ devavidyā brahmavidyā bhūtavidyā kṣatravidyā nakṣatravidyā sarpadevajanavidyā |
GV05chupsb_u:6353: ChUpBh_7,1.4 nāma vā ṛgvedo yajurveda ityādi nāmaivaitat /
GV05chupsb_u:6358: yāvan nāmno gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yo nāma brahmety upāste |
GV05chupsb_u:6361: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti || ChUp_7,1.5 ||
GV05chupsb_u:6362: ChUpBh_7,1.5 sa yastu nāma brahmetyupāste tasya yatphalaṃ bhavati tacchṛṇu yāvannāmno gataṃ nāmno gocaraṃ tatra tasminnāmaviṣaye 'sya yathākāmacāraḥ kāmacaraṇaṃ rājña iva svaviṣaye bhavati yo nāma brahmetyupāsta ityupasaṃhāraḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6365: sanatkumāra āha nāmno vāva bhūyo 'styevetyukta āha yadyasti tanme
GV05chupsb_u:6370: vāg vā ṛgvedaṃ vijñāpayati yajurvedaṃ sāmavedam ātharvaṇaṃ caturtham itihāsapurāṇaṃ pañcamaṃ vedānāṃ vedaṃ pitryaṃ rāśiṃ daivaṃ nidhiṃ vākovākyam ekāyanaṃ devavidyāṃ brahmavidyāṃ bhūtavidyāṃ kṣatravidyāṃ
GV05chupsb_u:6371: nakṣatravidyāṃ sarpadevajanavidyāṃ divaṃ ca pṛthivīṃ ca vāyuṃ cākāśaṃ cāpaś ca tejaś ca devāṃś ca manuṣyāṃś ca paśūṃś ca vayāṃsi ca tṛṇavanaspatīñ śvāpadāny ākīṭapataṅgapipīlakaṃ dharmaṃ cādharmaṃ |
GV05chupsb_u:6372: ca satyaṃ cānṛtaṃ ca sādhu cāsādhu ca hṛdayajñaṃ cāhṛdayajñaṃ ca |
GV05chupsb_u:6373: yad vai vāṅ nābhaviṣyan na dharmo nādharmo vyajñāpayiṣyan na satyaṃ nānṛtaṃ na sādhu nāsādhu na hṛdayajño nāhṛdayajñaḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:6374: vāg evaitad sarvaṃ vijñāpayati vācam upāssveti || ChUp_7,2.1 ||
GV05chupsb_u:6378: kāryaddhi kāraṇaṃ bhūyo dṛṣṭaṃ loke yathā putrātpitā tadvat /
GV05chupsb_u:6379: kathaṃ ca vāṅnāmno bhūyasītyāhavāgvā ṛgvedaṃ vijñāpayatyayamṛgveda iti /
GV05chupsb_u:6385: tasmādvāgevaitacchabdoccāraṇena sarvaṃ vijñāpayatyato bhūyasī vāṅnāmnastasmādvācaṃ brahmetyupāḥsva START ChUp 7,2.2
GV05chupsb_u:6387: yāvad vāco gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yo vācaṃ brahmety upāste |
GV05chupsb_u:6390: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti || ChUp_7,2.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:6395: yathā vai dve vāmalake dve vā kole dvau vākṣau muṣṭir anubhavaty evaṃ vācaṃ ca nāma ca mano 'nubhavati |
GV05chupsb_u:6396: sa yadā manasā manasyati mantrān adhīyīyety athādhīte |
GV05chupsb_u:6399: imaṃ ca lokam amuṃ ceccheyety athecchate |
GV05chupsb_u:6407: yacca yasminnantarbhavati tattasya vyāpakatvāttato bhūyo bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:6408: yathā vai loke dve vā'malake phale dve vā kole badaraphale dvau vākṣau vibhītakaphale muṣṭiranubhavati muṣṭiste phale vyāpnoti muṣṭau hi te
GV05chupsb_u:6411: sa yadā puruṣe yasminkāle manasāntaḥkaraṇena manasyati manasyanaṃ vivakṣābuddhiḥ kathaṃ?mantrānadhīyīyoccārayeyamityevaṃ vivakṣāṃ kṛtvāthādhīte tathā karmāṇi kurvīyeti cikīrṣābuddhiṃ kṛtvātha kurute putrāṃśca paśūṃśceccheyeti prāptīcchāṃ kṛtvā tatprāptyupāyānuṣṭhānenāthecchate putrādīnprāpnotītyarthaḥ tathemaṃ ca lokamamuṃ copāyeneccheyeti tatpraptyupāyānuṣṭhānenāthecchace prāpnoti /
GV05chupsb_u:6412: mano hyātmā'tmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ ca sati manasi nānyatheti mano hyātmetyucyate /
GV05chupsb_u:6413: mano hi lokaḥ satyeva hi manasi loko bhavati tatprāptyupāyānuṣṭhānaṃ ceti mano hi loko yasmāttasmānmano hi brahma /
GV05chupsb_u:6417: yāvan manaso gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yo mano brahmety upāste
GV05chupsb_u:6420: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti || ChUp_7,3.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:6432: vibhāgena hi samarthite viṣaye cikīrṣābuddhirmanasyanānantaraṃ bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:6434: yadā vai saṃkalpayate kartavyādiviṣayānvibhajata idaṃ kartuṃ yuktamiti,
GV05chupsb_u:6437: tāṃ ca vācamu nāmni nāmoccāraṇanimittaṃ vivakṣāṃ kṛtverayati nāmni nāmasāmānye mantrāḥ śabdaviśeṣāḥ santa ekaṃ bhavantyantarbhavantītyarthaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:6441: yaddhi mantraprakāśanena labdhasattākaṃ satkarma brāhmaṇenedaṃ kartavyamasmai phalāyeti vidhīyate
GV05chupsb_u:6442: yāpyutpattirbrāhmaṇeṣu karmaṇāṃ dṛśyate sāpi mantreṣu labdhasattākānāmeva karmaṇāṃ spaṣṭīkaraṇam
GV05chupsb_u:6443: na hi mantrāprakāśitaṃ karma kiñcidbrāhmaṇa utpannaṃ dṛśyate /
GV05chupsb_u:6449: tāni ha vā etāni saṃkalpaikāyanāni saṃkalpātmakāni saṃkalpe pratiṣṭhitāni |
GV05chupsb_u:6462: ChUpBh_7,4.2 tāni ha vā etāni mana ādīni saṃkalpaikāyanāni saṃkalpa eko
GV05chupsb_u:6463: 'yanaṃ gamanaṃ pralayo yeṣāṃ tāni saṃkalpaikāyanāni saṃkalpātmakānyutpattau saṃkalpe pratiṣṭhitāni sthitau samakḷpatāṃ saṃkalpaṃ kṛtavatyāviva hi dyauśca pṛthivī ca dyāvāpṛthivyau niścale lakṣyete /
GV05chupsb_u:6464: tathā samakalpetāṃ vāyuścā'kāśaṃ caitāvapi saṃkalpaṃ kṛtavantāviva tathā samakalpantāmāpaśca tejaśca svena rūpema niścalāni lakṣyante /
GV05chupsb_u:6465: yatasteṣāṃ dyāvāpṛthivyādīnāṃ saṃkḷptyai saṃkalpanimittaṃ varṣaṃ saṃkalpante /
GV05chupsb_u:6472: tato lokaḥ phalaṃ saṃkalpate karmakartṛsamavāyitayā samarthībhavatītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6479: kḷptān vai sa lokān dhruvān dhruvaḥ pratiṣṭhitān pratiṣṭhito 'vyathamānān
GV05chupsb_u:6481: yāvat saṃkalpasya gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yaḥ saṃkalpaṃ brahmety upāste |
GV05chupsb_u:6484: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti || ChUp_7,4.3 ||
GV05chupsb_u:6485: ChUpBh_7,4.3 sa yaḥ saṃkalpaṃ brahmeti brahmabuddhyopāstekḷptānvai dhātrāsyeme lokāḥ phalamiti kḷptānsamarthitānsaṃkalpitānsa vidvāndhruvānnityānatyantādhruvāpekṣayā dhruvaśca svayam /
GV05chupsb_u:6487: paśuputrādibhiḥ pratitiṣṭhatīti darśanātsvayaṃ ca pratiṣṭhita ātmīyopakaraṇasaṃpanno 'vyathamānānamitrāditrāsarah itānavyathamānaśca svayamabhisidhyatyabhiprāpnotītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6488: yāvatsaṃkalpasya gataṃ saṃkalpagocarastatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati ātmanaḥ saṃkalpasya na tu sarveṣāṃ saṃkalpasyeti /
GV05chupsb_u:6501: cittaṃ cetayitṛtvaṃ prāptakālānurūpabodhavattvamatītāna gataviṣayaprayojananirūpaṇasāmarthyaṃ ca tatsaṃkalpādapi bhūyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6503: yadā vai prāptamiti cetayate tadā dānāya vāpohāya vātha saṃkalpayate 'tha
GV05chupsb_u:6506: tāni ha vā etāni cittaikāyanāni cittātmāni citte pratiṣṭhitāni |
GV05chupsb_u:6507: tasmād yady api bahuvid acitto bhavati nāyam astīty evainam āhuḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:6508: yad ayaṃ veda yad vā ayaṃ vidvān nettham acittaḥ syād iti |
GV05chupsb_u:6509: atha yady alpavic cittavān bhavati tasmā evota śuśrūṣante |
GV05chupsb_u:6514: ChUpBh_7,5.2 tāni saṃkalpādīni karmaphalāntāni cittaikāyanāni cittātmāni cittotpattīni citte pratiṣṭhitāni cittasthitānītyapi pūrvavat /
GV05chupsb_u:6516: yasmāccittaṃ saṃkalpādimūlaṃ tasmādyadyapi bahuvidbahuśāsrādiparijñānavānsannacitto bhavati prāptādicetayitṛtvasāmarthyavirahito bhavati taṃ nipuṇā laukikānāyamasti vidyamāno 'pyasatsama evetyenamāhuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6517: yaccāyaṃ kiñcicchāsrādi veda śrutavāṃstadapyasya vṛthaiveti kathayanti /
GV05chupsb_u:6520: athālpavidapi yadi cittavānbhavati tasmā etasmai taduktārthagrahaṇāyaivotāpi śuśrūṣante śrotumicchanti
GV05chupsb_u:6524: cittān vai sa lokān dhruvān dhruvaḥ pratiṣṭhitān pratiṣṭhito 'vyathamānān
GV05chupsb_u:6526: yāvac cittasya gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yaś cittaṃ brahmety upāste |
GV05chupsb_u:6529: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti || ChUp_7,5.3 ||
GV05chupsb_u:6530: ChUpBh_7,5.3 cittānupacitānhuddhimadguṇaiḥ sa cittopāsako dhruvānityādi coktārtham //3//
GV05chupsb_u:6540: tasmād ya iha manuṣyāṇāṃ mahattāṃ prāpnuvanti dhyānāpādāṃśā ivaiva te bhavanti |
GV05chupsb_u:6541: atha ye 'lpāḥ kalahinaḥ piśunā upavādinas te |
GV05chupsb_u:6542: atha ye prabhavo dhyānāpādāṃśā ivaiva te bhavanti |
GV05chupsb_u:6545: yāvad dhyānasya gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yo dhyānaṃ brahmety upāste |
GV05chupsb_u:6548: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti || ChUp_7,6.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:6557: devāśca manuṣyāśca devamanuṣyā manuṣyā eva vā devasamā devamanuṣyāḥ śamādiguṇasaṃpannā manuṣyā devasvarūpaṃ na jahatītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6558: yasmādevaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ dhyānaṃ tasmādya iha loke manuṣyāṇāmeva dhanairvidyayā guṇairvā mahattāṃ mahattvaṃ prāpnuvanti dhanādimahattvahetuṃ labhanta ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6559: dhyānāpādāṃśā iva dhyānasyā'pādanamāpādo dhyānaphalalābha ityetattasyāṃśo 'vayavaḥ kalā kāciddhyānaphalalābhakalāvanta ivaivetyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6560: te bhavanti niścalā iva lakṣyante na kṣudrā iva /
GV05chupsb_u:6561: atha ye punaralpāḥ kṣudrāḥ kiñcidapi dhanādimahattvaikadeśamaprāptāste pūrvoktaviparītāḥ kalahinaḥ kalahaśīlāḥ piśunāḥ paradoṣodbhāsakā upavādinaḥ paradoṣaṃ sāmīpyayuktameva vadituṃ śīlaṃ yoṣāṃ ta upavādinaśca bhavanti /
GV05chupsb_u:6562: atha ye mahattvaṃ prāptā dhanādinimittaṃ te 'nyānprati prabhavantīti prabhavo vidyācāryarājeśvarādayo dhyānāpādāṃśā ivetyādyuktārtham /
GV05chupsb_u:6568: vijñānena vā ṛgvedaṃ vijānāti yajurvedaṃ sāmavedam ātharvaṇaṃ caturtham itihāsapurāṇaṃ pañcamaṃ vedānāṃ vedaṃ pitryaṃ rāśiṃ daivaṃ nidhiṃ vākovākyam ekāyanaṃ devavidyāṃ brahmavidyāṃ bhūtavidyāṃ kṣatravidyāṃ
GV05chupsb_u:6569: nakṣatravidyāṃ sarpadevajanavidyāṃ divaṃ ca pṛthivīṃ ca vāyuṃ cākāśaṃ cāpaś ca tejaś ca devāṃś ca manuṣyāṃś ca paśūṃś ca vayāṃsi ca tṛṇavanaspatīñ chvāpadāny ākīṭapataṅgapipīlakam |
GV05chupsb_u:6570: dharmaṃ cādharmaṃ ca satyaṃ cānṛtaṃ ca sādhu cāsādhu ca hṛdayajñaṃ cāhṛdayajñaṃ cānnaṃ ca rasaṃ cemaṃ ca lokam amuṃ ca vijñānenaiva vijānāti
GV05chupsb_u:6574: kathaṃ ca tasya bhūyastvamityāha-vijñānena vā ṛgvedaṃ vijānātyayamṛgveda
GV05chupsb_u:6578: sādhvasādhunī lokataḥ siddhe, smārte vā dṛṣṭādṛṣṭāviṣayaṃ ca sarvaṃ vijñānenaiva vijānātītyarthaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:6583: yāvad vijñānasya gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yo vijñānaṃ brahmety upāste |
GV05chupsb_u:6586: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti || ChUp_7,7.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:6587: ChUpBh_7,7.2 śṛṇūpāsanaphalaṃ vijñānavato vijñānaṃ yeṣu lokeṣu tānvijñānavato lokāñjñānavataścābhisidhyatyabhiprāpnoti
GV05chupsb_u:6593: api ha śataṃ vijñānavatām eko balavān ākampayate |
GV05chupsb_u:6594: sa yadā balī bhavaty athotthātā bhavati |
GV05chupsb_u:6597: upasīdan draṣṭā bhavati śrotā bhavati mantā bhavati boddhā bhavati kartā bhavati vijñātā bhavati
GV05chupsb_u:6598: balena vai pṛthivī tiṣṭhati balenāntarikṣaṃ balena dyaur balena parvatā balena devamanuṣyā balena paśavaś ca vayāṃsi ca tṛṇavanaspatayaḥ śvāpadāny ākīṭapataṅgapipīlakam |
GV05chupsb_u:6602: yāvad balasya gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yo balaṃ brahmety upāste |
GV05chupsb_u:6605: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti || ChUp_7,8.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:6608: anaśanādṛgādīni na vai mā pratibhānti bho iti śruteḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6609: śarīre 'pi tadevotthānādisāmarthyaṃ yasmādvijñānavatāṃ śatamapyekaḥ prāṇī balavānā kampayate yathā hastī matto manuṣyāṇāṃ śataṃ samuditamapi /
GV05chupsb_u:6610: yasmādevamannādyupayoganimittaṃ balaṃ tasmātsa puruṣo yadā balī balena tadvānbhavatyathotthātotthānasya kartottiṣṭhaṃśca gurūṇāmācāryasya ca paricaritā paricaraṇasya śuśrūṣāyāḥ kartā bhavati paricarannupasattā teṣāṃ samīpago 'ntaraṅgaḥ prayo bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6614: tata idamebhiruktamevamupapadyata ityupapattito mantā bhavati manvānaśca boddhā bhavatyevamevedamiti
GV05chupsb_u:6615: tata evaṃ niścitya taduktārthasya kartānuṣṭhātā bhavati vijñātānuṣṭhānaphalasyānubhavitā bhavatītyarthaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:6616: kiñca balasya māhātmyaṃ balena vai pṛthivī tiṣṭhatītyādyujvartham //1-2 //
GV05chupsb_u:6620: tasmād yady api daśa rātrīr nāśnīyāt |
GV05chupsb_u:6623: athānnasyāye draṣṭā bhavati śrotā bhavati mantā bhavati boddhā bhavati kartā bhavati vijñātā bhavati |
GV05chupsb_u:6629: 'nnopayogānimittasya balasya hānyā mriyate na cenmriyate yadyu ha jīvet /
GV05chupsb_u:6631: athavā sa jīvannapyadraṣṭā bhavati gurorapi tata evāśrotetyādi pūrvaviparītaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati
GV05chupsb_u:6642: yāvad annasya gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yo 'nnaṃ brahmety upāste |
GV05chupsb_u:6645: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti || ChUp_7,9.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:6646: ChUpBh_7,9.2 phalaṃ cānnavataḥ prabhūtānnānvai sa lokānpānavataḥ prabhūtodakāṃścānnapānayornityasaṃbandhāllokānabhisi dhyati /
GV05chupsb_u:6651: tasmād yadā suvṛṣṭir na bhavati vyādhīyante prāṇā annaṃ kanīyo bhaviṣyatīti |
GV05chupsb_u:6652: atha yadā suvṛṣṭir bhavaty ānandinaḥ prāṇā bhavanty annaṃ bahu bhaviṣyatīti |
GV05chupsb_u:6653: āpa evemā mūrtā yeyaṃ pṛthivī yad antarikṣaṃ yad dyaur yat parvatā yad devamanuṣyā yat paśavaś ca vayāṃsi ca tṛṇavanaspatayaḥ śvāpadāny ākīṭapataṅgapipīlakam |
GV05chupsb_u:6657: yasmādevaṃ tasmādyadā yasminkāle suvṛṣṭiḥ sasyahitā śobhanā vṛṣṭirna bhavati tadā vyādhīyante prāṇā duḥkhino bhavanti /
GV05chupsb_u:6659: atha punaryadā suvṛṣṭirbhavati tadā'nandinaḥ sukhino hṛṣṭāḥ prāṇāḥ prāṇino bhavantyantaṃ bahu prabhūtaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
GV05chupsb_u:6666: yāvad apāṃ gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yo 'po brahmety upāste |
GV05chupsb_u:6669: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti || ChUp_7,10.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:6670: ChUpBh_7,10.2 phalaṃ-sa yo 'po brahmetyupāsta āpnoti sarvānkāmānkāmyānmūrtimato viṣayānityarthaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:6676: tad vā etad vāyum āgṛhyākāśam abhitapati tadāhur niśocati nitapati varṣiṣyati vā iti |
GV05chupsb_u:6678: tad etad ūrdhvābhiś ca tiraścībhiś ca vidyudbhir āhrādāś caranti tasmād āhur vidyotate stanayati varṣiṣyati vā iti |
GV05chupsb_u:6685: tadā'hurlaukikā niśocati saṃtapati sāmānyena jagannitapati dehānato varṣiṣyati vā iti /
GV05chupsb_u:6686: prasiddhaṃ hi loke kāraṇamabhyudyataṃ dṛṣṭavataḥ kārya bhaviṣyatīti vijñānam /
GV05chupsb_u:6692: tasmāttaddarśanādāhurlaukikā vidyotate stanayati varṣiṣyati vā ityādyuktārtham /
GV05chupsb_u:6696: tejasvī vai sa tejasvato lokān bhāsvato 'pahatatamaskān abhisidhyati |
GV05chupsb_u:6697: yāvat tejaso gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yas tejo brahmety upāste
GV05chupsb_u:6700: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti || ChUp_7,11.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:6701: ChUpBh_7,11.2 tasya tejasa upāsanaphalaṃ-tejasvī vai bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:6707: ākāśe vai sūryācandramasāv ubhau vidyun nakṣatrāṇy agniḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:6717: vāyusahitasya tejasaḥ kāraṇatvādvyomno vāyumāgṛhyeti tejasā sahokto vāyuriti pṛthagiha noktastejasaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:6719: yathā ghaṭādibhyo mṛttathā'kāśo vāyusahitasya tejasaḥ kāraṇamiti tato bhūyān /
GV05chupsb_u:6721: ākāśo vai sūryācandramasāvubhau tejorūpau vidyunnakṣatrāṇyagniśca tejorūpāṇyākāśe 'ntaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6723: kiñcā'kāśenā'hvayati cānyamanya āhūtaścetara ākāśena śṛṇotyanyoktaṃ ca śabdamanyaḥ pratiśṛṇotyākāśe ramate krīḍatyanyonyaṃ sarvastathā na ramate
GV05chupsb_u:6724: cā'kāśe vadhvādiviyoga ākāśe jāyate na mūrtenāvaṣṭabdhe /
GV05chupsb_u:6729: ākāśavato vai sa lokān prakāśavato 'saṃbādhān urugāyavato 'bhisidhyati |
GV05chupsb_u:6730: yāvad ākāśasya gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati ya ākāśaṃ brahmety upāste |
GV05chupsb_u:6733: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti || ChUp_7,12.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:6734: ChUpBh_7,12.2 phalaṃ śṛṇvākāśavato vai vistārayuktānsa vidvāṃllokānprakāśavataḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6739: tasmād yady api bahava āsīrann a smaranto naiva te kaṃcana śṛṇuyur na manvīran na vijānīran
GV05chupsb_u:6740: yadā vāva te smareyur atha śṛṇuyur atha manvīrann atha vijānīran |
GV05chupsb_u:6741: smareṇa vai putrān vijānāti smareṇa paśūn |
GV05chupsb_u:6744: yāvat smarasya gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yaḥ smaraṃ brahmety upāste |
GV05chupsb_u:6747: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti || ChUp_7,13.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:6750: sa ākāśādbhūyāniti draṣṭavyaṃ liṅgavyatyayena smartuḥ smaraṇe hi satyākāśādi sarvamarthavatsmaraṇavato bhogyatvāt /
GV05chupsb_u:6755: dṛśyate hi loke smaraṇasya bhūyastvaṃ yasmāttasmādyadyapi samuditā bahava ekasminnāsīrannupaviśeyuste tatrā'sīnā anyonyabhāṣitamapi na smarantaścetsyurnaiva te kañcana śabdaṃ śṛṇuyustathā na manvīranmantavyaṃ cetsmareyustadā manvīransmṛtyabhāvānna manvīraṃstathā na vijānīran /
GV05chupsb_u:6756: yadā vāva te smareyurmantavyaṃ vijñātavyaṃ śrotavyaṃ cātha śṛṇuyuratha manvīrannatha vijānīran
GV05chupsb_u:6757: tathā smareṇa vai mama putrā eta iti putrānvijānāti smareṇa paśūn /
GV05chupsb_u:6763: āśeddho vai smaro mantrān adhīte karmāṇi kurute putrāṃś ca paśūṃś cecchata imaṃ ca lokaṃ amuṃ cecchate |
GV05chupsb_u:6766: āśāprāptavastvākāṅkṣā'śā tṛṣṇā kāma iti yāmāhuḥ paryāyaiḥ sā ca smarādbhūyasī /
GV05chupsb_u:6770: āśāviṣayarūpaṃ smarannasau smaro bhavatyata āśeddha āśayābhivardhitaḥ smarabhūtaḥ smarannṛgādīnmantrānadhīte 'dhītya ca tadarthaṃ brāhmaṇebhyo
GV05chupsb_u:6771: vidhīṃśca śrutvā karmāṇi kurute tatphalāśayaiva putrāṃśca karmaphalabhūtānicchate 'bhivāñchatyāśayaiva tatsādhanānyanutiṣṭhati /
GV05chupsb_u:6775: atra āśa āyāḥ smarādapi bhūyastvamityata āśāmupāḥsva //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:6780: yāvad āśāyā gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati ya āśāṃ brahmety upāste |
GV05chupsb_u:6783: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti || ChUp_7,14.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:6784: ChUpBh_7,14.2 yastvāśāṃ brahmetyupāste śṛṇu tasya phalam /
GV05chupsb_u:6785: āśayā sadopāsitayāsyopāsakasya sarve kāmāḥ samṛdhyanti samṛddhiṃ gacchanti
GV05chupsb_u:6786: amoghā hāsyā'śiṣaḥ prārthanāḥ sarvā bhavanti yatprārthitaṃ sarvaṃ tadavaśyaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:6791: yathā vā arā nābhau samarpitā evam asmin prāṇe sarvaṃ samarpitam |
GV05chupsb_u:6802: cottarottarabhūyastayāvasthitaṃ smṛtinimittasadbhāvamāśāraśanāpāśairvipāśitaṃ sarvaṃ sarvato bisamiva tantubhiryasminprāṇe samarpitam /
GV05chupsb_u:6803: yena ca sarvato vyāpināntarbahirgatena sūtre maṇigaṇā iva sūtreṇa grathitaṃ vidhṛtaṃ ca /
GV05chupsb_u:6804: sa eṣa prāṇo vā āśāyā bhūyān /
GV05chupsb_u:6806: yathā vai loke rathacakrasyārā rathanābhau samarpitāḥ saṃprotāḥ saṃpraveśitā ityetat /
GV05chupsb_u:6807: evamasmiṃlliṅgasaṃghātarūpe prāṇe prajñātmani dehike mukhye yasminparā devatā nāmarūpavyākaraṇāyā'darśādau pratibimbivajjīvenā'tmanānupratiṣṭā /
GV05chupsb_u:6809: "kasminnannvahamutkrānta utkrānto baviṣyāmi kasminvā pratiṣṭhite pratiṣṭhāsyāmīti sa prāṇamasṛjata"iti śruteḥ yastu cchāyevānugata īśvaram
GV05chupsb_u:6810: "tadyathā rathasyāreṣu nemirarpito nābhāvarā arpitā evamevaitā bhūtamātrāḥ
GV05chupsb_u:6814: ataḥ sa eṣa prāṇo 'paratantraḥ prāṇena svaśaktyaiva yāti nānyakṛtaṃ gamanādikriyāsvasya sāmarthyamityarthaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:6815: sarvaṃ kriyākārakaphalabhedajātaṃ prāṇa eva na prāṇādbahirbhūtamastīti prakaraṇārthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6820: sa yadi pitaraṃ vā mātaraṃ vā bhrātaraṃ vā svasāraṃ vācāryaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā kiṃcid bhṛśam iva pratyāha |
GV05chupsb_u:6822: pitṛhā vai tvam asi mātṛhā vai tvam asi bhrātṛhā vai tvam asi svasṛhā vai tvam asy ācāryahā vai tvam asi brāhmaṇahā vai tvam asīti || ChUp_7,15.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:6825: ucyate - sati prāṇe pitrādiṣu pitrādiśabdaprayogāttadutkrāntau ca prayogābhāvāt /
GV05chupsb_u:6827: sa yaḥ kaścitpitrādīnāmanyatamaṃ yadi taṃ bhṛśamiva tadananurūpamiva kiñcidvacanaṃ tvaṅkārādiyuktaṃ pratyāha tadainaṃ pārśvasthā āhurvivekino dhiktvāstu dhigastu tvāmityevam /
GV05chupsb_u:6830: atha yady apy enān utkrāntaprāṇāñ chūlena samāsaṃ vyatiṣaṃdahet |
GV05chupsb_u:6831: naivainaṃ brūyuḥ pitṛhāsīti na mātṛhāsīti na bhrātṛhāsīti na svasṛhāsīti nācāryahāsīti na brāhmaṇahāsīti || ChUp_7,15.3 ||
GV05chupsb_u:6833: samāsaṃ samasya vyatidahedvyatyasya saṃdahedevamapyatikrūraṃ karma samāsavyatyāsādiprakāreṇa dahanalakṣaṇaṃ taddehasaṃbaddhameva kurvāṇaṃ naivainaṃ brūyuḥ pitṛhetyādi /
GV05chupsb_u:6837: sa vā eṣa evaṃ paśyann evaṃ manvāna evaṃ vijānann ativādī bhavati |
GV05chupsb_u:6841: ChUpBh_7,15.4 tasmātprāṇo hyevaitāni pitrādīni sarvāṇi bhavati calāni
GV05chupsb_u:6843: sa vā eṣa prāṇavidevaṃ yathoktaprakāreṇa paśyanphalato 'nubhavannevaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:6844: manvāna upapattibhiścintayannevaṃ vijānannupapattibhiḥ saṃyojyaivameveti niścayaṃ kurvannityarthaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:6845: mananavijñānābhyāṃ hi saṃbhūtaḥ śāsrārtho niścito dṛṣṭo bhavet /
GV05chupsb_u:6846: ata evaṃ paśyannativādī bhavati nāmādyāśāntamatītya vadanaśīlo bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6847: taṃ cedbrūyustaṃ yadyevamativādinaṃ sarvadā sarvaiḥ śabdairnāmādyāśāntamatītya vartamānaṃ prāṇamevaṃ vadantamevaṃ paśyantamativadanaśīlamativādinaṃ brahmādistambaparyantasya hi jagataḥ prāṇa ātmāhamiti bruvāṇaṃ yadi brūyurativādyasīti /
GV05chupsb_u:6853: eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati |
GV05chupsb_u:6857: ChUpBh_7,16.1 sa eṣa nāradaḥ sarvātiśayaṃ prāṇaṃ svamātmānaṃ sarvātmānaṃ śrutvā nātaḥ paramastītyupararāma
GV05chupsb_u:6858: na pūrvavatkimasti bhagavaḥ prāṇādbhūya iti papraccha /
GV05chupsb_u:6859: yatastamevaṃ vikārānṛtabrahmavijñānena parituṣṭamakṛtārthaṃ paramārthasatyātivādinamātmānaṃ manyamānaṃ yogyaṃ śiṣyaṃ mithyāgrahaviśeṣādvipracyāvayannāha bhagavānsanatkumāraḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6860: eṣa tu vā ativadati yamahaṃ vakṣyāmi na prāṇavidativādī paramārthataḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6862: yastu bhūmākhyaṃ sarvātikrāntaṃ tattvaṃ paramārthasatyaṃ veda so
GV05chupsb_u:6863: 'tivādītyata āha-eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ sateyana paramārthasatyavijñānavattayātivadati
GV05chupsb_u:6864: so 'haṃ tvāṃ prapanno bhagavansatyenātivadāni tathāmāṃ niyunaktu bhagavānyathāhaṃ satyenātivadānītyabhiprāyaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:6865: yadyevaṃ satyenātivaditumicchasi satyameva tu tāvadvijijñāsitavyamityukta āha nāradaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6866: tathāstu tarhi satya bhagavo vijijñāse viśeṣeṇa jñātumiccheyaṃ tvatto 'hamiti //1//
GV05chupsb_u:6869: yadā vai vijānāty atha satyaṃ vadati |
GV05chupsb_u:6874: ChUpBh_7,17.1 yadā vai satyaṃ paramārthato vijānātīdaṃ paramārthaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:6875: satyamiti, tato 'nṛtaṃ vikārajātaṃ vācārambhaṇaṃ hitvā sarvavikārāvasthaṃ sadevaikaṃ satyamiti tadevātha vadati yadvadati /
GV05chupsb_u:6879: satyamuktaṃ satyatvaṃ śrutyantare vikārasya na tu paramārthāpekṣamuktaṃ kiṃ tarhīndriyaviṣayatvāpekṣaṃ sacca tyacceti satyamityuktaṃ taddvāreṇa ca paramārthasatyasyopalabdhirvivakṣiteti /
GV05chupsb_u:6880: prāṇā vai satyaṃ teṣāmeṣa satyamiti coktam /
GV05chupsb_u:6882: iha tu praṇaviṣayātparamārthasatyavijñānābhimānādvyutthāpya nāradaṃ yatsadeva satyaṃ paramārthato bhūmākhyaṃ tadvijñāpayiṣyāmītyeṣa viśeṣato
GV05chupsb_u:6885: 'gnyādiśabdenāgnyadīnparamārthasadrūpānmanyamāno vadati na tu te rūpatrayavyatirekeṇa paramārthaḥ santi /
GV05chupsb_u:6886: tathā tānyapi rūpāṇi sadapekṣayā naiva santītyato nāvijānansatyaṃ vadati /
GV05chupsb_u:6891: evaṃ satyādīnāṃ cottarottarāṇāṃ karotyantānāṃ pūrvapūrvahetutvaṃ vyākhyeyam //1//
GV05chupsb_u:6926: satyāṃ hi tasyāṃ niṣṭhādīni yathoktāni bhavanti vijñānāvasānāni //1//
GV05chupsb_u:6934: ChUpBh_7,22.1 sāpi kṛtiryadā sukhaṃ labhate sukhaṃ niratiśayaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ labdhavyaṃ mayeti manyate tadā bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6935: yathā dṛṣṭaphalasukhā kṛtistathehāpi nāsukhaṃ labdhvā karoti /
GV05chupsb_u:6938: athedānīṃ kṛtyādiṣūttarottareṣu satsu satyaṃ svayameva pratibhāsata iti na tadvijñānāya pṛthagyatnaḥ kārya iti prāptaṃ tata idamucyate /
GV05chupsb_u:6948: ChUpBh_7,23.1 yo vai bhūmā mahanniratiśayaṃ bahviti paryāyāstatsukham /
GV05chupsb_u:6953: na hi duḥkhabījaṃ sukhaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ jvarādi loke /
GV05chupsb_u:6959: yatra nānyat paśyati nānyac chṛṇoti nānyad vijānāti sa bhūmā |
GV05chupsb_u:6960: atha yatrānyat paśyaty anyac chṛṇoty anyad vijānāti tad alpam |
GV05chupsb_u:6964: sve mahimni yadi vā na mahimnīti || ChUp_7,24.1 ||
GV05chupsb_u:6965: ChUpBh_7,24.1 kiṃlakṣaṇo 'sau bhūmetyāha-yatra yasminbhūmni tattve nānyaddraṣṭavyamanyena karaṇena draṣṭānyo vibhakto dṛśyātpaśyati /
GV05chupsb_u:6980: ātmaikatva eva kriyākārakaphalabhedaḥ saṃsāravilakṣaṇa iti cet /
GV05chupsb_u:6983: anyadarśanādyabhāvoktipakṣe 'pi yatretyanyanna paśyatīti ca viśeṣaṇe anarthake syātāmiti cet
GV05chupsb_u:6984: dṛśyate hi loke yatra śūnye gṛhe 'nyanna paśyatītyukte stambhādīnātmānaṃ ca na na paśyatīti gamyate /
GV05chupsb_u:7000: yathā svapnadṛśyaṃ vastu prāk prabodhāttatkālabhāvīti tadvat /
GV05chupsb_u:7001: tata eva tanmartyaṃ vināśi svapnavastuvadeva tadviparoto bhūmā yastadamṛtam /
GV05chupsb_u:7003: sa tarhyevaṃlakṣaṇo bhūmā he bhagavankasminpratiṣṭhita ityuktavantaṃ nāradaṃ pratyāha sanatkimāraḥ
GV05chupsb_u:7004: sve mahimnīti sva ātmīye mahimni māhātmye vibhūtau pratiṣṭhito bhūmā /
GV05chupsb_u:7005: yadi pratiṣṭhāmicchasi kvacidyadi vā paramārthameva pṛcchasi na mahimnyapi pratiṣṭhita iti brūmaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7008: go 'śvam iha mahimety ācakṣate hastihiraṇyaṃ dāsabhāryaṃ kṣetrāṇy
GV05chupsb_u:7012: anyo hy anyasmin pratiṣṭhita iti || ChUp_7,24.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:7013: ChUpBh_7,24.2 yadi svamahimni pratiṣṭhito bhūmā kathaṃ tarhyapratiṣṭha
GV05chupsb_u:7018: sarvatra gavāśvādi mahimeti prasiddhaṃ tadāśritastatpratiṣṭhaścaitro bhavati, yathā nāhamevaṃ svato 'nyaṃ mahimānamāśrito bhūmā caitravaditi
GV05chupsb_u:7019: bravīmyatra hetutvenānyo hyanyasminpratiṣṭhita iti vyavahitena sambandhaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:7023: sa evādhastāt sa upariṣṭāt sa paścāt sa purastāt sa dakṣiṇataḥ sa uttarataḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:7026: aham evādhastād aham upariṣṭād ahaṃ paścād ahaṃ purastād ahaṃ dakṣiṇato
GV05chupsb_u:7029: yasmātsa eva bhūmādhastānna tadvyatirekeṇānyadvidyate yasminpratiṣṭhitaḥ syāt /
GV05chupsb_u:7031: sati bhūmno 'nyasminbhūmā hi pratiṣṭhitaḥ syānna tu tadasti /
GV05chupsb_u:7034: yatra nānyatpaśyatītyadhikaraṇādhikartavyatānirdeśātsa evādhastāditi ca parokṣanirdeśāddraṣṭarjīvādanyobhūmā syādityāśaṅkā kasyacinmā bhūdityathāto 'nantaramahaṅkārādeśo 'haṅkāreṇā'diśyata ityahaṅkārādeśaḥ draṣṭurananyatvadarśanārthaṃ bhūmaiva nirdiśyate
GV05chupsb_u:7038: ātmaivādhastād ātmopariṣṭād ātmā paścād ātmā purastād ātmā dakṣiṇata ātmottarata ātmaivedaṃ sarvam iti |
GV05chupsb_u:7039: sa vā eṣa evaṃ paśyann evaṃ manvāna evaṃ vijānann ātmaratir ātmakrīḍa ātmamithuna ātmānandaḥ sa svarāḍ bhavati |
GV05chupsb_u:7041: atha ye 'nyathāto vidur anyarājānas te kṣayyalokā bhavanti |
GV05chupsb_u:7042: teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣv akāmacāro bhavati || ChUp_7,25.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:7046: ātmaiva sarvataḥ sarvamityevamekamajaṃ sarvato vyomavatpūrṇamanyaśūnyaṃ paśyansa vā eṣa vidvānmananavijñānābhyāmātmaratirātmanyeva ratī ramaṇaṃ yasya so 'yamātmaratiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7049: loke srībhiḥ sakhibhiśca krīḍatīti darśanāt na tathā viduṣaḥ kiṃ tarhyātmavijñānanimittamevobhayaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7050: mithunaṃ dvaṃndvajanitaṃ sukhaṃ tadapi dvandvanirapekṣaṃ yasya viduṣaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7051: tathā'tmānandaḥ śabdādinimitta ānando 'viduṣāṃ na tathāsya viduṣaḥ kiṃ tarhyātmanimittameva sarvaṃ sarvadā sarvaprakāreṇa ca
GV05chupsb_u:7053: sa evaṃlakṣaṇo vidvāñjīvanneva svārājye 'bhiṣiktaḥ patite 'pi dehe svarāḍeva bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:7054: yata evaṃ bhavati tata eva tasya sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:7055: prāṇādiṣu pūrvabhūmiṣu tatrāsyeti tāvanmātraparicchinnakāmacāratvamuktamanrājatvaṃ cārthaprāptaṃ sātiśayatvādyathāprāptasvārājyakāmacāratvānuvādena tatannivṛttirihocyate sa svarāḍityādinā atha punarye 'nyathāta uktadarśanādanyathā vaiparītyena yathoktameva vā samyaṅna viduste 'nyarājāno bhavanti anyaḥ paro rājā svāmī yeṣāṃ te
GV05chupsb_u:7057: kiñca kṣayyo loko yeṣāṃ te kṣayylokāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7059: tasmādye dvaitadarśinaste kṣayyalokāḥ svadarśanānurūpyeṇaiva bhavantyata eva teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣvakāmacāro bhavati //2//
GV05chupsb_u:7062: tasya ha vā etasyaivaṃ paśyata evaṃ manvānasyaivaṃ vijānata ātmataḥ prāṇa ātmata āśātmataḥ smara ātmata ākāśa ātmatas teja ātmata āpa ātmata āvirbhāvatirobhāvāv ātmato 'nnam ātmato balam ātmato vijñānam ātmato dhyānam ātmataś cittam ātmataḥ saṃkalpa ātmato mana ātmato vāg ātmato nāmātmato mantrā ātmataḥ karmāṇy ātmata evedaṃ sarvam iti || ChUp_7,26.1
GV05chupsb_u:7063: ChUpBh_7,26.1 tasya ha vā etasyetyādi svārājyaṃ prāptasya prakṛtasya viduṣa ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7065: prāṇādernāmāntasyotpattipralayāvabhūtāṃ sadātmāvijñāne tu satīdānīṃ svātmata eva saṃvṛttau tathā sarvo 'pyanyo vyavahāra ātmata eva viduṣaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:7068: na paśyo mṛtyuṃ paśyati na rogaṃ nota duḥkhatām |
GV05chupsb_u:7069: sarvaṃ ha paśyaḥ paśyati sarvam āpnoti sarvaśaḥ |

GV05chupsb_u:7072: saptadhā navadhā caiva punaś caikādaśa smṛtaḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:7073: śataṃ ca daśa caikaś ca sahasrāṇi ca viṃśatiḥ |

GV05chupsb_u:7080: na paśyaḥ paśyatīti paśyo yathoktadarśī vidvānityarthaḥ /

GV05chupsb_u:7082: sarvaṃ ha sarvameva sa paśyaḥ paśyatyātmānameva sarvaṃ tataḥ sarvamāpnoti sarvaśaḥ sarvaprakārairiti
GV05chupsb_u:7083: kiñca sa vidvānprāksṛṣṭiprabhedādekadhaiva bhavatyekadhaiva ca saṃsridhādibhedairanantabhedaprakāro bhavati sṛṣṭikāle /
GV05chupsb_u:7084: punaḥ saṃhārakāle mūlameva svaṃ pāramārthakamekadhābhāvaṃ pratipadyate svatantra eveti vidyāṃ phalena prarocayanstauti /
GV05chupsb_u:7090: āhriyata ityāharaḥ śabdādiviṣayavijñānaṃ bhokturbhogāyā'hriyate tasya viṣayopalabdhilakṣaṇasya vijñānasya śuddhirāhāraśuddhī rāgadveṣamohadoṣairasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ viṣayavijñānamityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7091: tasyāmāhārāśuddhau satyāṃ tadvato 'ntaḥkaraṇasya sattvasya śuddhirnairmalyaṃ bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:7092: sattvaśuddhau ca satyāṃ yathāvagate bhūmātmani dhruvāvicchinnā smṛtiravismaramaṃ bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:7093: tasyāṃ ca labdhāyāṃ smṛtilambhe sati sarveṣāmavidyākṛtānarthapāśarūpāṇāmanekajanmāntarānubhavabhāvanākaṭhinīkṛtānāṃ hṛdayākṣayāṇāṃ granthīnāṃ vipramokṣo viśeṣeṇa pramokṣaṇaṃ vināśo bhavatīti /
GV05chupsb_u:7096: mṛditakaṣāyāya vārkṣādiriva kaṣāyo rāgadveṣādidoṣaḥ sattvasya rañjanārūpatvātsa jñānavairāgyābhyāsarūpakṣāreṇa kṣālito mṛdito vināśito yasya nāradasya tasmai yogyāya mṛditakaṣāyāya tamaso 'vidyālakṣaṇātpāraṃ
GV05chupsb_u:7098: ko 'sau, bhagavān-"utpattiṃ pralayaṃ caiva bhūtānāmāgatiṃ gatim /
GV05chupsb_u:7099: vetti vidyāmavidyāṃ ca sa vācyo bhagavāniti //

GV05chupsb_u:7107: atha yad idam asmin brahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma daharo 'sminn

GV05chupsb_u:7110: yadyapi digdeśakālādibhedaśūnyaṃ brahma sadekamevādvitīyamātmaivedaṃ sarvamiti ṣaṣṭhasaptamayoradhigataṃ tathāpīha mandabuddhīnāṃ digdeśādibhedavadvastvityevaṃ bhāvitā buddhirna śakyate sahasā paramārthaviṣayā kartumityanadhigamya ca brahma na puruṣārthasiddhiriti
GV05chupsb_u:7112: yadyapi satsamyakpratyayaikaviṣayā kartumityānadhigamya ca brahma na puruṣārthasiddhiriti tadadhigamāya hṛdayapuṇḍarīkadeśa upadeṣṭavyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7113: yadyapi satsamyakpratyayaikaviṣayaṃ nirguṇaṃ cā'tmatattvaṃ tathāpi mandabuddhīnāṃ guṇavattvasyeṣṭatvātsatyakāmādiguṇavattvaṃ ca vaktavyam /
GV05chupsb_u:7114: tathā yadyapi brahmavidāṃ stryādiviṣayebhyaḥ svayamevoparamo bhavati tathāpyanekajanmaviṣayasevābhyāsajanitā viṣayaviṣayā tṛṣṇā na sahasā nivartayituṃ śakyata iti brahmacaryādisādhanaviśeṣo vidhātavyaḥ tathā yadyapyātmaikatvavidāṃ gantṛgamanagantavyābhāvādavidyāviśeṣasthitinimittakṣaye gagana iva vidyududbhūta iva vāyurdagdhendhana ivāgniḥ svātmanyeva nivṛttistathāpi gantṛgamanādivāsitabuddhīnāṃ hṛdayadeśaguṇaviśiṣṭabrahmopāsakānāṃ mūrdhanyayā nāḍyā gatirvaktavyetyaṣṭamaḥ prapāṭhaka ārabhyate /
GV05chupsb_u:7116: sanmārgasthāstāvadbhavantu tataḥ śanaiḥ paramārthasadapi grāhayiṣyāmīti manyate śrutiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7117: athānantaraṃ yadidaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ daharamalpaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ puṇḍarīkasadṛśaṃ veśmeva veśma dvārapālādimattvāt
GV05chupsb_u:7120: pure ca veśma rājño yathā tathā tasminbrahmapure śarīre daharaṃ veśma brahmaṇa upalabdhyadhiṣṭhānamityarthaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:7122: asminhi svavikāraśiṅge dehe nāmarūpavyākaraṇāya praviṣṭaṃ sadākhyaṃ braṅma
GV05chupsb_u:7131: tadvāva tadeva ca viśeṣeṇa jijñāsitavyaṃ gurvāśrayaśravaṇādyupāyairanviṣya ca sākṣātkaraṇīyamityarthaḥ START ChUp 8,1.2
GV05chupsb_u:7132: taṃ ced brūyur yad idam asmin brahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma daharo 'sminn antarākāśaḥ kiṃ tad atra vidyate yad anveṣṭavyaṃ yad vāva
GV05chupsb_u:7136: kathaṃ, yadidamasminbrahmapure paricchinne 'ntardaharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma tato 'pyantaralpatara evā'kāśaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7139: daharo 'sminnantarākāśaḥ kiṃ tadatra vidyate na kiñcana vidyata
GV05chupsb_u:7141: yadi nāma badaramātraṃ kimapi vidyate kiṃ tasyānveṣaṇena vijijñāsanena vā phalaṃ vijijñāsituḥ syāt /
GV05chupsb_u:7142: ato yatttrānveṣṭavyaṃ vijijñāsitavyaṃ vā na tena prayojanamityuktavataḥ sa ācāryo brūyāditi śrutervacanam //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:7144: yāvān vā ayam ākāśas tāvān eṣo 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśaḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:7146: ubhāv agniś ca vāyuś ca sūryācandramasāv ubhau vidyun nakṣatrāṇi |
GV05chupsb_u:7147: yac cāsyehāsti yac ca nāsti sarvaṃ tad asmin samāhitam iti || ChUp_8,1.3
GV05chupsb_u:7151: na hi khaṃ puṇḍarīkaveśamagataṃ puṇḍarīkādalpataraṃ matvāvocaṃ daharo

GV05chupsb_u:7164: samāhite samyagāhite sthite yathā vā arā nābhāvityuktaṃ hi /
GV05chupsb_u:7166: yaccāsyā'tmana ātmīyatvena dehavato 'sti vidyata iha loke /
GV05chupsb_u:7172: taṃ ced brūyur asmiṃś cedaṃ brahmapure sarvaṃ samāhitaṃ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni sarve ca kāmā yad enaj jarā vāpnoti pradhvaṃsate vā kiṃ tato 'tiśiṣyata
GV05chupsb_u:7174: ChUpBh_8,1.4 taṃ cedevamuktavantaṃ brūyuḥ punarantevāsinaḥ asmiṃścedyathokte cedyadi brahmapuropalakṣitāntarākāśa ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7175: idaṃ sarvaṃ samāhitaṃ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni sarve ca kāmāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7177: naiṣa doṣaḥ yaccāsyehāsti yacca nāstītyuktā eva hyācāryeṇa kāmāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7178: api ca sarvaśabdena coktā eva kāmāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7179: yadā yasminkāla etaccharīraṃ brahmapurākhyaṃ jarāvalīpalitādilakṣaṇā vayohānirvā'pnoti śasrādinā vā vṛkṇaṃ pradhvaṃsate visraṃsate vinaśyati
GV05chupsb_u:7183: evaṃ prāpte nāśe kiṃ tato 'nyadyathoktādatiśiṣyate 'vatiṣṭhate na kiñcanāvatiṣṭhata ityabhīprāyaḥ START ChUp 8,1.5
GV05chupsb_u:7185: nāsya jarayaitaj jīryati na vadhenāsya hanyate |

GV05chupsb_u:7188: yathā hy eveha prajā anvāviśanti yathānuśāsanam |

GV05chupsb_u:7192: asya dehasya jarayaitadyathoktamantarākāśākhyaṃ braṅma yasminsarva samāhitaṃ na jīryati dehavanna vikriyata ityarthaḥ /

GV05chupsb_u:7221: satyamevaṃ tathāpi dharmakāryā nandavyatirekeṇa svābhāvikānando yatheśvare vijñānamānandaṃ brahmeti śruteḥ /

GV05chupsb_u:7232: yathoktalakṣaṇa evā'tmā vijñeyo gurubhyaḥ śāstrataścā'tmasaṃvedyatayā ca svārājyakāmaiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7236: yathānuśāsanaṃ yatheha prajā anyaṃ svāminaṃ manyamānāḥ svasya svāmino yathā yathānuśāsanaṃ tathā tathānvāviśanti /

GV05chupsb_u:7293: yaṃ ca kāmaṃ kāmayate yathoktavyatirekeṇāpi so 'syāntaḥ prāptumiṣṭaḥ kāmaśca saṃkalpādeva samuttiṣṭhatyasya /

GV05chupsb_u:7315: punargrahaṇāya nidhātṛbhirnidhīyata iti nidhistaṃ hiraṇyanidhiṃ nihitaṃ bhūmeradhastānnikṣiptamakṣetrajñā nidhiśāsrairnidhikṣetramajānantaste nidheruparyupari saṃcaranto 'pi nidhiṃ na vindeyuḥ śakyavedanamapi evamevemā avidyavatyaḥ sarvā imāḥ prajā yathoktaṃ hṛdayākāśākhyaṃ brahmalokaṃ brahmaiva loko brahmalokastamaharahaḥ pratyahaṃ gacchantyo 'pi
GV05chupsb_u:7316: suṣuptakāle na vidandanti na labhanta eṣo 'haṃ brahmalokabhāvamāpanno
GV05chupsb_u:7318: anṛtena hi yathoktena hi yasmātpratyūḍhā hṛtāḥ svarūpādavidyādidoṣairbahipakṛṣṭā ityarthaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:7319: ataḥ kaṣṭamidaṃ vartate jantūnāṃ yatsvāyattamapi brahma na labhyata ityabhiprāyaḥ //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:7322: tasyaitad eva niruktaṃ hṛdy ayam iti tasmād dhṛd ayam |

GV05chupsb_u:7326: hṛdyayamātmā vartata iti yasmāt tasmāddhṛdayaṃ hṛdayanāmanirvacanaprasiddhyāpi svahṛdaya ātmetyavagantavyamityabhiprāyaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:7327: aharaharvai pratyahamevaṃviddhṛdyayamātmeti jānansvargaṃ lokaṃ hārdaṃ brahmaiti pratipadyate
GV05chupsb_u:7328: nanvanevaṃvidapi suṣuptakāle hārdaṃ brahma pratipadyata eva suṣuptakāle satā somya tadā saṃpanna ityuktatvāt /
GV05chupsb_u:7330: yathā jānannajānaṃśca sarvo jantuḥ sadbrahmaiva tathāpi tattvamasīti pratibodhito vidvānsadeva nānyo 'smīti jānansadeva bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:7331: evameva vidvānavidvāṃścasuṣupte yadyapi satsaṃpadyate tathāpyevaṃvideva svargaṃ lokametītyucyate
GV05chupsb_u:7334: atha ya eṣa saṃprasādo 'smāc charīrāt samutthāya paraṃ jyotir upasaṃpadya svena rūpenābhiniṣpadyata eṣa ātmeti hovāca |
GV05chupsb_u:7336: tasya ha vā etasya brahmaṇo nāma satyam iti || ChUp_8,3.4 ||
GV05chupsb_u:7337: ChUpBh_8,3.4 suṣuptakāle svenā'manā satā saṃpannaḥ sansamyakprasīdatīti
GV05chupsb_u:7338: jāgratsvapnayorviṣayendriyasaṃyogajātaṃ kāluṣyaṃ jahātīti saṃprasādaśabdo yadyapi sarvajantūnāṃ sādhāraṇastathāpyevaṃvitsvargaṃ lokametīti prakṛtatvādeṣa saṃprasāda iti saṃnihitavadyatnaviśeṣātso 'thedaṃ śarīraṃ hitvāsmāccharīrātsamutthāya śarīrātmabhāvanāṃ parityajyetyarthaḥ /
