GV05chupsb_u:7345: aśarīratā hyātmanaḥ svarūpaṃ yatsvaṃ paraṃ jyotiḥsvarūpamāpadye saṃprasāda eṣa ātmeti hovāca
GV05chupsb_u:7347: kiñcaitadamṛtamavināśi bhūmā yo vai bhūmā tadamṛtamityuktam /
GV05chupsb_u:7349: tasya ha vā etasya brahmaṇo nāmābhidhānam /
GV05chupsb_u:7355: 8.3.5 tāni ha vā etāni trīṇyakṣarāṇi satīyamiti tadyatsattdamṛtamatha yatti tanmartyamatha yadyaṃ tenobhe yacchati yadanenobhe yacchati tasmādyamaharaharvā evaṃvitsvargaṃ lokameti ChUpBh_8,3.5 tāni ha vā etāni brahmaṇo nāmākṣarāṇi trīṇyetāni satīyāmati sakārastakāro yamiti ca /
GV05chupsb_u:7358: tattatra yatsatsakārastadamṛtaṃ sadbrahmāmṛtavācakatvādamṛta eva sakārastakāranto nirdiṣṭaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:7360: atha yadyamakṣaraṃ tenākṣareṇāmṛtamartyākhye pūrve ubhe 'kṣare yacchati yamayati niyamayati vaśīkarotyātmana ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7368: atha ya ātmā sa setur dhṛtir eṣāṃ lokānām asaṃbhedāya |
GV05chupsb_u:7369: naitaṃ setum ahorātre tarato na jarā na mṛtyur na śoko na sukṛtam |
GV05chupsb_u:7373: uktalakṣaṇo yaḥ saṃprasādastasya svarūpaṃ vakṣyamāṇairuktaiśca guṇaiḥ punaḥ stūyate brahmacaryasādhanasaṃbandhārtham
GV05chupsb_u:7374: ya eṣa yathoktalakṣaṇa ātmā sa seturiva setuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7376: anena hi sarvaṃ jagadvarṇāśramādikriyākārakaphalādibhedaniyamaiḥ karturanurūpaṃ vidadhatā vidhṛtam /
GV05chupsb_u:7381: yathānye saṃsāriṇaḥ kālenāhorātrādilakṣaṇena paricchedyā na tathāyaṃ kālaparicchedya ityabhiprāyaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:7383: ata evainaṃ na jarā tarati na prāpnoti /
GV05chupsb_u:7384: tathā na mṛtyurna śoko na sukṛtaṃ na dṛṣkṛtaṃ sukṛtaduṣkṛte dharmādharmai
GV05chupsb_u:7387: na śakyaṃ hi kāraṇātikramaṇaṃ kartuṃ kāryeṇa /
GV05chupsb_u:7392: yadyapi pūrvaṃ ya ātmāpahatapāpmetyādinā pāpmādipratiṣedha ukta eva tathāpīhāyaṃ viśeṣo na taratīti prāptiviṣayatvaṃ pratiṣidhyate /
GV05chupsb_u:7394: ahorātrādyā uktā anuktāścānye sarve pāpmāna ucyante 'to 'smādātmanaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:7396: apahatapāpmā hyeṣa brahmaiva loko brahmaloka uktaḥ //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:7398: tasmād vā etaṃ setuṃ tīrtvā andhaḥ sann anandho bhavati |
GV05chupsb_u:7401: tasmād vā etaṃ setuṃ tīrtvā api naktam ahar evābhiniṣpadyate |
GV05chupsb_u:7402: sakṛd vibhāto hy evaiṣa brahmalokaḥ || ChUp_8,4.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:7403: ChUpBh_8,4.2 yasmācca pāpmakārya māndhyādi śarīravataḥ syānna tvaśarīrasya
GV05chupsb_u:7404: tasmādvā etamātmānaṃ setuṃ tīrvā prāpyānandho bhavati dehavattve pūrvamandho 'pi san /
GV05chupsb_u:7405: tatā viddhaḥ sandehavattve sa dehaviyoge setuṃ tīrtvā prāpyānandho bhavati dehavattve pūrvamandho 'pi san /
GV05chupsb_u:7406: tathā viddhaḥ sandehavattve sa dehaviyogo setuṃ prāpyāviddho bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:7408: kiñca yasmādahorātre na staḥ setau tasmādvā etaṃ setuṃ tīrtvā prāpya naktamapi tamorūpaṃ rātrirapi sarvamaharevābhiniṣpadyate /
GV05chupsb_u:7409: vijñaptyātmajyotiḥ svarūpamaharivāhaḥ sadaikarūpaṃ viduṣaḥ saṃpadyata ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7410: sakṛdvibhātaḥ sadā vibhātaḥ sadaikarūpaḥ svena rūpeṇaiṣa brahmalokaḥ //2
GV05chupsb_u:7412: tad ya evaitaṃ brahmalokaṃ brahmacaryeṇānuvindanti teṣām evaiṣa brahmalokaḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:7413: teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati || ChUp_8,4.3 ||
GV05chupsb_u:7414: ChUpBh_8,4.3 tattatraivaṃ satyetaṃ yathoktaṃ brahmalokaṃ brahmacaryeṇa srīviṣayatṛṣṇātyāgena śāsrācāryopadeśamanuvindanti svātmasaṃvedyatāmāpādayanti ye teṣāmeva brahmacaryasādhanavatāṃ brahmavidāmeṣa brahmalokaḥ nānyeṣāṃ srīviṣayasaṃparkajātatṛṣṇānāṃ brahmavidāmapītyarthaḥ teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavatītyuktārtham /
GV05chupsb_u:7418: atha yad yajña ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat |
GV05chupsb_u:7419: brahmacaryeṇa hy eva yo jñātā taṃ vindate |
GV05chupsb_u:7420: atha yad iṣṭam ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat |
GV05chupsb_u:7422: ChUpBh_8,5.1 ya ātmā setutvādiguṇaiḥ stutastatprāptaye jñānasahakārisādhanāntaraṃ brahmacaryākhyaṃ vidātavyamityāha /
GV05chupsb_u:7423: yajñādibhiśca tatstauti kartavyārtham- atha yadyajña ityācakṣate loke paramapuruṣārthasādhanaṃ kathayanti śiṣṭāstadbrahmacaryameva /
GV05chupsb_u:7424: yajñasyāpi yatphalaṃ tadbrahmacaryavāllaṃbhate 'to yajño 'pi brahmacaryaṃ bhavati pratipattavyam
GV05chupsb_u:7425: kathaṃ brahmacaryaṃ yajña ityāha-brahmacaryeṇaiva hi yasmādyo jñātāsa taṃ brahmalokaṃ yajñasyāpi pāramparyeṇa phalabhūtaṃ vindate labhate tato yajño
GV05chupsb_u:7430: brahmacaryeṇaiva sādhanena tamīśvaramiṣṭvā pūjayitvāthavaiṣaṇāmātmaviṣayāṃ kṛtvā tamātmānamanuvindate
GV05chupsb_u:7433: atha yat sattrāyaṇam ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat |
GV05chupsb_u:7434: brahmacaryeṇa hy eva sata ātmanas trāṇaṃ vindate |
GV05chupsb_u:7435: atha yan maunam ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat |
GV05chupsb_u:7436: brahmacaryeṇa hy evātmānam anuvidya manute || ChUp_8,5.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:7437: ChUpBh_8,5.2 atha yatsattrāyaṇamityācakṣate brahmacaryameva tattathā sataḥ parasmādātmana ātmanasrāṇaṃ rakṣaṇaṃ brahmacaryasādhanena vindate /
GV05chupsb_u:7439: atha yanmaunamityācakṣate brahmacaryameva tadbrahmacaryeṇaiva sādhanena yuktaḥ sannātmānaṃ śāsrācāryābhyāmanuvidya paścānmanute dhyāyati /
GV05chupsb_u:7442: atha yad anāśakāyanam ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat |
GV05chupsb_u:7443: eṣa hy ātmā na naśyati yaṃ brahmacaryeṇānuvindate |
GV05chupsb_u:7444: atha yad araṇyāyanam ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat |
GV05chupsb_u:7445: tat araś ca ha vai ṇyaś cārṇavau brahmaloke tṛtīyasyām ito divi |
GV05chupsb_u:7448: tad aparājitā pūr brahmaṇaḥ prabhuvimitaṃ hiraṇmayam || ChUp_8,5.3 ||
GV05chupsb_u:7450: yamātmānaṃ brahmacaryeṇānuvindate sa eṣa hyātmā brahmacaryasādhanavato na naśyati tasmādanāśakāyanamapi brahmacaryameva /
GV05chupsb_u:7453: yo jñānādyajña eṣaṇādiṣṭaṃ satasrāṇātsattrāyaṇaṃ mananānmaunamanaśanādanāśakāyanamaraṇyayorgamanādaraṇyāyanamityādibhirmahadbhiḥ puruṣārthasādhanaiḥ stutatvādbrahmacaryaṃ paramaṃ jñānasya sahakārikāraṇaṃ sādhanamityato brahmavidā yatnato rakṣaṇīyamityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7454: tattatra hi brahmaloke 'raśca ha vai prasiddho ṇyaścārṇavau samudropame vā
GV05chupsb_u:7455: sarasī tṛtīyasyāṃ bhuvamantarikṣaṃ cāpekṣya tṛtīyā dyaustasyāṃ tṛtīyasyāmito 'smāllokādārabhya gaṇyamānāyāṃ divi /
GV05chupsb_u:7456: tattatraiva cairamirānnaṃ tanmaya airo maṇḍastena pūrṇamairaṃ madīyaṃ tadupayogināṃ madakaraṃ harṣotpādakaṃ saraḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7457: tatraiva cāśvattho vṛkṣaḥ somasavano nāmataḥ somo 'mṛtaṃ tanniḥsravo
GV05chupsb_u:7460: 'nyairna jīyata ityaparājitā nāma pūḥ purī brahmaṇo hiraṇyagarbhasya /
GV05chupsb_u:7461: brahmaṇā ca prabhuṇā viśeṣeṇa mitaṃ nirmitaṃ tacca hiraṇmayaṃ sauvarṇaṃ prabhuvimitaṃ maṇḍapamiti vākyaśeṣaḥ //3 //
GV05chupsb_u:7463: tad ya evaitāv araṃ ca ṇyaṃ cārṇavau brahmaloke brahmacaryeṇānuvindanti teṣām evaiṣa brahmalokaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:7464: teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati || ChUp_8,5.4 ||
GV05chupsb_u:7465: ChUpBh_8,5.4 tattatra hi brahmaloka etāvarṇavau yāvaraṇyākhyāvuktau brahmacaryeṇa sādhanenānuvindanti ye teṣāmevaiṣa yo vyākhyāto
GV05chupsb_u:7466: brahmalokasteṣāṃ ca brahmacaryasādhavanatāṃ brahmavidāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:7468: nanvatra tvamindrastvaṃ yamastvaṃ varuṇa ityādibhiryathā kaścitstūyate mahārha evamiṣṭādibhiḥ śabdairna stryādiviṣayatṛṣṇānivṛttimātraṃ stutyarhaṃ kiṃ tarhi jñānasya mokṣasādhanatvāttadeveṣṭādibhiḥ stūyata iti kecit /
GV05chupsb_u:7473: nanu ca yajñādibhiḥ stutaṃ brahmacaryamiti yajñādīnāṃ puruṣārthasādhanatvaṃ gamyate /
GV05chupsb_u:7475: na tviha brahmalokaṃ prati yajñādīnāṃ sādhanatvamabhipretya yajñādibhirbrahmacaryaṃ stūyate kiṃ tarhi teṣāṃ prasiddhaṃ puruṣārthasādhanatvamapekṣya /
GV05chupsb_u:7476: yathendrādibhī rājā na tu yatrendrādīnāṃ vyāpārastatraiva rājña iti tadvat
GV05chupsb_u:7477: ya imer'ṇavādayo brāhmalaukikāḥ saṃkalpajāśca pitrādayo bhogāste kiṃ pārthivā āpyāśca yatheha loke dṛśyante taddhadarṇavavṛkṣapūḥsvarṇamaṇḍapānyāhosvinmānasapratyayamātrāṇīti /
GV05chupsb_u:7478: kiñcātaḥ, yadi pārthivā āpyāśca sthūlāḥ syurhṛdyākāśe samādhānānupapattiḥ
GV05chupsb_u:7479: purāṇe ca"manomayāni brahmaloke śarīrādīnī"ti vākyaṃ virudhyeta /
GV05chupsb_u:7481: nanu"samudrāḥ saritaḥ sarāṃsi vāpyaḥ kūpā yajñā vedā mantrādayaśca mūrtimanto brahmāṇamupatiṣṭhanta"iti mānasatvai virudhyeta purāṇasmṛtiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7484: tasmātprasiddhamūrtivyatirekeṇa sāgarādīnāṃ mūrtyantaraṃ sāgarādibhirupāttaṃ brahmalokagantṛ kalpanāyāṃ yathāprasiddhā eva mānasya ākāravatyaḥ puṃstryādyā mūrtayo yuktāḥ kalpayituṃ mānasadehānurūpyasaṃbandhopapatteḥ dṛṣṭā hi mānasya evā'kāravatyaḥ puṃstryādyā mūrtayaḥ svapne /
GV05chupsb_u:7486: ta ime satyāḥ kāmā iti śrutistathā sati virudhyeta /
GV05chupsb_u:7489: mānasā hi pratyayāḥ srīpuruṣādyākārāḥ svapne dṛśyante /
GV05chupsb_u:7490: nanu jāgradvāsanārūpāḥ svapnadṛśyā na tu tatra stryādayaḥ svapne vidyante
GV05chupsb_u:7493: saṃkalpamūlā hi lokā iti coktam"samakḷpatāṃ dyāvāpṛthivī"ityatra /
GV05chupsb_u:7494: sarvaśrutiṣu ca pratyagātmana utpattiḥ pralayaśca tatraiva sthitiśca"yathā
GV05chupsb_u:7496: tasmānmānasānāṃ bāhyānāṃ ca viṣayāṇāmitaretarakāryakāraṇamiṣyata eva bījāṅkuravat /
GV05chupsb_u:7497: yadyapi bāhyā eva mānasā mānasā eva ca bāhyā nānṛtatvaṃ teṣāṃ kadācidapi svātmani bhavati
GV05chupsb_u:7498: nanu svapne dṛṣṭāḥ pratibuddhasyānṛtā bhavanti viṣayāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7501: tathā svapnabodhāpekṣaṃ ca jāgraddṛṣṭaviṣayānṛtatvaṃ na svataḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7505: prāksadātmapratibodhātsvaviṣaye 'pi sarvaṃ styameva svapnadṛśyā iveti na kaścidvirodhaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:7506: tasmānmānasā eva brāhmalaukikā araṇyādayaḥ pitrādayaḥ kāmāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7509: sadātmasvarūpatāmeva pratipadyanta iti sadātmanā satyā eva bhavanti //4//
GV05chupsb_u:7512: atha yā etā hṛdayasya nāḍyas tāḥ piṅgalasyāṇimnas tiṣṭhanti śuklasya nīlasya pītasya lohitasyeti
GV05chupsb_u:7513: asau vādityaḥ piṅgala eṣa śukla eṣa nīla eṣa pīta eṣa lohitaḥ ||
GV05chupsb_u:7515: tasyeyaṃ mūrdhanyayā nāḍyā gatirvaktavyeti nāḍīkhaṇḍa ārabhyate- atha yā etā vakṣyamāṇā hṛdayasya puṇḍarīkākārasya brahmopāsanasthānasya saṃbandhinyo nāḍyo hṛdayamāṃsapiṇḍātsarvato viniḥsṛtā ādityamaṇḍalādiva raśmayastāścaitāḥ piṅgalasya varṇaviśeṣaviśiṣṭasyāṇimnaḥ sūkṣmarasasya rasena pūrṇāstadākārā eva tiṣṭhanti vartanta ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7516: tathā śuklasya nīlasya pītasya lohitasya ca rasasya pūrṇā iti sarvatrādhyāhāryam /
GV05chupsb_u:7517: saureṇa tejasā pittākhyena pākābhinirvṛttena kaphenālpena saṃparkātpiṅgalaṃ bhavati sauraṃ tejaḥ pittākhyām tadeva ca vātabhūyastvānnīlaṃ bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:7525: asau vā ādityaḥ piṅgalo varṇata eṣa ādityaḥ śuklo 'pyeṣa nīla eṣa pīta eṣa lohita āditya eva START ChUp 8,6.2
GV05chupsb_u:7526: tad yathā mahāpatha ātata ubhau grāmau gacchatīmaṃ cāmuṃ caivam evaitā ādityasya raśmaya ubhau lokau gacchantīmaṃ cāmuṃ ca |
GV05chupsb_u:7527: amuṣmād ādityāt pratāyante tā āsu nāḍīṣu sṛptāḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:7528: ābhyo nāḍībhyaḥ pratāyante te 'muṣminn āditye sṛptāḥ || ChUp_8,6.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:7529: ChUpBh_8,6.2 tasyādhyātmaṃ nāḍībhiḥ kathaṃ saṃbandha ityatra dṛṣṭāntamāha-tattatra yathā loke mahānvistīrṇaḥ panthā mahāpatha ātato
GV05chupsb_u:7530: vyāpta ubhau gacchatīmaṃ ca saṃnihitamamuṃ ca viprakṛṣṭaṃ dūrasthamevaṃ yathā dṛṣṭānto mahāpatha ubhau grāmau praviṣṭa evamevaitā ādityasya raśmaya ubhau lokāvamuṃ cā'dityamaṇḍalamimaṃ ca puruṣaṃ gacchantyubhayatra
GV05chupsb_u:7535: tā adhyātmamāsu piṅgalādivarṇāsu yathoktāsu nāḍīṣu sṛptā gatāḥ praviṣṭā ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7536: ābhyo nāḍībhyaḥ pratāyante pravṛttāḥ santānabhūtāḥ satyaste 'muṣmin /
GV05chupsb_u:7539: tad yatraitat suptaḥ samastaḥ saṃprasannaḥ svapnaṃ na vijānāti |
GV05chupsb_u:7542: tejasā hi tadā saṃpanno bhavati || ChUp_8,6.3 ||
GV05chupsb_u:7543: ChUpBh_8,6.3 tattatraivaṃ sati yatra yasminkāla etatsvapanamayaṃ jīvaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:7549: ata eva svapnaṃ viṣayākārābhāsaṃ mānasaṃ svapnapratyayaṃ na vijānāti nānubhavatītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7550: yadaivaṃ supto bhavatyāsu sauratejaḥpūrṇāsu yathoktāsu nāḍīṣu tadā sṛptaḥ praviṣṭo nāḍībhirdvārabhūtābhirhṛdayākāśaṃ gato bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7551: na hyanyatra satsaṃpatteḥ svapnādarśanamastīti sāmarthyānnāḍīṣviti saptamī tṛtīyayā pariṇamyate
GV05chupsb_u:7552: taṃ satā saṃpannaṃ na kaścana na kaścidapi dharmādharmarūpaḥ pāpmā spṛśatīti svarūpāvasthitatvāttadā'tmanaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:7553: dehendriyaviśiṣṭaṃ hi sukhaduḥkhakāryapradānena pāpmā spṛśatīti na tu satsaṃpannaṃ svarūpāvasthaṃ kaścidapi pāpmā spraṣṭumutsahate /
GV05chupsb_u:7555: anyo hyanyasya viṣayo bhavati na tvanyatvaṃ kenacitkutaścidapi satsaṃpannasya /
GV05chupsb_u:7556: svarūpapracyavanaṃ tvātmano jāgratsvapnāvasthāṃ prati gamanaṃ bāhyaviṣayapratibodho 'vidyākāmakarmabījasya
GV05chupsb_u:7558: yadaivaṃ suptaḥ saureṇa tejasā hi nāḍyantargatena sarvataḥ saṃpanno vyāpto bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:7560: tasmādayaṃ karaṇānāṃ nirodhātsvātmanyevāvasthitaḥ svapnaṃ na vijānātīti yuktam //3 //
GV05chupsb_u:7563: tam abhita āsīnā āhur jānāsi māṃ jānāsi mām iti |
GV05chupsb_u:7564: sa yāvad asmāc charīrād anutkrānto bhavati |
GV05chupsb_u:7567: dehasya rogādinimittaṃ jarādinimittaṃ vā kṛśībhāvametannayanaṃ nītaḥ prāpito devadatto bhavati mumūrṣaryadā bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7568: tamabhitaḥ sarvato veṣṭayitvā'sīnā jñātaya āhurjānāsi māṃ tava putraṃ jānāsi māṃ pitaraṃ cetyādi /
GV05chupsb_u:7573: sa om iti vā hod vā mīyate |
GV05chupsb_u:7574: sa yāvat kṣipyen manas tāvad ādityaṃ gacchati |
GV05chupsb_u:7575: etad vai khalu lokadvāraṃ viduṣāṃ prapadanaṃ nirodho 'viduṣām ||
GV05chupsb_u:7577: atha tadaitaireva yathoktābhī raśmibhirūrdhvamākramate yathākarmārjitaṃ lokaṃ pratyavidvān
GV05chupsb_u:7579: dhyāyanyathāpūrvaṃ vā haiva, udvordhvaṃ vā vidvāṃśceditarastiryaṅvetyabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7581: sa vidvānutkramiṣyanyāvatkṣipyenmano yāvatā kālena manasaḥ kṣepaḥ syāttāvatā kālenā'dityaṃ gacchati prapnoti kṣipraṃ gacchatītyartho na tu
GV05chupsb_u:7584: dvāraṃ ya ādityastena dvārabhūtena brahmaloka gacchati vidvān /
GV05chupsb_u:7585: ato viduṣāṃ prapadanaṃ prapadyate brahmalokamanena dvāreṇeti prapadanam /
GV05chupsb_u:7587: saureṇa tejasā deha eva niruddhāḥ santo mūrdhanyayā nāḍyā notkramanta evetyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7591: śataṃ caikā ca hṛdayasya nāḍyas tāsāṃ mūrdhānam abhiniḥsṛtaikā |
GV05chupsb_u:7592: tayordhvam āyann amṛtatvam eti viṣvaṅṅ anyā utkramaṇe bhavanty utkramaṇe bhavanti || ChUp_8,6.6
GV05chupsb_u:7593: ChUpBh_8,6.6 tadetasminyathokter'tha eṣa śloko mantro bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:7594: śataṃ caikā caikottaraśataṃ nāḍyo hṛdayasya māṃsapiṇḍabhūtasya saṃbandhinyaḥ pradhānato bhavanti
GV05chupsb_u:7596: tāsāmekā mūrdhānamabhiniḥsṛtā vinirgatā tayordhvamāyangacchannamṛtatvamamṛtabhāvameti viṣvaṅnānāgatayastiryagvisarpiṇya ūrdhvagāścānyā nāḍyo bhavanti saṃsāragamanadvārabhūtā na tvamṛtatvāya kiṃ tarhyatkamaṇa evotkrāntyarthameva bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7600: ya ātmā apahatapāpmā vijaro vimṛtyur viśoko vijighatso 'pipāsaḥ satyakāmaḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ so 'nveṣṭavyaḥ sa vijijñāsitavyaḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:7601: sa sarvāṃś ca lokān āpnoti sarvāṃś ca kāmān yas tam ātmānam anuvidya vijānātīti ha prajāpatir uvāca || ChUp_8,7.1 ||
GV05chupsb_u:7602: ChUpBh_8,7.1 "atha ya eṣa saṃprasādo 'smāccharīrātsamutthāya paraṃ jyotirupasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata eṣa ātmeti
GV05chupsb_u:7604: tatra ko 'sau saṃprasādaḥ, kathaṃ vā tasyādhigamo yathā so 'smāccharīrātsavijijñāsitavya iti caiṣa niyamavidhireva nāpūrvavidhiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7607: dṛṣṭārthatvaṃ ca darśayiṣyati nāhamātra bhogyaṃ paśyāmītyanenāsakṛt /
GV05chupsb_u:7608: pararūpeṇa ca dehādidharbhairavaganyamānasyā'tmanaḥ svarūpādhigame viparītādhigamanivṛttirdṛṣṭaṃ phalamiti niyamārthataivāsya vidheryuktā na
GV05chupsb_u:7612: te hocur hanta tam ātmaānam anvecchāmo yam ātmānam anviṣya sarvāṃś ca lokān āpnoti sarvāṃś ca kāmān iti |
GV05chupsb_u:7614: tau hāsaṃvidānāv eva samitpāṇī prajāpatisakāśam ājagmatuḥ || ChUp_8,7.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:7616: taddha kila prajāpatervacanamubhaye devāsurā devāścāsurāśca devāsurā anu paramparāgataṃ svakarṇagocarāpannamanububudhire 'nubuddhavantaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7618: 'nyonyaṃ devāḥ svapariṣadyasurāśca hanta yadyanumatirbhavatāṃ prajāpatinoktaṃ tamātmānamanvicchāmo 'nveṣaṇaṃ kurmo yamātmānamanviṣya sarvāṃśca lokānāpnoti sarvāśca kāmānityuktvendro haiva rājaiva svayaṃ devānāmitarāndevāṃśca bhogaparicchadaṃ ca sarvaṃ sthāpayitvā
GV05chupsb_u:7622: yato devāsurarājau mahārhabhogārhai santau tathā gurumabhyupagatavantau /
GV05chupsb_u:7623: tau ha kilāsaṃvidānāvevānyonyaṃ saṃvidamakurvāṇau vidyāphalaṃ pratyanyonyamīrṣyāṃ darśayantau samitpāṇī samidbhārahastau prajāpatisakāśamājagmaturāgatavantau //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:7625: tau ha dvātriṃśataṃ varṣāṇi brahmacaryam ūṣatuḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:7628: tau hocatur ya ātmā apahatapāpmā vijaro vimṛtyur viśoko vijighatso
GV05chupsb_u:7630: sa sarvāṃś ca lokān āpnoti sarvāṃś ca kāmān yas tam ātmānam anuvidya vijānātīti bhagavato vaco vedayante |
GV05chupsb_u:7632: ChUpBh_8,7.3 tau ha gatvā dvātriṃśataṃ varṣāṇi śuśrūṣāparau bhūtvā brahmacaryamūṣaturuṣitavantau
GV05chupsb_u:7633: abhiprāyajñaḥ prajāpatistāvuvāca kimicchantau kiṃ prayojanamabhipretyecchantāvavāstamuṣitavantau yuvāmitītyuktau tau hocatuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7634: ya ātmetyādi bhagavato vaco vedayante śiṣṭā atastamātmānaṃ jñātumicchantāvavāstamiti /
GV05chupsb_u:7635: yadyapi prākprajāpateḥ samīpāgamanādanyonyamīrṣyāyuktāvabūtāṃ tathāpi vidyāprāptiprayojanagauravāttyaktarāgadveṣamoherṣyādi doṣāveva bhūtvoṣaturbrahmacaryaṃ prajāpatau /
GV05chupsb_u:7638: tau ha prajāpatir uvāca ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛṣyata eṣa ātmeti hovāca |
GV05chupsb_u:7640: atha yo 'yaṃ bhagavo 'psu parikhyāyate yaś cāyam ādarśe katama eṣa iti |
GV05chupsb_u:7641: eṣa u evaiṣu sarveṣvannteṣu parikhyāyata iti hovāca || ChUp_8,7.4 ||
GV05chupsb_u:7643: prajāpatiruvācaha-ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo nivṛttacakṣurbhirmṛditakaṣāyairdṛśyate yogibhirdraṣṭā, eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmādiguṇo yamavocaṃ purāhaṃ yadvijñānātsarvalokakāmāvāptiretadamṛtaṃ bhamākhyamata evābhayamata eva brahma vṛddhatamamiti /
GV05chupsb_u:7644: athaitatprajāpatinoktamakṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyata iti vacaḥ śrutvā chāyārūpaṃ puruṣaṃ jagṛhatuḥ
GV05chupsb_u:7646: atha yo 'yaṃ he bhagavo 'psu parikhyāyate parisamantājjñāyate yaścāyamādarśa ātmanaḥ pratibimbākāraḥ parikhyāyate khaḍgādau ca katama eṣa eṣāṃ bhagavadbhiruktaḥ kiṃvaika eva sarveṣviti /
GV05chupsb_u:7647: evaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ prajāpatiruvāca-eṣa u eva yaścakṣuṣi draṣṭā mayokta iti /
GV05chupsb_u:7648: etanmanasi kṛtvaiṣu sarveṣvanteṣu madhyeṣu parikhyāyata iti hovāca /
GV05chupsb_u:7654: tau yadi prajāpatinā mūḍhau yuvāṃ viparītagrāhiṇāvityuktau syātāṃ tatastastayościtte duḥkhaṃ syāttajjanitācca cittāvasādātpunaḥ praśnaśravaṇagrahaṇāvadhāraṇaṃ pratyutsāhavidhātaḥ syādato rakṣaṇīyau śiṣyāviti manyate prajāpatiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7656: nanu na yuktameṣa u evetyanṛtaṃ vaktum /
GV05chupsb_u:7665: udaśarāva ātmānam avekṣya yad ātmano na vijānīthas tan me prabrūtam iti |
GV05chupsb_u:7667: tau ha prajāpatir uvāca kiṃ paśyatha iti |
GV05chupsb_u:7668: tau hocatuḥ sarvam evedam āvāṃ bhagava ātmānaṃ paśyāva ā lomabhyaḥ ā nakhebhyaḥ pratirūpam iti || ChUp_8,8.1 ||
GV05chupsb_u:7670: yattatrā'tmānaṃ paśyantau na vijānīthastanme mama prabrūtamācakṣīyāthāmityuktau tau ha tathaivodaśarāve
GV05chupsb_u:7672: tathā kṛtavantau tau ha prajāpatiruvāca kiṃ paśyatha iti /
GV05chupsb_u:7673: nanu tanme prabrūtamityuktābhyāmudaśarāve 'vekṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā prajāpataye na
GV05chupsb_u:7674: niveditamidamāvābhyāṃ na viditamityanivedite cājñānahetau ha prajāpatiruvāca kiṃ paśyatha iti tatra ko 'bhiprāya iti /
GV05chupsb_u:7676: yena vakṣyati tau ha śāntahṛdayau pravavrajaturiti /
GV05chupsb_u:7679: viparītagrāhiṇau ca śiṣyāvanupekṣaṇīyāviti svayameṣa papraccha kiṃ paśyatha iti, viparītaniścayāpanayāya ca vakṣyati sādhvalakṛtāvityevamādi
GV05chupsb_u:7680: tau hocatuḥ-sarvamevedamāvāṃ bhagava ātmānaṃ paśyāva ā lomabhya ā
GV05chupsb_u:7681: nakhebhyaḥ pratirūpamiti, yathaivā'vāṃ he bhagavo lomanakhādimantau sva evamevedaṃ lomanakhādisahitamāvayoḥ pratirūpamudaśarāve paśyāva iti //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:7683: tau ha prajāpatir uvāca sādhvalaṃkṛtau suvasanau pariṣkṛtau bhūtvodaśarāve 'vekṣethām iti
GV05chupsb_u:7684: tau ha sādhvalaṃkṛtau suvasanau pariṣkṛtau bhūtvodaśarāve 'vekṣāṃ cakrāte
GV05chupsb_u:7685: tau ha prajāpatir uvāca kiṃ paśyatha iti || ChUp_8,8.2 ||
GV05chupsb_u:7686: ChUpBh_8,8.2 tau ha punaḥ prajāpatiruvāca cchāyātmaniścayāpanayāya,
GV05chupsb_u:7687: sādhvalaṅkṛtau yathā svagṛhe suvasanau mahārhavastraparidhānau pariṣkṛtau chinnalomanakhau ca bhūtvodaśarāve tayośchāyātmagraho 'panītaḥ syāt /
GV05chupsb_u:7688: sādhvalaṅkārasuvasanādīnāmāgantukānāṃ chāyākaratvamudaśarāve yathā śarīrasaṃbaddhānāmevaṃ śarīrasyāpi cchāyākaratvaṃ pūrvaṃ babhūveti gamyate
GV05chupsb_u:7689: śarīraikadeśānāṃ ca lomanakhādīnāṃ nityatvenābhipretānāmakhaṇḍitānāṃ chāyākaratvaṃ pūrvamāsīt
GV05chupsb_u:7690: chinneṣu ca teṣu naiva lomanakhādicchāyā dṛśyate 'to
GV05chupsb_u:7691: lomanakhādivaccharīrasyāpyāgamāpāyitvaṃ siddhamityudaśarāvādau dṛśyamānasya tannimittasya ca dehasyānātmatvaṃ siddham udaśārāvādau chāyākaratvāddehasaṃbaddhālaṅkārādivat /
GV05chupsb_u:7692: na kevalametāvadetena yāvatkiñcidātmīyatvābhimataṃ sukhaduḥkharāgadveṣamohādi ca kādācitkatvānnakhalomādivadanātmeti pratyetavyam /
GV05chupsb_u:7693: evamaśeṣamithyāgrahāpanayanimitte sādhvalaṅkārādidṛṣṭānte prajāpatinokte śrutvā tathā kṛtavatorapi cchāyātmaviparītagraho nāpajagāma yasmāttasmātsvadoṣeṇaiva kenacitpratibaddhavivekavijñānāvindravirocanāvabhūtāmit i gamyate /
GV05chupsb_u:7694: tau pūrvavadeva dṛḍhaniścayau papraccha kiṃ paśyatha iti //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:7696: tau hocatur yathaivedam āvāṃ bhagavaḥ sādhvalaṃkṛtau suvasanau pariṣkṛtau sva evam evemau bhagavaḥ sādhvallaṃkṛtau suvasanau pariṣkṛtāv iti |
GV05chupsb_u:7700: ChUpBh_8,8.3 tau tathaiva pratipanno yathaivedamiti pūrvavadyathā sādhvalaṅkārādiviśiṣṭāvāvāṃ sva evamevemau chāyātmānāviti sutarāṃ viparītaniścayau babhūvatuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7702: punastadviśeṣamanviṣyamāṇayorya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyata iti sākṣādātmani nirdiṣṭe tadviparītagrahāpanayāyodaśarāvasādhvalaṅkāradṛṣṭānte
GV05chupsb_u:7709: madvacanaṃ sarvaṃ punaḥ punaḥ smaratoḥ pratibandhakṣayācca
GV05chupsb_u:7710: svayamevā'tmaviṣaye viveko bhaviṣyatīti manvānaḥ punarbrahmacaryādeśe ca tayościttadukhotpattiṃ parijihīrṣankṛtārthabuddhitayā gacchantāvapyupekṣitavānprajāpatiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7711: tau hendravirocanau śāntahṛdayau tuṣṭahṛdayau kṛtārthabuddhī ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7712: na tu śama eva, śamaścettayorjāto viparītagraho vigato
GV05chupsb_u:7716: anupalabhyātmānam ananuvidya vrajato yatara etadupaniṣado bhaviṣyanti devā vā asurā vā te parābhaviṣyantīti |
GV05chupsb_u:7717: sa ha śāntahṛdaya eva virocano 'surāñ jagāma |
GV05chupsb_u:7718: tebhyo haitām upaniṣadaṃ provāca ātmaiveha mahayya ātmā paricaryaḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:7719: ātmānam eveha mahayann ātmānaṃ paricarann ubhau lokāv āpnotīmaṃ cāmuṃ ceti
GV05chupsb_u:7720: ChUpBh_8,8.4 evaṃ tayorgatayorindravirocanayo rājñorbhogāsaktayoryathoktavismaraṇaṃ syādityāśaṅkyāpratyakṣaṃ pratyakṣavacanena ca cittaduḥkhaṃ parijihīrṣustau dūraṃ gacchantāvanvīkṣya
GV05chupsb_u:7722: anupalabhya yathoktalakṣaṇamātmānamananuvidya svātmapratyakṣaṃ cākṛtvā viparītaniścayau ca bhūtvendravirocanāvetau vrajato gaccheyātām /
GV05chupsb_u:7723: ato yatare devā vāsurā vā kiṃ viśeṣitenaitadupaniṣada ābhyāṃ yā
GV05chupsb_u:7724: gṛhītā'tmavidyā seyamupaniṣadyeṣāṃ devānāmasurāṇāṃ vā ta etadupaniṣada evaṃvijñānā etanniścayā bhaviṣyantītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7725: te kiṃ, parābhaviṣyanti śreyomārgātparābhūtā bahirbhūtā vinaṣṭā bhaviṣyantītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7726: svagṛhaṃ gacchatoḥ surāsurarājayoryo 'surarājaḥ sa ha śāntahṛdaya eva sanvirocano 'surāñjagāma
GV05chupsb_u:7729: tasmādātmaiva deha iha loka mahayyaḥ pūjanīyastathā paricaryaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:7734: tasmād apyaddyehādadānam aśraddadhānam ayajamānam āhur āsuro bateti |
GV05chupsb_u:7737: etena hy ammuṃ lokaṃ jeṣyanto manyante || ChUp_8,8.5 ||
GV05chupsb_u:7739: dānamakurvāṇamavibhāgaśīlamaśraddadhānaṃ satkāryeṣu śraddhārahitaṃ yathāśaktyayajamānamayajanasvabhāvamāhurāsuraḥ khalvayaṃ yata evaṃsvabhāvo bateti khidyamānā āhuḥ śiṣṭāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7741: tayopaniṣadā saṃskṛtāḥ santaḥ pretasya śarīraṃ kuṇapaṃ bhikṣayā gandhamālyānnādilakṣaṇayā vasanena vasrādinā'cchādanādiprakāreṇālaṅkāreṇa
GV05chupsb_u:7742: dhvajapatākādikaraṇenetyevaṃ saṃskurvantyetena kuṇapasaṃskāreṇāmuṃ pretya pratipattavyaṃ lokaṃ jeṣyanto manyante //5//
GV05chupsb_u:7745: atha hendro 'prāpyaiva devān etad bhayaṃ dadarśa |
GV05chupsb_u:7746: yathaiva khalv ayam asmiñ charīre sādhvalaṃkṛte sādhvalaṃkṛto bhavati suvasane suvasanaḥ pariṣkṛte pariṣkṛta evam evāyam asminn andhe 'ndho
GV05chupsb_u:7748: asyaiva śarīrasya nāśam anv eṣa naśyati |
GV05chupsb_u:7750: ChUpBh_8,9.1 atha ha kilendro 'prāpyaiva devāndaivyākrauryādisaṃpadā yuktatvādgurorvacanaṃ punaḥ punaḥ smaranneva gacchannetadvakṣyamāṇaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:7752: udaśarāvadṛṣṭāntena prajāpatinā yadartho nyāya uktastadekadeśo maghavataḥ pratyabhādbuddhau

GV05chupsb_u:7906: svalpastu doṣastavāvaśiṣṭastatkṣapaṇāya vasāparāṇyanyāni pañca varṣāṇītyuktaḥ sa tathā cakāra
GV05chupsb_u:7909: yadāhurloke śiṣṭā ekaśataṃ ha vai varṣāṇi maghavānprajāpatau brahmacaryamuvāseti tadetaddvātriṃśatamityādinā
GV05chupsb_u:7911: evaṃ kilaitadindratvādapi gurutaramindreṇāpi mahatā yatnenaikottaravarṣaśatakṛtāyāsena prāptamātmajñānamato nātaḥ paraṃ puruṣārthāntaramastītyātmajñānaṃ stauti //3//
GV05chupsb_u:7914: maghavan martyaṃ vā idaṃ śarīram āttaṃ mṛtyunā |

GV05chupsb_u:7925: kadācideva mriyata iti martyamityukte na tathā saṃtrāso bhavati yathā grastameva sadā vyāptameva mṛtyunetyukta iti vairāgyārthaṃ viśeṣa ityucyata āttaṃ mṛtyuneti /
GV05chupsb_u:7926: kathaṃ nāma dehābhimānato viraktaḥ sannivartata iti /
GV05chupsb_u:7929: amṛtasyetyanenaivāśarīratve siddhe punaraśarīrasyeti vacanaṃ vāyvādivatsāvayavatvamūrtimattve mā bhūtāmityātmanaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7933: aśarīrasvabhāvasyā'tmanastadevāhaṃ śarīraṃ śarīrameva cāhamityavivekādātmabhāvaḥ saśarīratvaṃ ata eva saśarīraḥ sannātto grastaḥ priyāpriyābhyām /
GV05chupsb_u:7935: tasya ca na vai saśarīrasya sataḥ priyāpriyayorbāhyaviṣayasaṃyogaviyoganimittayorbāhyaviṣayasaṃyogaviyogau mameti manyamānasyāpahatirvināśa ucchedaḥ santatirūpayornāstīti /
GV05chupsb_u:7936: taṃ punardehābhimānādaśarīrasvarūpavijñānena vinartitāvivekajñānaśarīraṃ santaṃ priyāpriye na spṛśataḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7937: spṛśiḥ pratyekaṃ saṃbadhyata iti priyaṃ na spṛśatyapriyaṃ na spṛśatīti vākyadvayaṃ bhavati
GV05chupsb_u:7940: aśarīratā tu svarūpamiti tatra dharmādharmayorasaṃbhavāttatkāryabhāvo dūrata evetyato na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7941: nanu yadi priyamapyaśarīraṃ na spṛśatīti yanmaghavatoktaṃ suṣuptastho vināśamevāpīto bhavatīti tadevehāpyāpannam /
GV05chupsb_u:7942: naiṣa doṣaḥ dharmādharmakāryayoḥ śarīrasaṃbandhinoḥ priyāpriyayoḥ pratiṣedhasya vivakṣitatvāt aśarīraṃ na priyāpriye spṛśata iti /
GV05chupsb_u:7943: āgamāpāyinorhi sparśaśabdo dṛṣṭo yathā śītasparśa uṣṇasparśa iti na tvagneruṣṇaprakāśayoḥ svabhāvabhūtayoragninā sparśa iti bhavati tathāgneḥ

GV05chupsb_u:7949: taddhondrasyeṣṭaṃ yadbhatāni cā'tmānaṃ ca jānāti na cāpriyaṃ kiñcidvetti sa sarvāṃśca lokānāpnoti sarvāṃśca kāmānyena jñānena

GV05chupsb_u:7978: yasminnuttamapuruṣe stryādibhirjakṣatkrīḍanramamāṇo bhavati sa uttmaḥ puruṣaḥ para ukta iti cā'huḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7982: akṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyata ityupanyasya śiṣyābhyāṃ chāyātmani gṛhīte tayostadviparītagrahaṇaṃ matvā tadapanayāyodaśarāvopanyāsaḥ kiṃ paśyatha iti ca praśnaḥ sādhvalaṅkāropadeśaścānarthakaḥ syāt yadi cchāyātmaiva prajāpatinākṣiṇi dṛśyata ityupadiṣṭaḥ /

GV05chupsb_u:8000: yaccoktaṃ saṃprasādaḥ śarīrātsamutthāya yasminstryādibhī ramamāṇo bhavati so 'nyaḥ saṃprasādādadhikaraṇanirdiṣṭa uttamaḥ puruṣa iti /

GV05chupsb_u:8006: tasmiṃstvaṃ stryādibhī rantā bhaviṣyasīti yukta upadeśo 'bhaviṣyadyadi
GV05chupsb_u:8011: sarvaśrutiṣu ca parasminnātmaśabdaprayogo nābhaviṣyatpratyagātmā cetsarvajantūnāṃ para ātmā na bhavettasmādeka evā'tmā prakaraṇī siddhaḥ /

GV05chupsb_u:8023: sarvamapyetatsatyamiti cedastyevaitadevaṃ duravagamaṃ yena devarājo 'pyudaśarāvādidarśitāvināśayuktirapi mumohaivātra vināśamevāpīto bhavatīti

GV05chupsb_u:8027: tathānye kāṇādādidarśanāḥ kaṣāyaraktamiva kṣārādibhirvasraṃ navabhirātmaguṇairyuktamātmadravyaṃ viśodhayituṃ pravṛttāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8028: tathānye karmiṇo bāhyaviṣayāpahṛtacetaso vedapramāṇā api paramārthasatyamātmaikatvaṃ vināśamivendravanmanyamānā ghaṭīyantravadārohāvarohaprakārairaniśaṃ bambhramati /
GV05chupsb_u:8029: kimanye kṣudrajantavo vivekahīnāḥ svabhāvata eva bahirviṣayāpahṛtacetasaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:8030: tasmādidaṃ tyaktasarvabāhyaiṣaṇairananyaśaraṇaiḥ paramahaṃsaparivrājakairatyāśramibhirvedāntavijñānaparaireva vedanīyaṃ pūjyatamaiḥ prājāpatyaṃ cemaṃ saṃpradāyamanusaradbhirupanibaddhaṃ prakaraṇacatuṣṭayena tathānuśāsatyadyāpi ta eva nānya iti //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:8034: tad yathaitāny amuṣmād ākāśāt samutthāya paraṃ jyotir upasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyante ChUpBh_8,12.2 tatrāśarīrasya saṃprasādasyāvidyayā śarīreṇāviśeṣatāṃ
GV05chupsb_u:8035: sasarīratāmeva saṃprāptasya śarīrātsamutthāya svena rūpeṇa yathābhiniṣpattistathā vaktavyeti dṛṣṭānta ucyate-aśarīro vāyuravidyamānaṃ śiraḥpāṇyādimaccharīramasyetyaśarīraḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8039: etāni yathoktānyākāśasamānarūpatāmāpannāni svena vāyvādirūpeṇāgṛhyamāṇānyākāśākhyatāṃ gatāni yathā saṃprasādo
GV05chupsb_u:8040: 'vidyāvasthāyāṃ śarīrātmabhāvamevāpannaḥ, tāni ca tathābhūtānyamuṣmāddyulokasambandhina ākāśadeśātsamuttiṣṭhanti varṣaṇādiprayojanābhinirvṛttaye /
GV05chupsb_u:8042: śiśirāpāye sāvitra paraṃ jyotiḥ prakṛṣṭaṃ graiṣmakamupasaṃpadya sāvitramabhitāpaṃ prāpyetyarthaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:8043: ādityābhitāpena pṛthagbhāvamāpāditāḥ santaḥ svena svena rūpeṇa purovātādivāyurūpeṇa stimitabhāvaṃ hitvābhramapi bhūmiparvatahastyādirūpeṇa vidyudapi svena jyotirlatādicapalarūpeṇa stanayitnurapi svena garjitāśanirūpeṇetyevaṃ prāvṛḍāgame svena svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyante //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:8045: evam evaiṣa saṃprasādo 'smāc charīrāt samutthāya paraṃ jyotir upasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate
GV05chupsb_u:8047: sa tatra paryeti jakṣat krīḍan ramamāṇaḥ strībhir vā yānair vā jñātibhir vā nopajanaṃ smarann idaṃ śarīram |
GV05chupsb_u:8048: sa yathā prayogya ācaraṇe yukta evam evāyam asmiñ charīre prāṇo yuktaḥ ||
GV05chupsb_u:8050: saṃsārāvasthāyāṃ śarīrasāmyamāpanno 'hamamuṣya putro jāto jīrṇo mariṣya ityevaṃprakāraṃ prajāpatineva maghavānyathoktena krameṇa nāsi tvaṃ dehendriyādidharmā tattvamasīti pratibodhitaḥ sansa eṣa saṃprasādo jīvo 'smāccharīrādākāśādiva vāyvādayaḥ samutthāya dehādivailakṣaṇyamātmano
GV05chupsb_u:8052: svena rūpeṇa sadātmanaivābhiniṣpadyata iti vyākhyātaṃ purastāt /
GV05chupsb_u:8054: prākpratibodhāttadbhrāntinimittātsarpo bhavati yatā rajjuḥ paścātkṛtaprakāśā rajjvātmanā svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate /
GV05chupsb_u:8055: evaṃ ca sa uttamapuruṣa uttamaścāsau puruṣaścetyuttamapuruṣaḥ sa evottamapuruṣo 'kṣisvapnapuruṣau vyaktāvavyaktaśca suṣuptaḥ samastaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:8057: eṣāmeṣa svena rūpeṇāvasthitaḥ kṣarākṣarau vyākṛtāvyākṛtāvapekṣyottamapuruṣaḥ kṛtanirvacano hyayaṃ gītāsu /
GV05chupsb_u:8058: sa saṃprasādaḥ svena rūpeṇa tatra svātmani svasthatayā sarvātmabhūtaḥ paryeti kvacidindrādyātmanā jakṣaddhasanbhakṣayanvā bhakṣyānuccāvacānīpsitānkvacinmanomātraiḥ saṃkalpādeva samutthitairbrāhmalaukikairvā krīḍanstryādibhī ramamāṇaśca manasaiva nopajanaṃ srīpuṃsayoranyonyopagamena jāyata ityupajanamātmabhāvena vā'tmasāmīpyena jāyata ityupajanamidaṃ śarīraṃ tanna smaran /
GV05chupsb_u:8063: yena mithyājñānādinā janitaṃ tacca mithyājñānādi vidyayoccheditamatastannānubhūtameveti na tadasmaraṇe sarvajñatvahāniḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8064: na hyu nmattena grahagṛhītena vā yadanubhūtaṃ tadunmādādyapadame 'pi
GV05chupsb_u:8065: smartavyaṃ syāttathehāpi saṃsāribhiravidyādoṣavadbhiryadanubhūyate tatsarvātmānamaśarīraṃ na spṛśati /
GV05chupsb_u:8067: ye tūcchinnadoṣairmṛditakaṣāyairmānasāḥ satyāḥ kāmā anṛtāpidhānā anubhūyante vidyābhivyaṅgyatvātta eva muktena sarvātmabhūtena saṃbadhyanta ityātmajñānastutaye nirdiśyante 'taḥ sādhvetadviśinaṣṭi-ya ete brahmaloka iti /
GV05chupsb_u:8068: yatra kvacana bhavanto 'pi brahmaṇyeva hi te loke bhavantīti sarvātmatvādbrahmaṇa ucyante
GV05chupsb_u:8071: yathaiko yasminneva kṣaṇe paśyati sa tasminneva kṣaṇe na paśyati ceti /
GV05chupsb_u:8076: yadyapi suṣupte taduktaṃ muktasyāpi sarvaikatvātsamāno dvitīyābhāvaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8078: aśarīrasvarūpo 'pahatapāpmādilakṣaṇaḥ sankathameṣa puruṣo 'kṣiṇi dṛśyata ityuktaḥ prajāpatinā
GV05chupsb_u:8080: tatra ko heturakṣiṇi darśana ityāha-sa dṛṣṭānto yathā prayogyaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:8083: yathā loka ācaratyanenetyācaraṇo ratho 'no vā tasminnācaraṇe yuktastadākarṣaṇāya, evamasmiñcharīre rathasthānīye prāṇaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:8084: pañcavṛttirindriyamanobuddhisaṃyuktaḥ prajñātmā vijñānakriyāśaktidvayasaṃmūrchitātmā yuktaḥ svakarmaphalopabhoganimittaṃ niyuktaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8085: kasminnvahamutkrānta utkrānto bhavisaṣyāmi kasminvā pratiṣṭhite pratiṣṭhāsyāmīti /
GV05chupsb_u:8089: atha yatraitad ākāśam anuviṣaṇṇaṃ cakṣuḥ sa cākṣuṣaḥ puruṣo darśanāya cakṣuḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:8090: atha yo vededaṃ jighrāṇīti sa ātmā gandhāya ghrāṇam |
GV05chupsb_u:8091: atha yo vededam abhivyāharāṇīti sa ātmā abhivyāhārāya vāk |
GV05chupsb_u:8092: atha yo vededaṃ śṛṇvānīti sa ātmā śravaṇāya śrotram || ChUp_8,12.4 ||
GV05chupsb_u:8094: dehacchidramanuviṣaṇṇamanuṣaktamanugataṃ tatra sa prakṛto 'śarīra ātmā cākṣuṣaścakṣuṣi bhava iti cākṣuṣastasya darśanāya rūpopalabdhaye cakṣuḥ karaṇaṃ yasya taddehādibhiḥ saṃhatatvātparasya draṣṭurarthe so 'tra
GV05chupsb_u:8100: athāpi yo 'smindehe veda kathamidaṃ sugandhi durgandhi vā jighrāṇītyasya
GV05chupsb_u:8101: gandhaṃ vijānīyāmiti sa ātmā tasya gandhāya gandhavijñānāya ghrāṇam /
GV05chupsb_u:8102: atha yo vededaṃ vacanamabhivyāharāṇīti vadiṣyāmīti sa ātmābhivyavaharaṇakriyāsiddhaye karaṇaṃ vāgindriyam /
GV05chupsb_u:8103: atha yo vededaṃ śṛṇavānīti sa ātmā śravaṇāya śrotram //4 //
GV05chupsb_u:8105: atha yo vededaṃ manvānīti sa ātmā |
GV05chupsb_u:8107: sa vā eṣa etena daivena cakṣuṣā manasaitān kāmān paśyan ramate ya ete brahmaloke || ChUp_8,12.5
GV05chupsb_u:8108: ChUpBh_8,12.5 atha yo vedadaṃ manvānīti mananavyāpāramindriyāsaṃspṛṣṭaṃ kevalaṃ manvānīti veda sa ātmā mananāya manaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8109: yo veda sa ātmetyevaṃ sarvatra prayogādvedanamasya svarūpamityavagamyate /
GV05chupsb_u:8110: yathā yaḥ purastātprakāśayati sa ādityo yo dakṣiṇato yaḥ paścādya uttarato ya ūrdhvaṃ prakāśayati sa āditya ityukte prakāśasvarūpaḥ sa iti gamyate /
GV05chupsb_u:8113: ātmanaḥ sattāmātra eva jñānakartṛtvaṃ na tu vyāpṛtatayā /
GV05chupsb_u:8114: yathā savituḥ sattāmātra eva prakāśanakartṛtvaṃ na tu vyāpṛtatayeti tadvat
GV05chupsb_u:8117: manastu trikālaviṣayopalabdhikaraṇaṃ mṛditadoṣaṃ ca sūkṣmavyavahitādisarvopalabdhikaraṇaṃ ceti daivaṃ cakṣurucyate /
GV05chupsb_u:8119: sarvātmabhāvamāpannaḥ sanneṣa vyomavadviśuddhaḥ sarveśvaro manaupādhiḥ sannetenaiveśvareṇa manasaitānkāmānsavitṛprakāśavannityapratatena darśanena paśyan ramate /
GV05chupsb_u:8123: taṃ vā etaṃ devā ātmānam upāsate |
GV05chupsb_u:8124: tasmāt teṣāṃ sarve ca lokā āttāḥ sarve ca kāmāḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:8125: sa sarvāṃś ca lokān āpnoti sarvāṃś ca kāmān yas tam ātmānam anuvidya vijānāti |
GV05chupsb_u:8126: iti ha prajāpatir uvāca prajāpatir uvāca || ChUp_8,12.6 ||
GV05chupsb_u:8127: ChUpBh_8,12.6 yasmādeṣa indrāya prajāpatinokta ātmā tasmāttataḥ śrutvā
GV05chupsb_u:8129: tadupāsanācca teṣāṃ sarve ca lokā āttāḥ prāptāḥ sarve ca kāmāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8130: yadarthaṃ hīndra ekaśataṃ varṣāṇi prajāpatau brahmacaryamuvāsa tatphalaṃ prāptaṃ devairityabhiprāyaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:8131: tadyuktaṃ devānāṃ mahābhāgyatvānna tvidānīṃ manuṣyāṇāmalpajīvitatvānmandataraprajñatvācca saṃbhavatīti prāpta
GV05chupsb_u:8134: indrādivadyastamātmānamanuvidya vijānātīti ha sāmānyena kila prajāpatiruvāca /
GV05chupsb_u:8141: aśva iva romāṇi vidhūya pāpaṃ candra iva rāhor mukhāt pramucya dhūtvā śarīram akṛtaṃ kṛtātmā brahmalokam abhisaṃbhavāmīty abhisaṃbhavāmīti ||
GV05chupsb_u:8142: ChUpBh_8,13.1 śyāmācchabalaṃ prapadya ityādimantrāmnāya pāvano japārthaśca dhyānārtho vā
GV05chupsb_u:8143: śyāmo gambhīro varṇaḥ śyāma iva śyāmo hārdaṃ brahmātyantaduravagāhyatvāttaddhārda brahma jñātvā dhyānena tasmācchyāmācchabalaṃ śabala iva śabalo
GV05chupsb_u:8144: 'raṇyādyanekakāmamiśratvādbrahmalokasya śābalya taṃ brahmalokaṃ śabalaṃ prapadye manasā śarīrapātādvordhvaṃ gaccheyam /
GV05chupsb_u:8145: yasmādahaṃ śabalādbrahmalokānnāmarūpavyākaraṇāya śyāmaṃ prapadye hārdabhāvaṃ prapanno 'smītyabhiprāyaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:8147: kathaṃ śabalaṃ brahmalokaṃ prapadya ityucyate-aśva iva svāni lomāni
GV05chupsb_u:8148: vidhūya kampanena śramaṃ pāṃsvādi ca romato 'panīya yathā nirmalo bhavatyevaṃ hārdabrahmajñānena vidhūya pāpaṃ dharmādharmākyaṃ candra iva ca rāhugrastastasmādrahormukhātmapramucya bhāsvaro bhavati yathaivaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:8149: dhūtvā prahāra śarīraṃ sarvānarthāśrayamihaiva dhyānena kṛtātmā kṛtakṛtyaḥ sannakṛtaṃ nityaṃ brahmalokamabhisaṃbhavāmīti /
GV05chupsb_u:8154: te yadantarā tad brahma tad amṛtaṃ sa ātmā |
GV05chupsb_u:8155: prajāpateḥ sabhāṃ veśma prapadye yaśo 'haṃ bhavāmi brāhmaṇānāṃ yaśo rājñām yaśo viśām |
GV05chupsb_u:8158: śyetam adatkam adatkaṃ śyetaṃ lindu mābhigāṃ lindu mābhigām || ChUp_8,14.1
GV05chupsb_u:8159: ChUpBh_8,14.1 ākāśo vā ityādi brahmaṇo lakṣaṇanirdeśārthamādhyānāya /
GV05chupsb_u:8160: ākāśo vai nāma śrutiṣu prasiddha ātmā /
GV05chupsb_u:8164: te nāmarūpe yadantarā yasya brahmaṇo 'ntarā madhye vartete, tayorvā nāmarūpayorantarā madhye yannāmarūpābhyāmaspṛṣṭaṃ yadityetattadbrahma nāmarūpavilakṣaṇaṃ nāmarūpābhyāmaspṛṣṭaṃ tathāpi tayornirvoḍhutvaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ brahmetyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8165: idameva maitreyībrāhmaṇenoktaṃ cinmātrānugamātmasarvatra citsvarūpataiveti gamyata ekavākyatā
GV05chupsb_u:8167: ātmā hi nāma sarvajantūnāṃ pratyakcetanaḥ svasaṃvedyaḥ prasiddhastenaiva svarūpeṇonnīyāśarīro vyomavatsarvagata ātmā brahmetyavagantavyam /
GV05chupsb_u:8170: prajāpatiścaturmukhastasya sabhāṃ veśma prabhuvimitaṃ veśma prapadye gaccheyam /
GV05chupsb_u:8171: kiñca yaśo 'haṃ yaśo nāmā'tmāhaṃ bhavāmi brāhmaṇānām /
GV05chupsb_u:8172: brāhmaṇā eva hi viśeṣatastamupāsate tatasteṣāṃ yaśo bhavāmi /
GV05chupsb_u:8177: kimarthamahamevaṃ prapadya iti, ucyate-śyetaṃ varṇataḥ pakvabadarasamaṃ rohitam /
GV05chupsb_u:8178: tathādatkaṃ dantarahitamapyadatkaṃ bhakṣayitṛ srīvyañjanaṃ tatsevināṃ tejobalavīryavijñānadharmāṇāmapahantṛ vināśayitrityetat /
GV05chupsb_u:8179: yadevaṃlakṣaṇaṃ śyetaṃ lindu picchilaṃ tanmābhigāṃ mābhigaccheyam /
GV05chupsb_u:8183: tad dhaitad brahmā prajāpataya uvāca prajāpatir manave manuḥ prajābhyaḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:8184: ācāryakulād vedam adhītya yathāvidhānaṃ guroḥ karmātiśeṣeṇābhisamāvṛtya kuṭumbe śucau deśe svādhyāyam adhīyāno dharmikān vidadhad ātmani sarvendriyāṇi saṃpratiṣṭhāpyāhiṃsan sarvabhūtāny anyatra tīrthebhyaḥ |
GV05chupsb_u:8185: sa khalv evaṃ vartayan yāvad āyuṣaṃ brahmalokam abhisaṃpadyate |
GV05chupsb_u:8186: na ca punar āvartate na ca punar āvartate || ChUp_8,15.1 ||
GV05chupsb_u:8187: ChUpBh_8,15.1 taddhaitadātmajñānaṃ sopakaraṇamomityetadakṣaramityādyaiḥ sahopāsanaistadvācakena granthenāṣṭādhyāyīlakṣaṇena saha brahmā hiraṇyagarbhaḥ parameśvaro vā taddvāreṇa prajāpataye kaśyapāyovāca /
GV05chupsb_u:8192: yatheha ṣaṣṭhādyadhyāyatraye prakāśitātmavidyā saphalāvagamyate tathā karmaṇāṃ na kaścanārtha iti prāpte tadānarthakyaprāptiparijihīrṣayedaṃ karmaṇo vidvadbhiranuṣṭhīyamānasya viśiṣṭaphalavattvenārthavattvamucyate-ācāryakulādvedamadhītya sahārthato
GV05chupsb_u:8195: sarvasyāpi vidheḥ smṛtyuktasyopakaparvāṇakaṃ prati kartavyatve guruśuśrūṣāyāḥ prādhānyapradarśanārthamāha-guroḥ karma yatkartavyaṃ tatkṛtvā karmaśūnyo yo 'tiśiṣṭaḥ kālastena kālena vedamadhītyetyarthaḥ evaṃ hi niyamavatādhīto vedaḥ karmajñānaphalaprāptaye bhavati nānyathetyabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8196: abhisamāvṛtya dharmajijñāsāṃ samāpayitvā gurukulannivṛtya nyāyato dārānāhṛtya kuṭumbe sthitvā gārhatthve vihite karmaṇi tiṣṭhannityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8198: prādhānyapradarśanārthamucyate-śucau vivikte 'medhyādirahite deśe yatāvadāsīnaḥ svādhyāyamadhīyāno naityakamadhikaṃ ca yathāśakti
GV05chupsb_u:8199: ṛgādyabhyāsaṃ ca kurvandhārmikānputrāñśiṣyāṃśca dharmayuktānvidadhaddhārmikatvena tānniyamayannātmani svahṛdaye hārde brahmaṇi sarvendriyāṇi saṃpratiṣṭhāpyopasaṃhṛtyendriyagrahaṇātkarmāṇi ca saṃnyasyāhiṃsahiṃnsāṃ parapīḍāmakurvansarvabhūtāni sthāvarajaṅgamāni bhūtānyapīḍayannityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8203: anye varṇayanti kuṭumba evaitatsarvaṃ kurvansa khalvadhikṛto yāvadāyuṣaṃ yāvajjīvamevaṃyathoktena prakāreṇaiva vartayanbrahmalokamabhisaṃpadyatedehānte /
GV05chupsb_u:8206: arcirādinā mārgeṇa kāryabrahmalokabhisaṃpadya yāvadbrahmalokasthitistāvattatraiva tiṣṭhati prāktato nā'vartata ityarthaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:8208: iti cchāndogyopaniṣadi aṣṭamādhyāyasya pañcadaśaḥ khaṇḍaḥ iti śrīmadgovindabhagavatpūjyapādaśiṣyaparamahaṃsapar ivrājakācāryaśrīmacchaṅkarabhagavatpādakṛtau cchāndogyopaniṣadvivaraṇe aṣṭamo 'dhyāyaḥ
